text: And the earth was without form , and void ; and darkness was upon the face of the deep . And the Spirit of God moved upon the face of the waters .
text2: Am ̣ adal wər iga təməwit waliyyat , əlsan - tu am ̣ an əknanen igət , wər t - illa ar šiyyay əwarnen afalla n am ̣ an win , amaran In ̣ fas ən Məššina ənta ollay fəl am ̣ an win .

text: And God said , Let there be light : and there was light .
text2: In ̣ n ̣ a Məššina : « Ən ̣ n ̣ ur , əməl - t . » Təzzar imal - t ən ̣ n ̣ ur .

text: And God saw the light , that it was good : and God divided the light from the darkness .
text2: Inay Məššina as ən ̣ n ̣ ur im ̣ os arat olaɣan , təzzar izammazzay Məššina ən ̣ n ̣ ur əd šiyyay .

text: And God called the light Day , and the darkness he called Night . And the evening and the morning were the first day .
text2: Iga Məššina y ən ̣ n ̣ ur es ̣ əm ezal amaran šiyyay ig - asnat es ̣ əm ehad , ig ' ahad təga tifawt , ig ' əzəl w ' azzaran .

text: And God said , Let there be a firmament in the midst of the waters , and let it divide the waters from the waters .
text2: In ̣ n ̣ a Məššina : « Iməlet - tu aɣarɣar az z - izəmməzzəyan am ̣ an . »

text: And God made the firmament , and divided the waters which were under the firmament from the waters which were above the firmament : and it was so .
text2: Təzzar iga - ddu Məššina aɣarɣar izammazzay am ̣ an win əllanen daw aɣarɣar a əd win əwarnen afalla - nnet . Ig ' a wen da .

text: And God called the firmament Heaven . And the evening and the morning were the second day .
text2: Iga Məššina y aɣarɣar a es ̣ əm ijənnawan . Ig ' ahad təga tifawt , ig ' əzəl wa n əššin .

text: And God said , Let the waters under the heaven be gathered together unto one place , and let the dry land appear : and it was so .
text2: In ̣ n ̣ a Məššina : « Am ̣ an win daw jənnawan iddawanet , əggəzan edagg iyyanda fəl ad - d - inəfiləl edag wa iqquran . » Iga a wen da .

text: And God called the dry land Earth ; and the gathering together of the waters called he Seas : and God saw that it was good .
text2: Iga Məššina y adag wa iqquran es ̣ əm am ̣ adal , iga y adag wa daɣ əddewan am ̣ an es ̣ əm igərwan . Inay Məššina as arat ̣ wa olaɣ .

text: And God said , Let the earth bring forth grass , the herb yielding seed , and the fruit tree yielding fruit after his kind , whose seed is in itself , upon the earth : and it was so .
text2: Təzzar in ̣ n ̣ a : « Am ̣ adal təwəret - tu taddalət təgat daɣ yel ilan am ̣ asa əd rawan n eškan ətarawnen aratan əlanen am ̣ asa nasan . » Təzzar ig ' a wen da .

text: And the earth brought forth grass , and herb yielding seed after his kind , and the tree yielding fruit , whose seed was in itself , after his kind : and God saw that it was good .
text2: Issəg ̣ mad - du am ̣ adal taddalət təgat daɣ yel ilan am ̣ asa əkkulluk n iyyan d iri - nnet , əd rawan n eškan ətarawnen aratan əlanen am ̣ asa - nnasan . Inay Məššina as arat wa olaɣ .

text: And the evening and the morning were the third day .
text2: Ig ' ahad təga tifawt , ig ' əzəl wa n karad .

text: And God said , Let there be lights in the firmament of the heaven to divide the day from the night ; and let them be for signs , and for seasons , and for days , and years :
text2: In ̣ n ̣ a Məššina : « Əməlanet - tu ən ̣ n ̣ uran daɣ jənnawan az za - zəmməzzinen ehad d azal , əqqəlanet asannal az z - izləyan šimeren d ad ̣ an d elan .

text: And let them be for lights in the firmament of the heaven to give light upon the earth : and it was so .
text2: Əqqəlanet tolas ən ̣ n ̣ uran daɣ jənnawan az z - əsəmmələwləwnen am ̣ adal . » Təzzar iga a wen da .

text: And God made two great lights ; the greater light to rule the day , and the lesser light to rule the night : he made the stars also .
text2: Iga Məššina ən ̣ n ̣ uran win n əššin zawwarnen . Ən ̣ n ̣ ur wa ogaran , ənta t ̣ əfuk , ad - isəmmələwləw ezal , wa ənd ̣ ərran , tallit , ad - isəmmələwləw ehad . Iga - ddu et ̣ ran əntanay da .

text: And God set them in the firmament of the heaven to give light upon the earth ,
text2: Ig - en daɣ jənnawan fəl ad - səmmələwləwan am ̣ adal ,

text: And to rule over the day and over the night , and to divide the light from the darkness : and God saw that it was good .
text2: fəl ad - əzənnəməzləyan ezal d ahad , zəmməzzəyyan ən ̣ n ̣ ur əd šiyyay . Inay Məššina as arat wa olaɣ .

text: And the evening and the morning were the fourth day .
text2: Ig ' ahad təga tifawt , ig ' əzəl wa n əkkoz .

text: And God said , Let the waters bring forth abundantly the moving creature that hath life , and fowl that may fly above the earth in the open firmament of heaven .
text2: In ̣ n ̣ a Məššina : « Wəšənkəlnatet təxəllak əddarnen daɣ am ̣ an , əggədanet g ̣ ədad əntanay da daɣ jənnawan fəl afalla n am ̣ adal . »

text: And God created great whales , and every living creature that moveth , which the waters brought forth abundantly , after their kind , and every winged fowl after his kind : and God saw that it was good .
text2: Ixlak - du Məššina šixəllak əknanen təzzəwwərt əddarnen daɣ am ̣ an əd mudaran kul win daɣ - san wašankalnen əkkulluk n iyyan d iri - nnet , ixlak - du tolas ig ̣ ədad kul əkkulluk n iyyan d iri - nnet . Inay Məššina as arat wa olaɣ .

text: And God blessed them , saying , Be fruitful , and multiply , and fill the waters in the seas , and let fowl multiply in the earth .
text2: Iga fall - assan albaraka - nnet , in ̣ n ̣ a i mudaran win n am ̣ an : « Əggəzat šin n ara təfələyləyam , tədkəram am ̣ an ən gərwan . » In ̣ n ̣ a i g ̣ ədad əntanay da : « Fələyləyat fəl am ̣ adal . »

text: And the evening and the morning were the fifth day .
text2: Ig ' ahad təga tifawt , ig ' əzəl wa n s ̣ əmmos .

text: And God said , Let the earth bring forth the living creature after his kind , cattle , and creeping thing , and beast of the earth after his kind : and it was so .
text2: In ̣ n ̣ a Məššina : « Issəg ̣ mədet - du am ̣ adal šixəllak əddarnen əkkulluk n iyyat d iri - nnet , əm ̣ osnen ihərwan əd lumət - lumət əd wəxsan əkkulluk n iyyan d iri - nnet . » Təzzar iga a wen da .

text: And God made the beast of the earth after his kind , and cattle after their kind , and every thing that creepeth upon the earth after his kind : and God saw that it was good .
text2: Iga - ddu Məššina iwəxsan əd hərwan əd lumət - lumət ket - nasan akk - iyyan d iri - nnet . Inay as arat wa olaɣ .

text: And God said , Let us make man in our image , after our likeness : and let them have dominion over the fish of the sea , and over the fowl of the air , and over the cattle , and over all the earth , and over every creeping thing that creepeth upon the earth .
text2: In ̣ n ̣ a Məššina : agatana aggadəm əs šaššela - nnana . Ixkəmet kifitan əd g ̣ ədad əd hərwan əd wəxsan əd lumət - lumət kul win əllomatnen am ̣ adal . »

text: So God created man in his own image , in the image of God created he him ; male and female created he them .
text2: Məššina ixlak - du aggadəm əs šaššela - nnet yay əd təntay ket - nasan ixlak - kan - du .

text: And God blessed them , and God said unto them , Be fruitful , and multiply , and replenish the earth , and subdue it : and have dominion over the fish of the sea , and over the fowl of the air , and over every living thing that moveth upon the earth .
text2: Iga fall - assan albaraka - nnet . In ̣ n ̣ - asan : « Əggəzat šin n ara təfələyləyam , təd ̣ kəram am ̣ adal , təxkəmam - tu , təxkəmam kifitan əd g ̣ ədad əd mudaran kul win ozalnen fəl am ̣ adal . »

text: And God said , Behold , I have given you every herb bearing seed , which is upon the face of all the earth , and every tree , in the which is the fruit of a tree yielding seed ; to you it shall be for meat .
text2: Təzzar in ̣ n ̣ a Məššina : « Ənəyat əkfeq - qawan yel kul itarawan fəl tasayt n am ̣ adal d ašək kul itarawan . A - dawan - əqqəlan aratan - nasan isudar .

text: And to every beast of the earth , and to every fowl of the air , and to every thing that creepeth upon the earth , wherein there is life , I have given every green herb for meat : and it was so .
text2: Y əkkulluk n əmudar fəl am ̣ adal d əkkulluk n əg ̣ ədid d əkkulluk n a wa illo ́ men am ̣ adal əhan - tu m ̣ an , əkfeq - qu yel ad - as - iqqəl isudar . » Ig ' a wen da .

text: And God saw every thing that he had made , and , behold , it was very good . And the evening and the morning were the sixth day .
text2: Təzzar inay Məššina as arat wa iga da , kul ikna əlluɣ . Ig ' ahad təga tifawt , ig ' əzəl wa n s ̣ ədis .

text: Thus the heavens and the earth were finished , and all the host of them .
text2: Təməwit ta da as əkkəsawan jənnawan əd m ̣ ədlan d arat kul wa tan ihan .

text: And on the seventh day God ended his work which he had made ; and he rested on the seventh day from all his work which he had made .
text2: Əzəl wa n əs ̣ s ̣ a əššəɣəl wa iga Məššina kul ikkisaw , təzzar iɣrad - tu daɣ - as .

text: And God blessed the seventh day , and sanctified it : because that in it he had rested from all his work which God created and made .
text2: Iga Məššina albaraka - nnet fəl əzəl wa n əs ̣ s ̣ a , izzəzwar - tu fəlas əzəl wa da ad daɣ iɣrad əššəɣəl n əxluk kul wa iga .

text: These are the generations of the heavens and of the earth when they were created , in the day that the LORD God made the earth and the heavens ,
text2: Ələsəl wa n jənnawan d am ̣ adal ənta da as d - ətawaxlakan . As d - iga Əməli Məššina am ̣ adal əd jənnawan

text: And every plant of the field before it was in the earth , and every herb of the field before it grew : for the LORD God had not caused it to rain upon the earth , and there was not a man to till the ground .
text2: wər tu təlla təfsəq waliyyat za wər ig ̣ med yel harwa fəl am ̣ adal . Fəlas Əməli Məššina wər d - issofay akonak fəl am ̣ adal , amaran ənta da wər t - illa awedan waliyyan igyakan am ̣ adal .

text: But there went up a mist from the earth , and watered the whole face of the ground .
text2: Təzzar təg ̣ mad - du šat ̣ n am ̣ an am ̣ adal , təssəbdag tesayt n am ̣ adal .

text: And the LORD God formed man of the dust of the ground , and breathed into his nostrils the breath of life ; and man became a living soul .
text2: Ixlak - du Əməli Məššina aggadəm daɣ əg ̣ odrar n am ̣ adal issəwad daɣ šinjar - net in ̣ fas wa n təməddurt , təzzar iqqal aggadəm taxlək əhan m ̣ an .

text: And the LORD God planted a garden eastward in Eden ; and there he put the man whom he had formed .
text2: Dəffər a di ig ' Əməli Məššina əgoras daɣ akal n Edan fəl aganna wa n dənnəg issəns ̣ a daɣ - as aggadəm wa dd - ixlak da .

text: And out of the ground made the LORD God to grow every tree that is pleasant to the sight , and good for food ; the tree of life also in the midst of the garden , and the tree of knowledge of good and evil .
text2: Əməli Məššina issədwal - du daɣ am ̣ adal irawan n eškan kul əhossaynen as əzodan aratan - nasan əs tat ̣ t ̣ ay , issədwal - du ənta da ašək wa n təməddurt daɣ am ̣ m ̣ as n əgoras , d ašək wa n mas ̣ nat n a wa olaɣan d iba - nnet .

text: And a river went out of Eden to water the garden ; and from thence it was parted , and became into four heads .
text2: Ig ̣ mad - d ' agarew akal wa n Edan fəl ad - aššašəw əgoras . Den da ad - imməzzay agarew iqqal əkkoz d ̣ aran .

text: The name of the first is Pison : that is it which compasseth the whole land of Havilah , where there is gold ;
text2: Ad ̣ ar w ' azzaran es ̣ əm - net Fišon , ənta a dd - iɣlayan akal kul wa n Hawila , akal wa iha urəɣ ,

text: And the gold of that land is good : there is bdellium and the onyx stone .
text2: urəɣ im ̣ osan wa iqqətasan . Akal wen ətawagrawan daɣ - as ad ̣ utan əzodnen əlanen ələsəl as itawan ̣ n ̣ u Bədola , tolas əhanat - tu təhun əntanatay da əlanen ələsəl as itawan ̣ n ̣ u Šoham .

text: And the name of the second river is Gihon : the same is it that compasseth the whole land of Ethiopia .
text2: Es ̣ əm n ad ̣ ar wa n əššin Gihon , ənta a dd - iɣlayan akal wa n Kuš ket - net .

text: And the name of the third river is Hiddekel : that is it which goeth toward the east of Assyria . And the fourth river is Euphrates .
text2: Es ̣ əm n ad ̣ ar wa n karad Hiddekəl , ənta a dd - ingayan daɣ dənnəg n akal n Aššur . Ad ̣ ar wa n əkkoz es ̣ əm - net Fərat .

text: And the LORD God took the man , and put him into the garden of Eden to dress it and to keep it .
text2: Idkal Əməli Məššina aggadəm , ig - ay daɣ əgoras wa n Edan fəl a dər - əs annat ̣ t ̣ af , is ̣ s ̣ ən daɣ - as .

text: And the LORD God commanded the man , saying , Of every tree of the garden thou mayest freely eat :
text2: Təzzar ig ' Əməli Məššina y aggadəm tarɣəmt təm ̣ osat as das in ̣ n ̣ a : « Təle turagat ən tat ̣ t ̣ ay n aratan n eškan kul win n əgoras .

text: But of the tree of the knowledge of good and evil , thou shalt not eat of it : for in the day that thou eatest thereof thou shalt surely die .
text2: Mišan ad - wər - tatša aratan n ašək wa n mas ̣ nat n a wa olaɣan d iba - nnet , fəlas as tan - tətšeɣ illikan as a kay iba . »

text: And the LORD God said , It is not good that the man should be alone ; I will make him an help meet for him .
text2: In ̣ n ̣ a Əməli Məššina : « Wər oleɣ ad im ̣ os aggadəm ɣas - net ad - as - aga tadhəlt a dər inihagga . »

text: And out of the ground the LORD God formed every beast of the field , and every fowl of the air ; and brought them unto Adam to see what he would call them : and whatsoever Adam called every living creature , that was the name thereof .
text2: Ixlak - du Əməli Məššina daɣ am ̣ adal imudaran kul win ozalnen fəl am ̣ adal əd g ̣ ədad kul . Iwat - tan - du s aggadəm ad - inəy Əməli Məššina ma əm ̣ osan əs ̣ mawan win dasan z - agu . Təzzar iqqal as is ̣ mawan win ig ' aggadəm i mudaran , əntanay a tan əwarnen .

text: And Adam gave names to all cattle , and to the fowl of the air , and to every beast of the field ; but for Adam there was not found an help meet for him .
text2: Ig ' aggadəm is ̣ mawan i hərwan əd g ̣ ədad əd wəxsan kul , mišan wər ɣur - əs ig ' as , ənta aggadəm , igraw tadhəlt a dər inihagga .

text: And the LORD God caused a deep sleep to fall upon Adam and he slept : and he took one of his ribs , and closed up the flesh instead thereof ;
text2: Təzzar isat ̣ t ̣ armas - tu Əməli Məššina iket an et ̣ əs . Daɣ amazay wa d ins ̣ a da ikkas - du iyyan daɣ ɣərdəššan - net issoɣal is ̣ an n alam təməwit - nasan .

text: And the rib , which the LORD God had taken from man , made he a woman , and brought her unto the man .
text2: Ixlak - du Əməli Məššina tant ̣ ut daɣ əɣərdes wa dd - ikkas daɣ aggadəm da , eway - tat - du sər - əs .

text: And Adam said , This is now bone of my bones , and flesh of my flesh : she shall be called Woman , because she was taken out of Man .
text2: Təzzar in ̣ n ̣ a aggadəm : « Ənta da ta təm ̣ osat eɣas ən ɣasan - in elam n alam - in . Ənt ' as z - itawan ̣ n ̣ u tant ̣ ut fəl - as aləs a daɣ du - tətawakkas . »

text: Therefore shall a man leave his father and his mother , and shall cleave unto his wife : and they shall be one flesh .
text2: A di da a fəlas aləs ad - ifəl ehan ən šis əd m ̣ as , irtəy əd tənt ̣ ut - net , əqqəlan elam iyyanda .

text: And they were both naked , the man and his wife , and were not ashamed .
text2: Aləs əd tənt ̣ ut ket - nasan əxizamzaman , eges wər tan tətibəz takarakit .

text: Now the serpent was more subtil than any beast of the field which the LORD God had made . And he said unto the woman , Yea , hath God said , Ye shall not eat of every tree of the garden ?
text2: Təməlult togar imudaran kul win n am ̣ adal , win d - ixlak Əməli Məššina mas ̣ nat ən təkərras . Tən ̣ n ̣ a i tənt ̣ ut : « Tidət as in ̣ n ̣ a Məššina : < ad - wər - tatšim aratan n eškan kul win n əgoras a ? > »

text: And the woman said unto the serpent , We may eat of the fruit of the trees of the garden :
text2: Tən ̣ n ̣ a tənt ̣ ut i təməlult : « Tidət as nət ̣ attu aratan n eškan n afarag

text: But of the fruit of the tree which is in the midst of the garden , God hath said , Ye shall not eat of it , neither shall ye touch it , lest ye die .
text2: mišan wər nət ̣ əttu arat ̣ an n ašək wa ihan am ̣ m ̣ as n afarag fəlas Məššina a dana in ̣ n ̣ an : " A tan wər tatšim za wala təd ̣ əsam - tan as iga a di a - kawan - iba . " »

text: And the serpent said unto the woman , Ye shall not surely die :
text2: Təzzar tən ̣ n ̣ a təməlult i tənt ̣ ut : « illikan as wər za tam ̣ m ̣ atim .

text: For God doth know that in the day ye eat thereof , then your eyes shall be opened , and ye shall be as gods , knowing good and evil .
text2: Mišan Məššina is ̣ s ̣ an as as tan tətšam šit ̣ t ̣ awen - nawan ad - annalamnat , amaran təqqəlam šilat - net , təs ̣ s ̣ ənam arat wa olaɣan d iba - nnet . »

text: And when the woman saw that the tree was good for food , and that it was pleasant to the eyes , and a tree to be desired to make one wise , she took of the fruit thereof , and did eat , and gave also unto her husband with her ; and he did eat .
text2: Tant ̣ ut tənay aratan n ašək a əssiglaban əs tat ̣ t ̣ ay , əhossayan daɣ an ̣ ay , amaran olan d as əhakkin tayttay , təzzar təkkas - du iyyan daɣ - san , tətš - ay təkfa daɣ - as aləs - net a dər - əs iddewan da itš - ay ənta da .

text: And the eyes of them both were opened , and they knew that they were naked ; and they sewed fig leaves together , and made themselves aprons .
text2: Ənnolamnat šit ̣ t ̣ awen - nasan , əgran - in as əxizamzaman , təzzar ad əsaman ̣ ayan ifərkak zawwarnen n ašək igan es ̣ əm təhena , əlassin - tan .

text: And they heard the voice of the LORD God walking in the garden in the cool of the day : and Adam and his wife hid themselves from the presence of the LORD God amongst the trees of the garden .
text2: Dəffər a di əslan y əm ̣ ətəkwəy n Əməli Məššina daɣ alwaq ən t ̣ akəst s ̣ əmmidat , itaway d afarag , ad - ilaqqas aləs ənta əd tənt ̣ ut - net y Əməli Məššina daɣ eškan n əgoras .

text: And the LORD God called unto Adam , and said unto him , Where art thou ?
text2: Iɣra Əməli Məššina aləs in ̣ n ̣ - as : « Məni kay ? »

text: And he said , I heard thy voice in the garden , and I was afraid , because I was naked ; and I hid myself .
text2: Ijjəwwab in ̣ n ̣ - as : « Tesalay a dak - əgeɣ daɣ əgoras təggaz - i t ̣ asa fəlas əxəzəmzəm a əgeɣ , amaran a dak - laqqasa . »

text: And he said , Who told thee that thou wast naked ? Hast thou eaten of the tree , whereof I commanded thee that thou shouldest not eat ?
text2: In ̣ n ̣ - as Əməli Məššina : « Ma dak - in ̣ n ̣ an təxizamzama ? Meqqal ara n ašək w ' as dak ərɣama fəl tat ̣ t ̣ ay - nnet a tətše ? »

text: And the man said , The woman whom thou gavest to be with me , she gave me of the tree , and I did eat .
text2: Ijjəwwab - as aləs in ̣ n ̣ - as : « Tant ̣ ut ta a ɣur - i təgeɣ da ənta a di təkfat ara n ašək wa ətšeq - qu . »

text: And the LORD God said unto the woman , What is this that thou hast done ? And the woman said , The serpent beguiled me , and I did eat .
text2: Təzzar in ̣ n ̣ a Əməli Məššina i tənt ̣ ut : « Ma fel tətagga arat wa ? » Təjjəwwab - as tənt ̣ ut tən ̣ n ̣ - as : « Təməlult a di təssəxrakat təzzar ətšeq - qu . »

text: And the LORD God said unto the serpent , Because thou hast done this , thou art cursed above all cattle , and above every beast of the field ; upon thy belly shalt thou go , and dust shalt thou eat all the days of thy life :
text2: In ̣ n ̣ a Əməli Məššina i təməlult : « Azzama təgeɣ a di ad - tətəwəlɣəna daɣ mudaran win n am ̣ adal ket - nasan ad - tətijəwənkeɣ əs tədist - nam ad - tət ̣ atta əg ̣ odrar faw daɣ təɣrəst - nam ,

text: And I will put enmity between thee and the woman , and between thy seed and her seed ; it shall bruise thy head , and thou shalt bruise his heel .
text2: a - kam - əzənnəməgzəra əd tənt ̣ ut , əzənnəməgzəra əzzurriya - nnakmat , ad - ilakkaš əzzurriya ən tənt ̣ ut eɣaf - nam , kam ad - təddadaɣ erəz - net . »

text: Unto the woman he said , I will greatly multiply thy sorrow and thy conception ; in sorrow thou shalt bring forth children ; and thy desire shall be to thy husband , and he shall rule over thee .
text2: Amaran tant ̣ ut in ̣ n ̣ - as : « Ad - am - əšata an ̣ ay n ark - an ̣ ay ɣur igi - nnam tadist , azzawat - am iguz n əmzur . Wər za - tileɣ am ̣ adammad ar wa n aləs - nam eges ənta a kam z - ixkəman . »

text: And unto Adam he said , Because thou hast hearkened unto the voice of thy wife , and hast eaten of the tree , of which I commanded thee , saying , Thou shalt not eat of it : cursed is the ground for thy sake ; in sorrow shalt thou eat of it all the days of thy life ;
text2: Amaran in ̣ n ̣ a y Adəm : « Azzama təs ̣ s ̣ əsama y awal ən tənt ̣ ut - nak tətšeɣ ašək w ' as dak ərɣama fəl tat ̣ t ̣ ay - nnet , wədi am ̣ adal a - tu - təwər tulɣant fəl əddəlil - nak . Kundaba tənayaɣ ark - an ̣ ay daɣ əššəɣəl as za - təgrəwa daɣ am ̣ adal isudar - nak iket təddara .

text: Thorns also and thistles shall it bring forth to thee ; and thou shalt eat the herb of the field ;
text2: Ad - ak - d - issəg ̣ məd išənnanan əd lattan wər təha tən ̣ fa , ilattan win təwəgas a - tan - tətat ̣ t ̣ a .

text: In the sweat of thy face shalt thou eat bread , till thou return unto the ground ; for out of it wast thou taken : for dust thou art , and unto dust shalt thou return .
text2: Kundaba tərsaka tarraft - nak as za təgrəwaɣ isudar iket wər təqqela am ̣ adal wa daɣ du - təxlaka , fəlas kay wər təm ̣ os ̣ a ar əg ̣ odrar amaran tələsaq - qu tewaɣlay . »

text: And Adam called his wife ' s name Eve ; because she was the mother of all living .
text2: Iga aləs i tənt ̣ ut es ̣ əm Xawa fəlas ənta a təm ̣ osat anna n aytedan kul .

text: Unto Adam also and to his wife did the LORD God make coats of skins , and clothed them .
text2: Amaran ig ' Əməli Məššina y Adəm əd tənt ̣ ut - net isəlsa daɣ agašek .

text: And the LORD God said , Behold , the man is become as one of us , to know good and evil : and now , lest he put forth his hand , and take also of the tree of life , and eat , and live for ever :
text2: In ̣ n ̣ a Əməli Məššina : « Azzama aggadəm itša ara n ašək wa n mas ̣ nat iqqal šilat n iyyan daɣ - na , is ̣ s ̣ an a wa olaɣan d a wa wər noleɣ , wədi əgdəlatana y as tet ̣ t ̣ ay n aratan n ašək wa n təməddurt ənta da , fəlas as tan - itša ad - iɣləl har faw .

text: Therefore the LORD God sent him forth from the garden of Eden , to till the ground from whence he was taken .
text2: Təzzar ikkas - tu Əməli Məššina daɣ əgoras wa ihan akal wa n Edan fəl ad - igyək am ̣ adal wa daɣ d - itawaxlak .

text: So he drove out the man ; and he placed at the east of the garden of Eden Cherubims , and a flaming sword which turned every way , to keep the way of the tree of life .
text2: As itawastaɣ aggadəm daɣ əgoras wa n Edan ig ' Əməli Məššina angalosan as itawan ̣ n ̣ u kəruban daɣ dənnəg n əgoras og ̣ azan - tu , əntanay əd takoba tətaggit əbələzbələz an tamsay , tətiɣələyɣələyat im ̣ an - net . Əwaɣan tarrayt ta təkkat ašək wa n təməddurt .

text: And Adam knew Eve his wife ; and she conceived , and bare Cain , and said , I have gotten a man from the LORD .
text2: Inamans ̣ a Adəm əd Xawa taɣur - əs , təga tadist , teraw - du Kayin . Tən ̣ n ̣ a : « Əgrawa aləs əs tədhəlt n Əməli . »

text: And she again bare his brother Abel . And Abel was a keeper of sheep , but Cain was a tiller of the ground .
text2: Dəffər a di teraw - du amad ̣ ray - net Habila . Iqqal Habila amad ̣ an ən taɣsiwen , amaran Kayin ənta əmagyak a im ̣ os .

text: And in process of time it came to pass , that Cain brought of the fruit of the ground an offering unto the LORD .
text2: As təga dəffər tamert eway - du Kayin y Əməli daɣ aratan ən tawagost - net , im ̣ os a wen tən ̣ afut .

text: And Abel , he also brought of the firstlings of his flock and of the fat thereof . And the LORD had respect unto Abel and to his offering :
text2: In ̣ kar Habila ənta da igzam maddanəs ən taɣsiwen - net win azzarnen əs təhut . Təzzar ikkas - as - du daɣ - san šiblalen šin əddəratnen eway - as - tanat - du . Iqbal Əməli Habila əd tən ̣ afut - net ,

text: But unto Cain and to his offering he had not respect . And Cain was very wroth , and his countenance fell .
text2: mišan wər iqbel Kayin əd tən ̣ afut ta nnet . Iggaz alham Kayin wəllen . Təddew - du təkenzert gər an ̣ aran - net .

text: And the LORD said unto Cain , Why art thou wroth ? and why is thy countenance fallen ?
text2: In ̣ n ̣ a Əməli i Kayin : « Wər təleɣ əddəlil s alham wala təkenzert .

text: If thou doest well , shalt thou not be accepted ? and if thou doest not well , sin lieth at the door . And unto thee shall be his desire , and thou shalt rule over him .
text2: As tətaggaɣ əmazal olaɣan illikan ətəwəqbal - nak mišan as tu - wər - tətəgga wədi abakkad iha dər - ək isəlsa , ira a sər - ək d - iggəd fəl a kay ihlək . Eges kay arn - ay . »

text: And Cain talked with Abel his brother : and it came to pass , when they were in the field , that Cain rose up against Abel his brother , and slew him .
text2: Təzzar in ̣ n ̣ a Kayin y amad ̣ ray - nnet Habila ad - akkin šiwəgas . As tanat - in os ̣ an iggad - du Kayin əs Habila , inɣ - ay .

text: And the LORD said unto Cain , Where is Abel thy brother ? And he said , I know not : Am I my brother ' s keeper ?
text2: In ̣ n ̣ a Əməli i Kayin : « Ma ig ' amad ̣ ray - nnak Habila ? » Təzzar in ̣ n ̣ a : « Wər əs ̣ s ̣ ena , wərgeɣ əmag ̣ az - net a əm ̣ osa . »

text: And he said , What hast thou done ? the voice of thy brother ' s blood crieth unto me from the ground .
text2: In ̣ n ̣ - as Əməli : « Ma fəl təgeɣ əmazal a ? Ənəy ! Tarawrawt n əzni n amad ̣ ray - nnak təga - ddu daɣ am ̣ adal har di du - tewad .

text: And now art thou cursed from the earth , which hath opened her mouth to receive thy brother ' s blood from thy hand ;
text2: Əmərədda təwar kay allaɣanat , tətiwastaɣa daɣ am ̣ adal wa fəl inɣal əzni n amad ̣ ray - nnak wa tənɣeɣ əs fassan - nak .

text: When thou tillest the ground , it shall not henceforth yield unto thee her strength ; a fugitive and a vagabond shalt thou be in the earth .
text2: Kud təgyakaɣ am ̣ adal da wər kay z - iləs tehakkay ən tən ̣ fa - nnet . Ad təqqəla amajjawankay n ənəbbennən daɣ əddənet . »

text: And Cain said unto the LORD , My punishment is greater than I can bear .
text2: In ̣ n ̣ a Kayin y Əməli : « Wər əfrega y əzuk a fall - i im ̣ os ərruzmatan n əmazal wa əge .

text: Behold , thou hast driven me out this day from the face of the earth ; and from thy face shall I be hid ; and I shall be a fugitive and a vagabond in the earth ; and it shall come to pass , that every one that findeth me shall slay me .
text2: Təstaɣaɣ - i azala fəl tasayt n am ̣ adal amaran ənamaggaga dər - ək , aba as daɣ - i təs ̣ aggada . Ad əqqəla amajjawankay n ənəbbennən daɣ əddənet amaran i di igrawan ad - i - anɣu . »

text: And the LORD said unto him , Therefore whosoever slayeth Cain , vengeance shall be taken on him sevenfold . And the LORD set a mark upon Cain , lest any finding him should kill him .
text2: In ̣ n ̣ - as Əməli : « Kala kala ar i inɣan Kayin ad - tətəwəkkəs tan ̣ n ̣ ət - net s əs ̣ s ̣ a ərruzmatan . » Təzzar ig ' Əməli asannal fəl Kayin fəl i dər - əs immən ̣ ayan wər tu - z - anɣu .

text: And Cain went out from the presence of the LORD , and dwelt in the land of Nod , on the east of Eden .
text2: Təzzar inamaggag Kayin d Əməli iɣsar daɣ akal wa n Nod daɣ dənnəg n Edan .

text: And Cain knew his wife ; and she conceived , and bare Enoch : and he builded a city , and called the name of the city , after the name of his son , Enoch .
text2: Inamans ̣ a Kayin əd taɣur - əs , təga tadist , teraw - du Xenok . Təzzar ikras Kayin aɣrəm ig - as es ̣ əm ən rur - es Xenok .

text: And unto Enoch was born Irad : and Irad begat Mehujael : and Mehujael begat Methusael : and Methusael begat Lamech .
text2: Xenok igraw barar , ig - as es ̣ əm Ɣirad , Ɣirad eraw Məxuyal , Məxuyal eraw Mətušal amaran Mətušal eraw Lamek .

text: And Lamech took unto him two wives : the name of the one was Adah , and the name of the other Zillah .
text2: Lamek iga s ̣ anatat təd ̣ oden əganen is ̣ mawan , iyyat Ɣada , tahadat Tsilla .

text: And Adah bare Jabal : he was the father of such as dwell in tents , and of such as have cattle .
text2: Ɣada teraw Yabal , ənta a im ̣ osan əmaraw ən mad ̣ anan a əɣassarnen daɣ həktan .

text: And his brother ' s name was Jubal : he was the father of all such as handle the harp and organ .
text2: Es ̣ əm n amad ̣ ray - net Yubal , ənta əmaraw ən məzzəla win əggatnen an ̣ zad əd təsənsəq .

text: And Zillah , she also bare Tubal - cain , an instructer of every artificer in brass and iron : and the sister of Tubal - cain was Naamah .
text2: Tsilla ənta da teraw Tubal - Kayin əmaraw ən n ̣ adan win əggatnen daruɣ əd t ̣ əzoli . Tamad ̣ rayt ən Tubal - Kayin es ̣ əm - net Naɣama .

text: And Lamech said unto his wives , Adah and Zillah , Hear my voice ; ye wives of Lamech , hearken unto my speech : for I have slain a man to my wounding , and a young man to my hurt .
text2: In ̣ n ̣ a Lamek i təd ̣ oden - net : « Kamatay , šid ̣ oden - in , s ̣ əsəmmat y əməsli - nin , təsəddərgənmat y awal - in , fəlas tenaɣay a əgeɣ aləs wa di isabbasan d əbi wa di iwatan .

text: If Cain shall be avenged sevenfold , truly Lamech seventy and sevenfold .
text2: Kud Kayin tətawakkas - as tan ̣ n ̣ ət s əs ̣ s ̣ ayat təməzal , nak a di tətəwəkkəs s əs ̣ s ̣ ayat təm ̣ ərwen d əs ̣ s ̣ a . »

text: And Adam knew his wife again ; and she bare a son , and called his name Seth : For God , said she , hath appointed me another seed instead of Abel , whom Cain slew .
text2: Inamans ̣ a Adəm əd taɣur - əs , teraw - du barar ən yay , təg - as es ̣ əm Set « fəlas , a tən ̣ n ̣ a , Məššina a di ikfan əzzurriya daɣ adagg ən Habila wa inɣa Kayin . »

text: And to Seth , to him also there was born a son ; and he called his name Enos : then began men to call upon the name of the LORD .
text2: Set ənta da igraw barar , ig - as es ̣ əm Enoš . Den da ad itawaggaz Əməli šin n ətəwəɣbad .

text: This is the book of the generations of Adam . In the day that God created man , in the likeness of God made he him ;
text2: Əzəl wa dd - ixlak Məššina aggadəm ig - ay - du əs tulat - net . Yay əd təntay ixlak - kan - du . Iga fall - assan albaraka - nnet amaran ig - asan es ̣ əm aytedam , əzəl wa da tan - d - ixlak . Ənta da əzzurriya n Adəm .

text: And Adam lived an hundred and thirty years , and begat a son in his own likeness , after his image ; and called his name Seth :
text2: As ig ' Adəm t ̣ emeday n awatay əd karadat təmərwen , iddar , eraw - du barar əs šaššela - nnet , təzzar ig - as es ̣ əm Set .

text: And the days of Adam after he had begotten Seth were eight hundred years : and he begat sons and daughters :
text2: Dəffər təhut ən Set , Adəm iga ət ̣ t ̣ amat t ̣ əmad n awatay , iddar , itaraw - du bararan əd təbararen .

text: And all the days that Adam lived were nine hundred and thirty years : and he died .
text2: Elan ən təɣrəst - net kul əqqalan t ̣ azayat t ̣ əmad n awatay əd karadat təm ̣ ərwen dəffər a di aba - tu .

text: And Seth lived an hundred and five years , and begat Enos :
text2: As iga Set t ̣ emeday n awatay əd s ̣ əmmos eraw - du Enoš .

text: And Seth lived after he begat Enos eight hundred and seven years , and begat sons and daughters :
text2: Dəffər təhut n Enoš , Set iga ət ̣ t ̣ amat t ̣ əmad n awatay d əs ̣ s ̣ a , iddar , itaraw - du bararan əd təbararen .

text: And all the days of Seth were nine hundred and twelve years : and he died .
text2: Elan ən təɣrəst - net kul əqqalan t ̣ azayat t ̣ əmad n awatay əd maraw d əššin , dəffər a di aba - tu .

text: And Enos lived ninety years , and begat Cainan :
text2: As ig ' Enoš t ̣ azayat təmərwen n awatay eraw - du Qenan .

text: And Enos lived after he begat Cainan eight hundred and fifteen years , and begat sons and daughters :
text2: Dəffər təhut ən Qenan , Enoš ig ' ət ̣ t ̣ amat t ̣ əmad n awatay əd maraw əd s ̣ əmmos , iddar , itaraw - du bararan əd təbararen .

text: And all the days of Enos were nine hundred and five years : and he died .
text2: Elan ən təɣrəst - net kul əqqalan t ̣ azayat t ̣ əmad n awatay əd s ̣ əmmos , dəffər a di aba - tu .

text: And Cainan lived seventy years , and begat Mahalaleel :
text2: As iga Qenan əs ̣ s ̣ ayat təmərwen n awatay eraw - du Mahalalel .

text: And Cainan lived after he begat Mahalaleel eight hundred and forty years , and begat sons and daughters :
text2: Dəffər təhut ən Mahalalel , Qenan iga ət ̣ t ̣ amat t ̣ əmad n awatay d əkkozat təm ̣ ərwen , iddar , itaraw - du bararan əd təbararen .

text: And all the days of Cainan were nine hundred and ten years : and he died .
text2: Elan ən təɣrəst - net kul əqqalan t ̣ azayat t ̣ əmad n awatay əd m ̣ araw , dəffər a di aba - tu .

text: And Mahalaleel lived sixty and five years , and begat Jared :
text2: As iga Mahalalel s ̣ ədisat təm ̣ ərwen n awatay əd s ̣ əmmos eraw - du Yared .

text: And Mahalaleel lived after he begat Jared eight hundred and thirty years , and begat sons and daughters :
text2: Dəffər təhut ən Yared , Mahalalel iga ət ̣ t ̣ amat t ̣ əmad n awatay əd karadat təmərwen , iddar , itaraw - du bararan əd təbararen .

text: And all the days of Mahalaleel were eight hundred ninety and five years : and he died .
text2: Elan ən təɣrəst - net kul əqqalan ət ̣ t ̣ amat t ̣ əm ̣ ad n awatay əd t ̣ azayat təm ̣ ərwen əd s ̣ əmmos , dəffər a di aba - tu .

text: And Jared lived an hundred sixty and two years , and he begat Enoch :
text2: As iga Yared t ̣ emeday n awatay əd s ̣ ədisat təm ̣ ərwen d əššin eraw - du Xenok .

text: And Jared lived after he begat Enoch eight hundred years , and begat sons and daughters :
text2: Dəffər təhut ən Xenok Yared iga ət ̣ t ̣ amat t ̣ əmad n awatay , iddar , itaraw - du bararan əd təbararen .

text: And all the days of Jared were nine hundred sixty and two years : and he died .
text2: Elan ən təɣrəst - net kul əqqalan t ̣ azayat t ̣ əm ̣ ad n awatay əd s ̣ ədisat təm ̣ ərwen d əššin , dəffər a di aba - tu .

text: And Enoch lived sixty and five years , and begat Methuselah :
text2: As iga Xenok s ̣ ədisat təm ̣ ərwen n awatay əd s ̣ əmmos eraw - du Mətušalax .

text: And Enoch walked with God after he begat Methuselah three hundred years , and begat sons and daughters :
text2: Dəffər təhut ən Mətušalax , Xenok iga karadat t ̣ əmad n awatay , iddar , itaraw - du bararan əd təbararen , iha tarrayt ta n Məššina .

text: And all the days of Enoch were three hundred sixty and five years :
text2: Elan ən təɣrəst - net kul əqqalan karadat t ̣ əmad n awatay əd s ̣ ədisat təm ̣ ərwen əd s ̣ əmmos .

text: And Enoch walked with God : and he was not ; for God took him .
text2: Xenok iha tarrayt ta n Məššina , dəffər a di ittənkal fəlas Məššina ad t - idkalan .

text: And Methuselah lived an hundred eighty and seven years , and begat Lamech :
text2: As iga Mətušalax t ̣ emeday n awatay d ət ̣ t ̣ amat təm ̣ ərwen d əs ̣ s ̣ a eraw - du Lamek .

text: And Methuselah lived after he begat Lamech seven hundred eighty and two years , and begat sons and daughters :
text2: Dəffər təhut ən Lamek Mətušalax ig ' əs ̣ s ̣ ayat t ̣ əmad n awatay d ət ̣ t ̣ amat təm ̣ ərwen d əššin , iddar , itaraw - du bararan əd təbararen .

text: And all the days of Methuselah were nine hundred sixty and nine years : and he died .
text2: Elan ən təɣrəst - net kul əqqalan t ̣ azayat t ̣ əmad n awatay əd s ̣ ədisat təm ̣ ərwen əd t ̣ aza , dəffər a di aba - tu .

text: And Lamech lived an hundred eighty and two years , and begat a son :
text2: As iga Lamek t ̣ emeday n awatay d ət ̣ t ̣ amat təm ̣ ərwen d əššin eraw - du barar ən yay .

text: And he called his name Noah , saying , This same shall comfort us concerning our work and toil of our hands , because of the ground which the LORD hath cursed .
text2: Ig - as es ̣ əm Nux . In ̣ n ̣ a : « Barar wa ənta a dana z - aləman fəl m ̣ an daɣ an ̣ ay n ark - an ̣ ay n əššəɣəl ən fassan - nana fəlas am ̣ adal a ilɣan Əməli . »

text: And Lamech lived after he begat Noah five hundred ninety and five years , and begat sons and daughters :
text2: Dəffər təhut ən Nux , Lamek iga s ̣ əmmosat t ̣ əmad n awatay əd t ̣ azayat təm ̣ ərwen əd s ̣ əmmos , iddar , itaraw bararan əd təbararen .

text: And all the days of Lamech were seven hundred seventy and seven years : and he died .
text2: Elan ən təɣrəst - net kul əqqalan əs ̣ s ̣ ayat t ̣ əmad n awatay d əs ̣ s ̣ ayat təm ̣ ərwen d əs ̣ s ̣ a , dəffər a di aba - tu .

text: And Noah was five hundred years old : and Noah begat Shem , Ham , and Japheth .
text2: As iga Nux s ̣ əmmosat t ̣ əmad n awatay eraw - du Šem , Xam əd Yafet .

text: And it came to pass , when men began to multiply on the face of the earth , and daughters were born unto them ,
text2: As əggazan aytedan šin n əfələyləy əwazawazan daɣ əddənet . Ənayan maddanəs ən jənnawan as šibararen šin d - əhunen daɣ - san əhossaynat amaran əsan ̣ n ̣ afranan daɣ - asnat šin oggaman əzlafan - tanat .

text: And the LORD said , My spirit shall not always strive with man , for that he also is flesh : yet his days shall be an hundred and twenty years .
text2: Təzzar in ̣ n ̣ a Əməli : « im ̣ an - in wər z - əɣsəran aytedan faw fəlas kəl əddənet a əm ̣ osan amaran wər z - ələsan təməddurt dəffər t ̣ ameday n awatay əd s ̣ anatat təm ̣ ərwen . »

text: There were giants in the earth in those days ; and also after that , when the sons of God came in unto the daughters of men , and they bare children to them , the same became mighty men which were of old , men of renown .
text2: Daɣ azzaman win əd win dəffər - san əllan - tu jobbaran daɣ əddənet ad d - ətihunen daɣ əddənet id namans ̣ an maddanəs ən jənnawan əd təbararen n aytedan . Ijobbaran win əm ̣ osan meddan ən məs ̣ s ̣ ərha n azzaman win ərunen .

text: And GOD saw that the wickedness of man was great in the earth , and that every imagination of the thoughts of his heart was only evil continually .
text2: Inay Əməli as aššar n aytedan iggət fəl am ̣ adal , amaran ən ̣ n ̣ iyat ən wallan - nasan faw wər təddig ar s arak - mazalan .

text: And it repented the LORD that he had made man on the earth , and it grieved him at his heart .
text2: Əzzuran m ̣ an n Əməli , imməg ̣ raz axluk n awedan .

text: And the LORD said , I will destroy man whom I have created from the face of the earth ; both man , and beast , and the creeping thing , and the fowls of the air ; for it repenteth me that I have made them .
text2: In ̣ n ̣ a Əməli daɣ man - net : « Ad - əməs ̣ aɣ aytedan win d - əxlaka daɣ əddənet , əməs ̣ aɣ tolas tawaqqast əd hərwan kul əd lumet - lumet əd g ̣ ədad fəlas təmag ̣ rizt a əgeɣ axluk - nasan . »

text: But Noah found grace in the eyes of the LORD .
text2: Mišan Nux ənta igraw arraxmat ɣur Əməli . ƏTTƏRIX ƏN NUX Ənta da əzzurriya ən Nux : Nux aləs n alɣadil a imos ̣ , oɣadan ɣur aytedan daɣ azzaman - net , iha tarrayt ta n Məššina . Nux eraw bararan karad : əm ̣ osnen Šem , Xam əd Yafet .

text: The earth also was corrupt before God , and the earth was filled with violence .
text2: Daɣ azzaman win , əddənet təɣšad daɣ id ̣ uf ən Məššina , təd ̣ kar tallabəst .

text: And God looked upon the earth , and , behold , it was corrupt ; for all flesh had corrupted his way upon the earth .
text2: Inay Məššina as əddənet təɣšad fəlas šixəllak kul əɣšadan alxalan - nasnat .

text: And God said unto Noah , The end of all flesh is come before me ; for the earth is filled with violence through them ; and , behold , I will destroy them with the earth .
text2: In ̣ n ̣ a Məššina i Nux : « Tilkamat ən təməddurt ən təxəllak kul a du - tos ̣ at fəlas əddənet a təd ̣ kar tallabəst fəl əddəlil n aytedan , a di da fəlas a - tan - əhləka əntanay d am ̣ adal kul .

text: Make thee an ark of gopher wood ; rooms shalt thou make in the ark , and shalt pitch it within and without with pitch .
text2: Əɣrəf i m ̣ an - nak attin iknan təzzəwwərt ad - ak - iqqəl aɣlal n am ̣ an tagaq - qu daɣ ašək igan es ̣ əm gofer əd yel as itawan ̣ n ̣ u qanim olan d afazaw , taɣmaq - qu daɣ madɣar ən kolta fəl afalla - nnet d am ̣ m ̣ as - net .

text: And this is the fashion which thou shalt make it of : The length of the ark shall be three hundred cubits , the breadth of it fifty cubits , and the height of it thirty cubits .
text2: Ənta da təməwit t ' as tu za təɣrəfa : təzzəgrət - net ad təqqəl karadat t ̣ əmad n əɣil , tasaga - nnet s ̣ əmmosat təm ̣ ərwen , amaran təzzəgrət - net s afalla karadat təm ̣ ərwen n əɣil .

text: A window shalt thou make to the ark , and in a cubit shalt thou finish it above ; and the door of the ark shalt thou set in the side thereof ; with lower , second , and third stories shalt thou make it .
text2: Səfəl - tu təzəzzəgre səmmud n afalla - nnet s əɣil , tagaɣ - as tsəhərt fəl iyyat daɣ təsəgwen - net tagaq - qu karad n ̣ an misawarnen .

text: And , behold , I , even I , do bring a flood of waters upon the earth , to destroy all flesh , wherein is the breath of life , from under heaven ; and every thing that is in the earth shall die .
text2: Amaran nak ad - in - assaglaɣ əlwabil n am ̣ an s əddənet fəl ad ihlək a təqqal təxlək təsan ̣ fasat , a wa ihan əddənet kul ad am ̣ m ̣ at .

text: But with thee will I establish my covenant ; and thou shalt come into the ark , thou , and thy sons , and thy wife , and thy sons ' wives with thee .
text2: Mišan kay ad - ak - əssəbdəda arkawal ən tas ̣ s ̣ aqq - in . Ad - təggəzaɣ attin kay əd bararan - nak əd tənt ̣ ut - nak əd təd ̣ oden ən bararan - nak .

text: And of every living thing of all flesh , two of every sort shalt thou bring into the ark , to keep them alive with thee ; they shall be male and female .
text2: Təzzugəzaɣ attin əkkulluk n əššin mudaran , yay əd təntay , daɣ əkkulluk n əzzənəf fəl ad d - ərəgan ɣur - ək əntanay da .

text: Of fowls after their kind , and of cattle after their kind , of every creeping thing of the earth after his kind , two of every sort shall come unto thee , to keep them alive .
text2: A kay d - as ̣ in mudaran kul s əššin əššin : daɣ əkkulluk n əzzənəf ən g ̣ ədad , d əkkuluk n əzzənəf ən tawaqqast əd hərwan d əkkulluk n əzzənəf ən lumet - lumet fəl ad d - ərəgan .

text: And take thou unto thee of all food that is eaten , and thou shalt gather it to thee ; and it shall be for food for thee , and for them .
text2: Amaran kay ədkəl daɣ šətša kul win ətamatšinen tagaq - qan allaw fəl a sər - san təddəram kay dər - san . »

text: Thus did Noah ; according to all that God commanded him , so did he .
text2: Aratan win kul ig - en Nux əm ̣ osan aratan win as t - omar Məššina .

text: And the LORD said unto Noah , Come thou and all thy house into the ark ; for thee have I seen righteous before me in this generation .
text2: In ̣ n ̣ a Əməli i Nux : « Əggəz attin kay d aɣaywan - nak fəlas ənayaɣ as kay ɣas a dat - i im ̣ osan aləs n alɣadil daɣ azzaman - nak .

text: Of every clean beast thou shalt take to thee by sevens , the male and his female : and of beasts that are not clean by two , the male and his female .
text2: Ədkəl yay əd təntay har əs ̣ s ̣ ayat armaten daɣ tawaqqast əd hərwan win wər nəm ̣ m ̣ ədas tədkəla yay əd təntay ɣas daɣ win əm ̣ m ̣ ədasnen .

text: Of fowls also of the air by sevens , the male and the female ; to keep seed alive upon the face of all the earth .
text2: Ig ̣ ədad əntanay da ədkəl daɣ - san yay əd təntay har əs ̣ s ̣ ayat armaten fəl ad d - irəg amasa - nnasan fəl am ̣ adal .

text: For yet seven days , and I will cause it to rain upon the earth forty days and forty nights ; and every living substance that I have made will I destroy from off the face of the earth .
text2: Fəlas ɣur əs ̣ s ̣ a ad ̣ an nak ad in - assaglaɣ akonak az z - agin əkkozat təm ̣ ərwen n əzəl , iffay ehad - ezal . Ad - əm ̣ əsaɣ fəl tasayt n am ̣ adal šixəllek kul šin əgeɣ . »

text: And Noah did according unto all that the LORD commanded him .
text2: Immozal Nux arat kul w ' as t - omar Əməli .

text: And Noah was six hundred years old when the flood of waters was upon the earth .
text2: Nux iga s ̣ ədisat t ̣ əmad n awatay as d - os ̣ a əlwabil wa əddənet .

text: And Noah went in , and his sons , and his wife , and his sons ' wives with him , into the ark , because of the waters of the flood .
text2: Iggaz Nux attin ənta əd maddan - əs əd taɣur - əs əd təd ̣ oden ən maddan - əs fəl ad ad ̣ d ̣ arragan y am ̣ an win əlwabil .

text: Of clean beasts , and of beasts that are not clean , and of fowls , and of every thing that creepeth upon the earth ,
text2: Tawaqqast əd hərwan win wər nəm ̣ m ̣ ədas əd win əm ̣ m ̣ ədasnen əd g ̣ ədad da wa illomen am ̣ adal kul ,

text: There went in two and two unto Noah into the ark , the male and the female , as God had commanded Noah .
text2: kul əkkan - du Nux əm ̣ osan əššin əššin yay əd təntay namaggazan dər - əs attin s əmmək w ' as t - omar Məššina .

text: And it came to pass after seven days , that the waters of the flood were upon the earth .
text2: Dəffər əs ̣ s ̣ a ad ̣ an , os ̣ an - du am ̣ an n əlwabil əddənet .

text: In the six hundredth year of Noah ' s life , in the second month , the seventeenth day of the month , the same day were all the fountains of the great deep broken up , and the windows of heaven were opened .
text2: Daɣ awatay wa n s ̣ ədisat t ̣ əmad ən təməddurt ən Nux , əzəl wa n m ̣ araw d əs ̣ s ̣ a ən təllit ta n s ̣ anatat , ənta ad d - əg ̣ g ̣ əzzayan am ̣ an s as ̣ s ̣ ahat daɣ s ̣ arrutan n am ̣ adal , bajaɣjaɣan - du am ̣ an win jənnawan əntanay da .

text: And the rain was upon the earth forty days and forty nights .
text2: Iffay akonak fəl am ̣ adal har iga əkkozat təm ̣ ərwen n əzəl iffay ehad - ezal .

text: In the selfsame day entered Noah , and Shem , and Ham , and Japheth , the sons of Noah , and Noah ' s wife , and the three wives of his sons with them , into the ark ;
text2: Əzəl wədi da , ad iggaz Nux attin ənta əd bararan - net Šem , Xam əd Yafet , əd taɣur - əs əd təd ̣ oden šin karadat ən bararan - net .

text: They , and every beast after his kind , and all the cattle after their kind , and every creeping thing that creepeth upon the earth after his kind , and every fowl after his kind , every bird of every sort .
text2: Iggaz - tu tolas əkkulluk n əzzənəf ən tawaqqast d əkkulluk n əzzənəf ən hərwan , d əkkulluk n əzzənəf ən lumət - lumət əllomatnen am ̣ adal , d əkkulluk n əzzənəf ən g ̣ ədad əd maggadan kul .

text: And they went in unto Noah into the ark , two and two of all flesh , wherein is the breath of life .
text2: Taxlək kul as t - ad - d - əg ̣ madan əššin mudaran n əzzənəf kul əkkan - du Nux ənamaggazan dər - əs attin ,

text: And they that went in , went in male and female of all flesh , as God had commanded him : and the LORD shut him in .
text2: yay əd təntay , daɣ əzzənəf kul as əggəzan attin s əmmək as omar Məššina Nux . Təzzar ihar - in fall - as Əməli attin .

text: And the flood was forty days upon the earth ; and the waters increased , and bare up the ark , and it was lift up above the earth .
text2: Ig ' əlwabil əkkozat təm ̣ ərwen n əzəl iffay fəl am ̣ adal . Am ̣ an əg ̣ g ̣ əzzayan əsaddakalan attin .

text: And the waters prevailed , and were increased greatly upon the earth ; and the ark went upon the face of the waters .
text2: Əttəyan am ̣ an , əg ̣ g ̣ əzzayan wəllen , əbbatan attin , izagaylal fall - assan .

text: And the waters prevailed exceedingly upon the earth ; and all the high hills , that were under the whole heaven , were covered .
text2: Əssəfalan d am ̣ an har əlsan idɣaɣan kul win zagrotnen fəl tasayt n am ̣ adal .

text: Fifteen cubits upward did the waters prevail ; and the mountains were covered .
text2: Əlmazan - tan har tan - okayan əs m ̣ araw ɣallan əd s ̣ əmmos .

text: And all flesh died that moved upon the earth , both of fowl , and of cattle , and of beast , and of every creeping thing that creepeth upon the earth , and every man :
text2: I tu - təlla təxlək təddarat fəl am ̣ adal , kul təm ̣ m ̣ ut : ig ̣ ədad , ihərwan , iwəxsan , idəmərdəmaran d aytedan win wašankalnen fəl am ̣ adal .

text: All in whose nostrils was the breath of life , of all that was in the dry land , died .
text2: A wa daɣ izgar in ̣ fas fəl azzahir n am ̣ adal kul im ̣ m ̣ ut .

text: And every living substance was destroyed which was upon the face of the ground , both man , and cattle , and the creeping things , and the fowl of the heaven ; and they were destroyed from the earth : and Noah only remained alive , and they that were with him in the ark .
text2: Im ̣ as Əməli a iddaran kul fəl am ̣ adal ad d - obazan ɣur aytedan har hərwan , lumət - lumət əd g ̣ ədad , kul ətawam ̣ asan fəl am ̣ adal Nux ɣas ad d - iqqiman ənta d a wa fall - as iggazan attin .

text: And the waters prevailed upon the earth an hundred and fifty days .
text2: Igət n am ̣ an har iga t ̣ emeday n əzəl əd s ̣ əmmosat təm ̣ ərwen wər ifnez .

text: And God remembered Noah , and every living thing , and all the cattle that was with him in the ark : and God made a wind to pass over the earth , and the waters asswaged ;
text2: Ikta - ddu Məššina Nux əd mudaran kul win dər - əs ənamahanen attin . Təzzar issəgar - du Məššina ad ̣ u fəl am ̣ adal , əggazan am ̣ an šin təlkit .

text: The fountains also of the deep and the windows of heaven were stopped , and the rain from heaven was restrained ;
text2: Əzzəkken am ̣ an win s ̣ arrutan n am ̣ adal əd win jənnawan . Iffəsta akonak .

text: And the waters returned from off the earth continually : and after the end of the hundred and fifty days the waters were abated .
text2: Dəffər t ̣ ameday n əzəl əd s ̣ əmmosat təm ̣ ərwen əggazan am ̣ an šin n afanaz . Ad s ̣ attakan am ̣ an s a ənd ̣ ərran a ənd ̣ ərran fəl am ̣ adal .

text: And the ark rested in the seventh month , on the seventeenth day of the month , upon the mountains of Ararat .
text2: Immədgar attin gər ədɣaɣan win n Ararat əzəl wa n m ̣ araw d əs ̣ s ̣ a daɣ təllit ta n əs ̣ s ̣ ayat .

text: And the waters decreased continually until the tenth month : in the tenth month , on the first day of the month , were the tops of the mountains seen .
text2: Ad əfannazan am ̣ an har təllit ta n m ̣ arawat . Əzəl w ' azzaran ən təllit ta ənta ad - d - ənafalalan mawan n ədɣaɣan .

text: And it came to pass at the end of forty days , that Noah opened the window of the ark which he had made :
text2: As əganat əkkozat təm ̣ ərwen n əzəl olam Nux təxərəbbet ta iga daɣ attin ,

text: And he sent forth a raven , which went forth to and fro , until the waters were dried up from off the earth .
text2: issəgla aɣrut , igallan itaqqal - du har əs ̣ takan am ̣ an fəl am ̣ adal .

text: Also he sent forth a dove from him , to see if the waters were abated from off the face of the ground ;
text2: Təzzar issəgla tadabert fəl ad - is ̣ s ̣ ən kud am ̣ an əfnazan fəl tasayt n am ̣ adal wala .

text: But the dove found no rest for the sole of her foot , and she returned unto him into the ark , for the waters were on the face of the whole earth : then he put forth his hand , and took her , and pulled her in unto him into the ark .
text2: Mišan tadabert ta abas id təssəns ̣ a ad ̣ ar - net , təqqal - du Nux daɣ attin fəlas am ̣ adal kul as t - əlsan am ̣ an . Izzal - in əfus - net ibaz - tat izzogaz - tat - du attin .

text: And he stayed yet other seven days ; and again he sent forth the dove out of the ark ;
text2: Iqqim as ilas igi n əs ̣ s ̣ a ad ̣ an , ilas - tat ikus daɣ attin issəgl - et .

text: And the dove came in to him in the evening ; and , lo , in her mouth was an olive leaf pluckt off : so Noah knew that the waters were abated from off the earth .
text2: As təga t ̣ akəst gəzzulat təqqal - t - idu tədad ala ibdagan ən zaytun , is ̣ s ̣ an Nux amaran as am ̣ an əfnazan fəl am ̣ adal .

text: And he stayed yet other seven days ; and sent forth the dove ; which returned not again unto him any more .
text2: Iqqim tolas as iga əs ̣ s ̣ a ad ̣ an iyyad ̣ ilas - du təyya ən tadabert . Mišan wər t - in - təles tewaɣlay .

text: And it came to pass in the six hundredth and first year , in the first month , the first day of the month , the waters were dried up from off the earth : and Noah removed the covering of the ark , and looked , and , behold , the face of the ground was dry .
text2: Daɣ əzəl wa zzaran ən təllit ta n iyyat n awatay wa n s ̣ ədisat t ̣ əmad d iyyan ən təməddurt ən Nux əɣradan am ̣ an as ̣ atak fəl əddənet . Təzzar olam Nux təxərəbbet ta n afalla n attin , is ̣ wad inay amaran as am ̣ adal iggaz šin taɣart .

text: And in the second month , on the seven and twentieth day of the month , was the earth dried .
text2: As ig ' əzəl wa n s ̣ anatat təm ̣ ərwen d əs ̣ s ̣ a daɣ təllit ta n s ̣ anatat iqqur am ̣ adal .

text: And God spake unto Noah , saying ,
text2: Təzzar iššewal Məššina i Nux in ̣ n ̣ - as :

text: Go forth of the ark , thou , and thy wife , and thy sons , and thy sons ' wives with thee .
text2: « Əg ̣ məd attin kay əd tənt ̣ ut - nak əd bararan - nak əd təd ̣ oden ən bararan - nak .

text: Bring forth with thee every living thing that is with thee , of all flesh , both of fowl , and of cattle , and of every creeping thing that creepeth upon the earth ; that they may breed abundantly in the earth , and be fruitful , and multiply upon the earth .
text2: Təkkəsa - du imudaran kul win dər - ək ənamahanen attin , əganen daɣ əzzənəf kul ən g ̣ ədad əd hərwan əd tawaqqast əd lumət - lumət , əggəzanet šin n ara , fələyləyanet daɣ əddənet , wəšənkəlanet . »

text: And Noah went forth , and his sons , and his wife , and his sons ' wives with him :
text2: Ig ̣ mad - du Nux ənta harkid bararan - net əd tənt ̣ ut - net əd təd ̣ oden ən bararan - net .

text: Every beast , every creeping thing , and every fowl , and whatsoever creepeth upon the earth , after their kinds , went forth out of the ark .
text2: Imudaran , lumət - lumət , ig ̣ ədad , d a wa illomen am ̣ adal kul , əntanay da əg ̣ madan - t - idu irawan əs rawan .

text: And Noah builded an altar unto the LORD ; and took of every clean beast , and of every clean fowl , and offered burnt offerings on the altar .
text2: Ikras Nux edagg ən təkutay y Əməli , obaz - du daɣ mudaran kul win wər nəm ̣ m ̣ əd ̣ as əd g ̣ ədad kul win wər nəm ̣ m ̣ ədas , igzam - tan , ikway - tan fəl adag wa ikras da , ig - en takut ̣ ay y Əməli .

text: And the LORD smelled a sweet savour ; and the LORD said in his heart , I will not again curse the ground any more for man ' s sake ; for the imagination of man ' s heart is evil from his youth ; neither will I again smite any more every thing living , as I have done .
text2: Iwat Əməli aɣas wa , oggam - tu . Təzzar in ̣ n ̣ a daɣ m ̣ an - net har faw wər z - ələsa əsəwər n am ̣ adal tulɣant fəl əddəlil n awedan fəlas tədag ən ̣ n ̣ iyat - net s arak - mazalam ɣur təmməd ̣ rəyt har faw , amaran wər z - ələsa ahluk ən təxlək təddarat a təqqal šilat n a wa əge da .

text: While the earth remaineth , seedtime and harvest , and cold and heat , and summer and winter , and day and night shall not cease .
text2: Iket əddənet təllay ətaggin n ̣ abalan d allayan d as ̣ amed əd tuks ̣ ay d awelan əd təgrəst d ahad d azal .

text: And God blessed Noah and his sons , and said unto them , Be fruitful , and multiply , and replenish the earth .
text2: Iga Məššina albaraka fəl Nux əd maddan - əs amaran in ̣ n ̣ - asan : « Əggəzat šin n ara təfələyləyam təd ̣ kəram amad ̣ al .

text: And the fear of you and the dread of you shall be upon every beast of the earth , and upon every fowl of the air , upon all that moveth upon the earth , and upon all the fishes of the sea ; into your hand are they delivered .
text2: Tawaqqast əd hərwan əd g ̣ ədad əd lumət - lumət , əd kifitan əntanay kul a tan təggəz t ̣ asa - nnawan , iksadan - kawan , təggəz tan ̣ at - nasan ifassan - nawan .

text: Every moving thing that liveth shall be meat for you ; even as the green herb have I given you all things .
text2: A wa iddaran itimət ̣ əkwəy kul ad - awan - iqqəl išətša . Əkfeɣ - awan - tan kul zun d əmmək as kawan əkfeɣ ilattan ən təwəgas .

text: But flesh with the life thereof , which is the blood thereof , shall ye not eat .
text2: Mišan ad wər tət ̣ attim is ̣ an iha əzni a əm ̣ osnen is ̣ an wər əg ̣ medan m ̣ an .

text: And surely your blood of your lives will I require ; at the hand of every beast will I require it , and at the hand of man ; at the hand of every man ' s brother will I require the life of man .
text2: Azzama azni - nnawan ənta təməddurt - nawan wədi əs ̣ s ̣ ənat as a - dər - əs - əs ̣ s ̣ əstana a iqqal wa igan im ̣ an - nawan , gər z - iqqal əmudar wala awedan . Ad - əssəs ̣ təna awedan iqqal əd m ̣ an n əmidi - nnet win iga .

text: Whoso sheddeth man ' s blood , by man shall his blood be shed : for in the image of God made he man .
text2: I inɣalan azni n awedan , ad - inɣəl awedan azni - nnet fəlas awedan šaššela ən Məššina as du - itawaxlak .

text: And you , be ye fruitful , and multiply ; bring forth abundantly in the earth , and multiply therein .
text2: Amaran əggəzat šin n ara , təfələyləyam , təwəšənkəlam fəl am ̣ adal , təwəziwəzam fall - as . »

text: And God spake unto Noah , and to his sons with him , saying ,
text2: In ̣ n ̣ a Məššina tolas i Nux əd maddan - əs :

text: And I , behold , I establish my covenant with you , and with your seed after you ;
text2: « Ad - awan - əssəbdəda arkawal ən tas ̣ s ̣ aqq - in dər - wan kawanay d əzzurriya - nnawan

text: And with every living creature that is with you , of the fowl , of the cattle , and of every beast of the earth with you ; from all that go out of the ark , to every beast of the earth .
text2: əd mudaran kul win dər - wan əddəwnen : ig ̣ ədad , ihərwan , tawaqqast əd lumet - lumet , əm ̣ osnen imudaran kul win dər du - tənnəg ̣ madam attin əm ̣ osnen win tu z - əməlnen daɣ əddənet .

text: And I will establish my covenant with you ; neither shall all flesh be cut off any more by the waters of a flood ; neither shall there any more be a flood to destroy the earth .
text2: A - dawan - əssəbdəda arkawal ən tas ̣ s ̣ aqq - in dər - wan : wər za tələs təxlək a təqqal ahluk s am ̣ an n əlwabil . Wər du - z - iləs əlwabil ihlakan əddənet as ̣ s ̣ a . »

text: And God said , This is the token of the covenant which I make between me and you and every living creature that is with you , for perpetual generations :
text2: Ilas in ̣ n ̣ a : « Ənta da asannal n arkawal ən tas ̣ s ̣ aq ta dər - wan z - aga kawanay əd təxəllak kul šin əddarnen a ɣur - wan əllanen daɣ azzaman kul win d - əzaynen .

text: I do set my bow in the cloud , and it shall be for a token of a covenant between me and the earth .
text2: Ad aga təzzəladar daɣ jənnawan ad təqqəl asannal n arkawal ən tas ̣ s ̣ aqq - in d əddənet .

text: And it shall come to pass , when I bring a cloud over the earth , that the bow shall be seen in the cloud :
text2: Id d - əšammašadawa šignawen fəl afalla n əddənet tənafalal - du təzzəladar daɣ - asnat

text: And I will remember my covenant , which is between me and you and every living creature of all flesh ; and the waters shall no more become a flood to destroy all flesh .
text2: ad - d - aktaɣ arkawal ən tas ̣ s ̣ aqq - in dər - wan , kawanay əd təxəllak kul šin əddarnen , amaran har faw wər tu - z - iləs əlwabil ihlakan šixəllak kul emel .

text: And the bow shall be in the cloud ; and I will look upon it , that I may remember the everlasting covenant between God and every living creature of all flesh that is upon the earth .
text2: I du - tənafalal təzzəladar daɣ təgnawen a daɣ - as əs ̣ wəda fəl ad - d - aktaɣ arkawal iɣlalan ən tas ̣ s ̣ aqq - in nak əd təxəllak kul daɣ əddənet . »

text: And God said unto Noah , This is the token of the covenant , which I have established between me and all flesh that is upon the earth .
text2: In ̣ n ̣ a Məššina tolas i Nux : « Ənta da asannal n arkawal ən tas ̣ s ̣ aqq - in əd təxlək kul təddarat daɣ əddənet . »

text: And the sons of Noah , that went forth of the ark , were Shem , and Ham , and Japheth : and Ham is the father of Canaan .
text2: Bararan ən Nux win d əg ̣ madnen attin əm ̣ osan Šem , Xam əd Yafet . Xam ənta erawan Kanan .

text: These are the three sons of Noah : and of them was the whole earth overspread .
text2: Bararan a ən karad a ən Nux əntanay imarwan n aytedan kul daɣ əddənet .

text: And Noah began to be an husbandman , and he planted a vineyard :
text2: Nux əmagayak a im ̣ os , iggaz šin n an ̣ abal n eškan win as itagg esmad daɣ aratan - nasan .

text: And he drank of the wine , and was drunken ; and he was uncovered within his tent .
text2: Išwa esmad , imməswad , əfalan - tu səlsa - nnet , izalallat izzaf daɣ ahaket - net .

text: And Ham , the father of Canaan , saw the nakedness of his father , and told his two brethren without .
text2: Xam , a erawan Kanan , as inay šis izzaf igla imal i məqqaran - net win n əššin .

text: And Shem and Japheth took a garment , and laid it upon both their shoulders , and went backward , and covered the nakedness of their father ; and their faces were backward , and they saw not their father ' s nakedness .
text2: Təzzar idkal Šem əd Yafet afər əssəwaran - tu izeran - nasan ad zankazan dəffər - san har əssəlsan izuf ən ši - ssan , mišan wər t - ənayan fəlas əssidagan as ̣ awad - nasan s as wər illa .

text: And Noah awoke from his wine , and knew what his younger son had done unto him .
text2: As d - ila Nux iggi dəffər əməswəd is ̣ s ̣ an daɣ arat wa das iga barar - net wa ənd ̣ ərran , Xam .

text: And he said , Cursed be Canaan ; a servant of servants shall he be unto his brethren .
text2: Təzzar in ̣ n ̣ a Nux : « Təwar allaɣanat Kanan , ad - iqqəl akli wa irasan daɣ eklan ən məqqaran - net . »

text: And he said , Blessed be the LORD God of Shem ; and Canaan shall be his servant .
text2: In ̣ n ̣ a tolas : « Idkal Əməli , Məššina wa n Šem ! Amaran iqqəlet Kanan akli ən Šem . »

text: God shall enlarge Japheth , and he shall dwell in the tents of Shem ; and Canaan shall be his servant .
text2: Isənnəfləyet Məššina Yafet , ahharaget əd Šem , amaran iqqəlet Kanan akli ən Yafet . »

text: And Noah lived after the flood three hundred and fifty years .
text2: Dəffər əlwabil iga Nux karadat t ̣ əmad n awatay əd s ̣ əmmosat təm ̣ ərwen iddar .

text: And all the days of Noah were nine hundred and fifty years : and he died .
text2: Nux aba - tu dəffər as iga tazayat t ̣ əmad n awatay əd s ̣ əmmosat təm ̣ ərwen .

text: Now these are the generations of the sons of Noah , Shem , Ham , and Japheth : and unto them were sons born after the flood .
text2: Ənta da əzzurriya ən bararan ən Nux : Šem , Xam əd Yafet . Əntanay erawan - du bararan dəffər əlwabil .

text: The sons of Japheth ; Gomer , and Magog , and Madai , and Javan , and Tubal , and Meshech , and Tiras .
text2: Bararan win Yafet əm ̣ osan : Gomer , Magog , Maday , Yafan , Tubal , Mešek , əd Tiras .

text: And the sons of Gomer ; Ashkenaz , and Riphath , and Togarmah .
text2: Bararan win Gomer əm ̣ osan : Aškənaz , Rifat , əd Togarma .

text: And the sons of Javan ; Elishah , and Tarshish , Kittim , and Dodanim .
text2: Bararan win Yafan əm ̣ osan : Eliša , Taršiš , Kəl Kit , əd Kəl Dodan .

text: By these were the isles of the Gentiles divided in their lands ; every one after his tongue , after their families , in their nations .
text2: Əntanay ad d - əg ̣ madan aytedan win əɣassarnen gərwətlan əd t ̣ amawen ən gərwan wizawaznen daɣ kallan - nasan s awalan - nasan əd ɣawnatan - nasan əd tawšeten - nasan .

text: And the sons of Ham ; Cush , and Mizraim , and Phut , and Canaan .
text2: Bararan win Xam əm ̣ osan : Kuš , Mas ̣ ar , Fut əd Kanan .

text: And the sons of Cush ; Seba , and Havilah , and Sabtah , and Raamah , and Sabtecha : and the sons of Raamah ; Sheba , and Dedan .
text2: Bararan win Kuš əm ̣ osan : Səba , Xawila , Sabta , Rama əd Sabtəka . Bararan win Rama əm ̣ osan : Šəba əd Dədan .

text: And Cush begat Nimrod : he began to be a mighty one in the earth .
text2: Kuš eraw Nimrod ənta da . Ənta azzaran əs tišit n aməqqerəd fəl am ̣ adal .

text: He was a mighty hunter before the LORD : wherefore it is said , Even as Nimrod the mighty hunter before the LORD .
text2: Im ̣ os ənagmar iknan təla ən tanɣaw , a di da a fəl itawan ̣ n ̣ u : šilat ən Nimrod , ənagmar iknan təla ən tanɣaw .

text: And the beginning of his kingdom was Babel , and Erech , and Accad , and Calneh , in the land of Shinar .
text2: Iɣərman win daɣ issən ̣ ta taɣmar - net əm ̣ osan : Babel , Erek , Akkad , Kalne , daɣ am ̣ adal ən Šinar . Akal wen ig ̣ mad - tu əs wa n Aššur , ikras aɣrəm wa n Ninif əd wa n Rəxohot - Ir əd wa n Kalax əd wa n Resen gər Ninif əd Kalax , a əm ̣ osnen aɣrəm iyyanda iknan təzzəwwərt . Mas ̣ ar eraw Kəl Lud əd Kəl Anam əd Kəl Ləhab əd Kəl Nəftux əd Kəl Fatrus əd Kəl Kaslux ( win d əg ̣ madan Kəl Fəlist ) əd Kəl Kaftor .

text: And Canaan begat Sidon his firstborn , and Heth ,
text2: Kanan eraw Sidon aɣafadday - nnet , ilkam - as Xet .

text: And the Jebusite , and the Amorite , and the Girgasite ,
text2: Eraw tolas Kəl Yəbus , Kəl Emor ,

text: And the Hivite , and the Arkite , and the Sinite ,
text2: Kəl Girgeš , Kəl Xiwi , Kəl Arki , Kəl Sini ,

text: And the Arvadite , and the Zemarite , and the Hamathite : and afterward were the families of the Canaanites spread abroad .
text2: Kəl Arwad , Kəl Tsəmar əd Kəl Xamat . Dəffər a wen wazawaznat tawšeten šin əganen daɣ əzzurriya ən Kanan ,

text: And the border of the Canaanites was from Sidon , as thou comest to Gerar , unto Gaza ; as thou goest , unto Sodom , and Gomorrah , and Admah , and Zeboim , even unto Lasha .
text2: təzzar əbazan kallan - nasnat ɣur Sidon har Gaza daɣ anamod wa n Gərar , amaran daɣ anamod wa n Sədom əd Gamora d Adma əd Tsəboyim har Laša .

text: These are the sons of Ham , after their families , after their tongues , in their countries , and in their nations .
text2: Əntanay da da bararan win Xam əzunnen əs tawšeten - nasan d awalan - nasan daɣ kallan - nasan əd ɣərfan - nasan .

text: Unto Shem also , the father of all the children of Eber , the brother of Japheth the elder , even to him were children born .
text2: Šem , amad ̣ ray ən Yafet , əmaraw n Eber d əzzurriya - nnet , eraw - du bararan ənta da .

text: The children of Shem ; Elam , and Asshur , and Arphaxad , and Lud , and Aram .
text2: Bararan win Šem əm ̣ osan : Elam , Aššur , Arfakšad , Lud d Aram .

text: And the children of Aram ; Uz , and Hul , and Gether , and Mash .
text2: Bararan win Aram əm ̣ osan : Uz , Xul , Geter əd Maš .

text: And Arphaxad begat Salah ; and Salah begat Eber .
text2: Arfakšad eraw Šalax , amaran Šalax eraw Eber .

text: And unto Eber were born two sons : the name of one was Peleg ; for in his days was the earth divided ; and his brother ' s name was Joktan .
text2: Eber eraw əššin bararan : iyyan es ̣ əm - net Feleg fəlas daɣ azzaman - net ənta ad izun am ̣ adal , wahad ̣ an Yoqtan .

text: And Joktan begat Almodad , and Sheleph , and Hazar - maveth , and Jerah ,
text2: Yoqtan eraw Almodad , Šelef , Xatsarmawet , Yarax ,

text: And Hadoram , and Uzal , and Diklah ,
text2: Hadoram , Uzal , Dikla ,

text: And Obal , and Abimael , and Sheba ,
text2: Obal , Abimal , Šəba ,

text: And Ophir , and Havilah , and Jobab : all these were the sons of Joktan .
text2: Ofir , Xawila əd Yobab . Ket - nasan maddanəs ən Yoqtan .

text: And their dwelling was from Mesha , as thou goest unto Sephar a mount of the east .
text2: Akal wa daɣ əɣsaran obaz - du ɣur Meša daɣ anamod wa n Səfara idɣaɣan win dənnəg .

text: These are the sons of Shem , after their families , after their tongues , in their lands , after their nations .
text2: Əntanay da da bararan win Šem əzunnen əs tawšeten - nasan d awalan - nasan daɣ kallan - nasan əd ɣərfan - nasan .

text: These are the families of the sons of Noah , after their generations , in their nations : and by these were the nations divided in the earth after the flood .
text2: Əntanatay da da tawšeten šin əganen daɣ maddanəs ən Nux əzunnen s əzzurriyatan - nasan əd ɣərfan - nasan . Əntanay ələsəl ən ɣərfan win wazawaznen daɣ əddənet dəffər əlwabil .

text: And the whole earth was of one language , and of one speech .
text2: Daɣ əddənet ket - net wər - itawašawal ar awal iyyanda .

text: And it came to pass , as they journeyed from the east , that they found a plain in the land of Shinar ; and they dwelt there .
text2: Əmalan - tu aytedan ətagalatnen ad d - əhanen sas dənnəg , əgrawnen asalwa iyyan daɣ am ̣ adal ən Šinar , əɣsaran daɣ - as .

text: And they said one to another , Go to , let us make brick , and burn them throughly . And they had brick for stone , and slime had they for morter .
text2: Ənaman ̣ n ̣ an gar - essan : « Əndawat , ad - nagu bargitan , nassaŋŋ - en əs tamsay . » Əgan - tan daɣ adagg ən təhun , əgan kolta daɣ adagg ən talaq .

text: And they said , Go to , let us build us a city and a tower , whose top may reach unto heaven ; and let us make us a name , lest we be scattered abroad upon the face of the whole earth .
text2: Təzzar ən ̣ n ̣ an : « Əndawat , əkrəsatanaɣ aɣrəm d ogga id ̣ d ̣ asan ijənnawan , ilatanaɣ es ̣ əm ad wər nəwəziwəz fəl tasayt n am ̣ adal . »

text: And the LORD came down to see the city and the tower , which the children of men builded .
text2: Izzəbbad - du Əməli fəl ad - inəy aɣrəm d ogga win karrasan maddanəs n Adəm .

text: And the LORD said , Behold , the people is one , and they have all one language ; and this they begin to do : and now nothing will be restrained from them , which they have imagined to do .
text2: Təzzar in ̣ n ̣ a Əməli : « Əntanay da əqqalan aɣrəf iyyanda , əššewalan awal iyyanda . Kud a wa da as əs ̣ s ̣ əntan wədi daɣ a ilkaman wər t - illa a dər z - əgmiyan arn - asan .

text: Go to , let us go down , and there confound their language , that they may not understand one another ' s speech .
text2: Əndawat , zabbatatana , ad - nəsənnəffəy awal - nasan fəl ad - ibas ətinəməsəsəgrin gar - essan . »

text: So the LORD scattered them abroad from thence upon the face of all the earth : and they left off to build the city .
text2: Den da a tan - izawwazawaz Əməli fəl tasayt n am ̣ adal kul , təzzar əzazzakken akaras n əɣrəm .

text: Therefore is the name of it called Babel ; because the LORD did there confound the language of all the earth : and from thence did the LORD scatter them abroad upon the face of all the earth .
text2: A di da fəl iga es ̣ əm Babel fəlas den da ad isannaffay Əməli awal ən maddanəs n Adəm , amaran den da tolas a tan izawwazawaz fəl tasayt n am ̣ adal .

text: These are the generations of Shem : Shem was an hundred years old , and begat Arphaxad two years after the flood :
text2: Ənta da əzzurriya ən Šem : Šem iga t ̣ emeday n awatay as eraw Arfakšad , əššin elan dəffər əlwabil .

text: And Shem lived after he begat Arphaxad five hundred years , and begat sons and daughters .
text2: Šem iga s ̣ əmmosat t ̣ əmad n awatay dəffər təhut n Arfakšad , itaraw - du bararan əd təbararen .

text: And Arphaxad lived five and thirty years , and begat Salah :
text2: Arfakšad as iga karadat təm ̣ ərwen n awatay əd s ̣ əmmos eraw Šela .

text: And Arphaxad lived after he begat Salah four hundred and three years , and begat sons and daughters .
text2: Arfakšad ig ' əkkozat t ̣ əmad n awatay əd karad dəffər təhut ən Šela itaraw - du bararan əd təbararen .

text: And Salah lived thirty years , and begat Eber :
text2: Šela iga karadat təm ̣ ərwen n awatay as eraw Eber .

text: And Salah lived after he begat Eber four hundred and three years , and begat sons and daughters .
text2: Šela ig ' əkkozat t ̣ əmad n awatay əd karad dəffər təhut n Eber , itaraw - du bararan əd təbararen .

text: And Eber lived four and thirty years , and begat Peleg :
text2: As iga Eber karadat təm ̣ ərwen n awatay d əkkoz eraw Feleg .

text: And Eber lived after he begat Peleg four hundred and thirty years , and begat sons and daughters .
text2: Eber iga əkkozat t ̣ əmad n awatay əd karadat təm ̣ ərwen dəffər təhut ən Feleg , itaraw - du bararan əd təbararen .

text: And Peleg lived thirty years , and begat Reu :
text2: As iga Feleg karadat təm ̣ ərwen n awatay eraw Ru .

text: And Peleg lived after he begat Reu two hundred and nine years , and begat sons and daughters .
text2: Feleg iga s ̣ anatat t ̣ əmad n awatay əd t ̣ aza dəffər təhut ən Ru , itaraw - du bararan əd təbararen .

text: And Reu lived two and thirty years , and begat Serug :
text2: As iga Ru karadat təm ̣ ərwen n awatay d əššin eraw Sərug .

text: And Reu lived after he begat Serug two hundred and seven years , and begat sons and daughters .
text2: Ru iga s ̣ anatat t ̣ əmad n awatay d əs ̣ s ̣ a dəffər təhut ən Sərug , itaraw - du bararan əd təbararen .

text: And Serug lived thirty years , and begat Nahor :
text2: As iga Sərug karadat təm ̣ ərwen n awatay eraw Naxor .

text: And Serug lived after he begat Nahor two hundred years , and begat sons and daughters .
text2: Sərug iga s ̣ anatat t ̣ əmad n awatay dəffər təhut ən Naxor , itaraw - du bararan əd təbararen .

text: And Nahor lived nine and twenty years , and begat Terah :
text2: As iga Naxor s ̣ anatat təm ̣ ərwen n awatay əd t ̣ aza eraw Terax .

text: And Nahor lived after he begat Terah an hundred and nineteen years , and begat sons and daughters .
text2: Naxor iga t ̣ emeday n awatay əd m ̣ araw əd t ̣ aza dəffər təhut ən Terax , itaraw - du bararan əd təbararen .

text: And Terah lived seventy years , and begat Abram , Nahor , and Haran .
text2: As iga Terax əs ̣ s ̣ ayat təm ̣ ərwen n awatay eraw Abram , Naxor əd Haran .

text: Now these are the generations of Terah : Terah begat Abram , Nahor , and Haran ; and Haran begat Lot .
text2: Ənta da əzzurriya ən Terax . Terax eraw Abram , Naxor , əd Haran . Haran eraw Lot .

text: And Haran died before his father Terah in the land of his nativity , in Ur of the Chaldees .
text2: Haran aba - tu dat ši - s daɣ akal wa daɣ ihu , daɣ əɣrəm n Ur wa n Kəl Kasday .

text: And Abram and Nahor took them wives : the name of Abram ' s wife was Sarai ; and the name of Nahor ' s wife , Milcah , the daughter of Haran , the father of Milcah , and the father of Iscah .
text2: Abram əd Naxor əzlafan : Abram izlaf Saray , Naxor izlaf Milka , elles ən Haran , šis ən Milka əd Yiska .

text: But Sarai was barren ; she had no child .
text2: Saray wər tətirəw , wər təla barar waliyyan .

text: And Terah took Abram his son , and Lot the son of Haran his son ' s son , and Sarai his daughter in law , his son Abram ' s wife ; and they went forth with them from Ur of the Chaldees , to go into the land of Canaan ; and they came unto Haran , and dwelt there .
text2: Iddew Terax əd rur - es Abram d ahaya - nnet Lot ag Haran əd təd ̣ aggalt - net Saray tant ̣ ut ən rur - es Abram . Əg ̣ madan aɣrəm n Ur wa n kəl Kasday s akal ən Kanan . Əglan har os ̣ an aɣrəm ən Xaran , əɣsaran daɣ - as .

text: And the days of Terah were two hundred and five years : and Terah died in Haran .
text2: Taɣrəst ən Terax s ̣ anatat t ̣ əmad n awatay əd s ̣ əmmos , aba - tu daɣ Xaran .

text: Now the LORD had said unto Abram , Get thee out of thy country , and from thy kindred , and from thy father ' s house , unto a land that I will shew thee :
text2: In ̣ n ̣ a Əməli y Abram : « Əg ̣ məd akal - nak təfəla imarwan - nak d aɣaywan n abba - nnak takka akal wa kay z - assakna .

text: And I will make of thee a great nation , and I will bless thee , and make thy name great ; and thou shalt be a blessing :
text2: A daɣ - ak aga tamattay tagget , aga fall - ak albaraka , əzzəzwəra es ̣ əm - nak , tileɣ albaraka .

text: And I will bless them that bless thee , and curse him that curseth thee : and in thee shall all families of the earth be blessed .
text2: Ad - agaɣ albaraka i win dak - k - əganen , əlɣəna win dak - əsaddarannen aššar . Ad əgrəwnat tawšeten kul n əddənet albaraka fəl udəm - nak . »

text: So Abram departed , as the LORD had spoken unto him ; and Lot went with him : and Abram was seventy and five years old when he departed out of Haran .
text2: Igla Abram ig ' a wa das in ̣ n ̣ a Əməli , iddew dər - əs Lot . Abram iga əs ̣ s ̣ ayat təm ̣ ərwen n awatay əd s ̣ əmmos as ig ̣ mad Xaran .

text: And Abram took Sarai his wife , and Lot his brother ' s son , and all their substance that they had gathered , and the souls that they had gotten in Haran ; and they went forth to go into the land of Canaan ; and into the land of Canaan they came .
text2: Abram iddew əd tənt ̣ ut - net Saray əd tagazay - nnet Lot , ewayan təla - nnasan kul harkid eklan win əggaznen təla - nnasan daɣ Xaran . Əglan əkkan akal ən Kanan . As t - in os ̣ an ,

text: And Abram passed through the land unto the place of Sichem , unto the plain of Moreh . And the Canaanite was then in the land .
text2: ad itagalat Abram daɣ akal har d - os ̣ a aɣrəm w ' as itawan ̣ n ̣ u Šəkem , edagg ih ' ašək zagren wa n More . Azzaman win di Kəl Kanan əɣsaran daɣ am ̣ adal wen .

text: And the LORD appeared unto Abram , and said , Unto thy seed will I give this land : and there builded he an altar unto the LORD , who appeared unto him .
text2: Inafalal Əməli y Abram in ̣ n ̣ - as : « Ad - akfa akal a əzzurriya - nnak . » Ikras Abram edagg ən təkutay y Əməli a das inafalalan da .

text: And he removed from thence unto a mountain on the east of Bethel , and pitched his tent , having Bethel on the west , and Hai on the east : and there he builded an altar unto the LORD , and called upon the name of the LORD .
text2: Dəffər a di iggəlat s ədɣaɣ iddinnagan y əɣrəm wa n Bet - El , izzəbbat , ikras ahaket - net it ̣ ram - as Bet - El , iddənnag - as əɣrəm wa n Ay . Təzzar ikras edagg ən təkutay y Əməli , iɣbad - tu .

text: And Abram journeyed , going on still toward the south .
text2: Igla Abram itagalat , innimad ten ̣ eray ən Negab .

text: And there was a famine in the land : and Abram went down into Egypt to sojourn there ; for the famine was grievous in the land .
text2: Iga laz daɣ akal wen . As id ̣ gaz laz akal ikka Abram Mas ̣ ar a daɣ - as agu tamert .

text: And it came to pass , when he was come near to enter into Egypt , that he said unto Sarai his wife , Behold now , I know that thou art a fair woman to look upon :
text2: As ibuk y iguz ən Mas ̣ ar in ̣ n ̣ a i tənt ̣ ut - net Saray : « Tant ̣ ut təhossayat a təm ̣ osa ,

text: Therefore it shall come to pass , when the Egyptians shall see thee , that they shall say , This is his wife : and they will kill me , but they will save thee alive .
text2: as kam ənayan Kəl Mas ̣ ar ad - an ̣ n ̣ in taɣur - i a təm ̣ osa , təzzar agin im ̣ an - in , kam , a - kam - ayyin təddara .

text: Say , I pray thee , thou art my sister : that it may be well with me for thy sake ; and my soul shall live because of thee .
text2: Daɣ a di an ̣ n ̣ u kam tamad ̣ raytt - in fəl ad - təwəsəɣməra fəl əddəlil - nam , afsa . »

text: And it came to pass , that , when Abram was come into Egypt , the Egyptians beheld the woman that she was very fair .
text2: As din - os ̣ a Abram Mas ̣ ar ənayan Kəl Mas ̣ ar tant ̣ ut - net təkna šihussay .

text: The princes also of Pharaoh saw her , and commended her before Pharaoh : and the woman was taken into Pharaoh ' s house .
text2: Ənayan - tat mizwaran ən Firɣawna , a das tat əmmalan . Təzzar təmmeway tənt ̣ ut s aɣaywan - net .

text: And he entreated Abram well for her sake : and he had sheep , and oxen , and he asses , and menservants , and maidservants , and she asses , and camels .
text2: Amaran Abram ənta ig - as id ̣ uf olaɣan fəl əddəlil - net . Igraw Abram eharay wa ənd ̣ ərran əd zəgran , əd təzden d əzdan , d eklan əd taklaten , əd m ̣ ənas .

text: And the LORD plagued Pharaoh and his house with great plagues because of Sarai Abram ' s wife .
text2: Mišan izazzabbat - du Əməli fəl Firɣawna təkmawen labasnen fəl əddəlil ən tənt ̣ ut n Abram Saray .
