text2: igannu : Təga fall - i təssust , əɣreɣ Amaɣlol ikkəwan - i Əggazaɣ ilɣi ən nəmməttan , əgmaya taggazt təsleɣ - i

text: Then I said , I am cast out of thy sight ; yet I will look again toward thy holy temple .
text2: Eder ən gərwan daɣ - i in - təgara , aman - nasan əlmazan - i Šigufufen - nak n aman əd tənazzamaren - nak tallamnat dənnəg - i .

text: The waters compassed me about , even to the soul : the depth closed me round about , the weeds were wrapped about my head .
text2: Har sammadranaɣ as tawastaɣa , tawakkasa dat - ək , Mišan ad ələsaɣ asawad daɣ ahan - nak di zəddigan .

text: I went down to the bottoms of the mountains ; the earth with her bars was about me for ever : yet hast thou brought up my life from corruption , O LORD my God .
text2: Agarew ilmaz - i , təgərsut as di - ittaf , aman win ader ənərkab a di - əgan , ilattan - nasan eɣaf - in dər tattalan .

text: When my soul fainted within me I remembered the LORD : and my prayer came in unto thee , into thine holy temple .
text2: Tidəkəyye har eres n ədɣaɣan əɣila šisəhar n alaxirat har faw as fall - i du - ɣaffalnat . Mišan kay Amaɣlol , Əməli - nin , anu wər nəl ' eder a daɣ - i du - təkkasa .

text: They that observe lying vanities forsake their own mercy .
text2: Iman , as di - əggazan šin agamad , Amaɣlol as malallaya . Təwatray - nin , ehan - nak di zəddigan daɣ - as təssəsama .

text: But I will sacrifice unto thee with the voice of thanksgiving ; I will pay that that I have vowed . Salvation is of the LORD .
text2: Inaɣbidan n əssənəman , əmməzzayan əd wa imosan əməggi ən tənaɣen .

text: And the LORD spake unto the fish , and it vomited out Jonah upon the dry land .
text2: Mišan nak ad əkəta əssiggada təmmal təga ̂ t daɣ godan y ak . Addawalan win dat - ək əge a tan - assanda , fəlas kay Amaɣlol a d - əffalan efsan !

text: Arise , go unto Nineveh , that great city , and preach unto it the preaching that I bid thee .
text2: « Ənkər akk ' aɣrəm wa zəwwəran ən Ninif , təməlaɣ i məssawəs əmazal wa dak - z - aga sər - san əmərədda . »

text: So Jonah arose , and went unto Nineveh , according to the word of the LORD . Now Nineveh was an exceeding great city of three days ' journey .
text2: Ikkəwan Yunəs y Amaɣlol igla ikka Ninif . Ninif iket an aɣrəm a imos as kundaba karad adan ən teklay a fəl tu - z - iɣrəs awedan .

text: And Jonah began to enter into the city a day ' s journey , and he cried , and said , Yet forty days , and Nineveh shall be overthrown .
text2: As din - osa Yunəs , iga əzəl - net wa azzaran issiwal aɣrəm , immal y aytedan əmazal wa sər - san d - iga , igann - asan : « Da da har əkkozat təmərwen n əzəl aɣrəm wa n Ninif ad iɣrəd ətəwəhlak ! »

text: So the people of Nineveh believed God , and proclaimed a fast , and put on sackcloth , from the greatest of them even to the least of them .
text2: Əzzəgzanan Kəl - Ninif əs Məššina , ənamardan s əzum , əɣradan telassay ən səlsa - nasan win təfəyyawt əganen daɣ bəhu , gər win waššarnen - nasan wala win madrornen - nasan .

text: For word came unto the king of Nineveh , and he arose from his throne , and he laid his robe from him , and covered him with sackcloth , and sat in ashes .
text2: As isla əmənokal isalan win , inkar daɣ təssəwt - net ta n taɣmar , ikkas takatkat - net ta n təmmənukəla , ilsa isəlsa əganen daɣ bəhu , təzzar iqqim daɣ ezəd .

text: And he caused it to be proclaimed and published through Nineveh by the decree of the king and his nobles , saying , Let neither man nor beast , herd nor flock , taste any thing : let them not feed , nor drink water :
text2: Təzzar izzərzag əmənokal aɣrəm ən Ninif tanat təmosat as omaran ənta əd məššəwwar - net as aytedan d aharay wa əndarran , əd wa n šitan kul ad ammazzayan əd tattay əd tassay .

text: But let man and beast be covered with sackcloth , and cry mightily unto God : yea , let them turn every one from his evil way , and from the violence that is in their hands .
text2: Inna : « Aytedan kul əd hərwan alsinet isəlsa əganen daɣ bəhu , aɣrinet Məššina əs gəlleyat . Awedan kul ammazzayet d ark alxal wa iga əd tallabəst ta itamazal .

text: Who can tell if God will turn and repent , and turn away from his fierce anger , that we perish not ?
text2: « Ma issanan ! Mijas Məššina a danaɣ - ihənəttət , igməd - t ' alham wa labasan a , issurəf - ana , naqqam da wər nəhlek ! »

text: And God saw their works , that they turned from their evil way ; and God repented of the evil , that he had said that he would do unto them ; and he did it not .
text2: Inay Məššina as Kəl - Ninif əmməzzayan d ark alxal wa gan , təzzar issoraf - asan əqqiman da wər dasan - iga ahluk wa imal .

text: And he prayed unto the LORD , and said , I pray thee , O LORD , was not this my saying , when I was yet in my country ? Therefore I fled before unto Tarshish : for I knew that thou art a gracious God , and merciful , slow to anger , and of great kindness , and repentest thee of the evil .
text2: Inna Yunəs y Amaɣlol : « Ya Əməli ! Awak masnat a wər əge harwa əhe ̂ ɣ akal - in as arat wa ənta iman - net a z ' agin ? Təksəda n awa da fəl əgmaya d ədəggəg əs Taršiš fəlas əssanaɣ as kay Məššina n əməhhennən d əməggi n arraxmat a təmosa , as izzəwat alham - net , iggət əlluɣ - net . Faw təsimataga y a din - təwəɣa fəl aytedan ahluk wa dasan - təxkama .

text: Therefore now , O LORD , take , I beseech thee , my life from me ; for it is better for me to die than to live .
text2: Daɣ adi əmərədda əgmaya daɣ - ak Amaɣlol a daɣ - i təkkəsaɣ iman fəlas əssofa iba təməddurt . »

text: Then said the LORD , Doest thou well to be angry ?
text2: Inn ' Amaɣlol i Yunəs : « alham da a kay ihan ! »

text: So Jonah went out of the city , and sat on the east side of the city , and there made him a booth , and sat under it in the shadow , till he might see what would become of the city .
text2: Dəffər awen igmad Yunəs aɣrəm wa n Ninif iddənnag - as , iga arat ən tafala iqqim daɣ telay - net , iqqal y awa za igrəwan aɣrəm .

text: And the LORD God prepared a gourd , and made it to come up over Jonah , that it might be a shadow over his head , to deliver him from his grief . So Jonah was exceeding glad of the gourd .
text2: Issədwal - du Amaɣlol Əməli esab iyyan dənnəg Yunəs fəl a das - agu telay , y ad t - igməd alham . Esab wa ikna əsəddəwi ən Yunəs .

text: But God prepared a worm when the morning rose the next day , and it smote the gourd that it withered .
text2: Mišan as affaw tufat aɣo ̂ ra issok - ay - du Məššina tawəkkay təggaz - tu har tu - təssəɣar .

text: And it came to pass , when the sun did arise , that God prepared a vehement east wind ; and the sun beat upon the head of Jonah , that he fainted , and wished in himself to die , and said , It is better for me to die than to live .
text2: As du - təggəzzay təfuk issəgar - du Məššina əhud ikna ̂ n tuksay . Təssaɣ təfuk daɣ aɣaf ən Yunəs har ibuk y əkərəkki . Igmay tamattant daɣ Məššina , inna issof iba təməddurt .

text: And God said to Jonah , Doest thou well to be angry for the gourd ? And he said , I do well to be angry , even unto death .
text2: Mišan inn - as Məššina : « Awa alham da daɣ - ak iga awa igrawan esab a ! » Inn - as Yunəs : « Əge tanat as di - iggaz alham har əssofa tamattant ! »

text: Then said the LORD , Thou hast had pity on the gourd , for the which thou hast not laboured , neither madest it grow ; which came up in a night , and perished in a night :
text2: Təzzar inn - as Amaɣlol : « Kay təh - ik təhanint n asab a du - wər - təssədwala za wər das - təge wala . Esab a d - idwalan ahad iyyanda , iqqur ahad wa hadan .

text: And should not I spare Nineveh , that great city , wherein are more than sixscore thousand persons that cannot discern between their right hand and their left hand ; and also much cattle ?
text2: Manəmmək as di - wər - za - təggəz təhanint ən Ninif təmosat aɣrəm zəwwəran a daɣ təɣsa ̂ r təxlək togarat tameday əd sanatat təmərwen n əgim n awedan wər nəfreg zələy n əbrur d əlluɣ , əhan - tu tolas hərwan əkna ̂ nen igət ? »

text: The same was in the beginning with God .
text2: Awal əstizarat illa ɣur Məššina .

text: All things were made by him ; and without him was not any thing made that was made .
text2: Məššina ixlak - du sər - əs arat kul ; wər t - illa arat daɣ əddənet wa sər - əs du - wər - nəxlek fəlas Awal ənta a ihakkin təməddurt ta təmosat ənnur y aytedan .

text: And the light shineth in darkness ; and the darkness comprehended it not .
text2: Ənnur imilawlaw daɣ šiyyay eges indar - asnat ad t - anɣinat .

text: There was a man sent from God , whose name was John .
text2: Osa - dd ' aləs iyyan igan esəm Yaxya , a d - izimazal Məššina ;

text: The same came for a witness , to bear witness of the Light , that all men through him might believe .
text2: imos təgəyya fəl ad ammagrad s ənnur wa , əzzəgzənan aytedan kul s aratan win igannu .

text: He was not that Light , but was sent to bear witness of that Light .
text2: Ənta iman - net wər imos ənnur , ətəwəsəgla ɣas a d - iga imos təgəyya fəl ad ammagrad s ənnur wa .

text: That was the true Light , which lighteth every man that cometh into the world .
text2: Awal wa ənta a imosan ənnur wa n tidət , wa d - ikkan əddənet isiməluləw aytedan kul .

text: He was in the world , and the world was made by him , and the world knew him not .
text2: Ənta a ihan əddənet , ixlak - kat - du Məššina sər - əs , eges əddənet wər tu - təqbel .

text: He came unto his own , and his own received him not .
text2: Osa - dd ' akal - net eges wər t - əqbelan aytedan - net .

text: But as many as received him , to them gave he power to become the sons of God , even to them that believe on his name :
text2: Mišan win t - əqbalnen kul , əzzəgzanan sər - əs , win di ikf - en almaqam ən tišit ən bararan ən Məššina .

text: Which were born , not of blood , nor of the will of the flesh , nor of the will of man , but of God .
text2: Wər əqqelan bararan ən Məššina s əmmək was garrawan aytedan bararan , kala kalar əmosan - tan əs tənna ən Məššina .

text: And the Word was made flesh , and dwelt among us , ( and we beheld his glory , the glory as of the only begotten of the Father , ) full of grace and truth .
text2: Wa imosan Awal , iqqal awedan ixsar ɣur - na , ikna təla n əlxurma , imos məššis ən tidət . Nəsinagra ətəwəsəɣmar - net , saɣmar wa igarraw Barar a n iyyanda ɣur Abba - net .

text: John bare witness of him , and cried , saying , This was he of whom I spake , He that cometh after me is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Iggəyyat as Yaxya , iššewal s afalla ad igannu : « Wa daɣ as əhe batu - net , assaɣa wa dawan - ganna : " A dd - asu dəffər - i mišan ogar - i , fəlas dat - i da ill - ay " » .

text: And of his fulness have all we received , and grace for grace .
text2: Awalla ketnana nəgraw albaraka wər nəla əddukad s əlxurma - net ikmalan .

text: For the law was given by Moses , but grace and truth came by Jesus Christ .
text2: Fəlas Məššina ikf - anaɣ əlqanun daɣ əfus ən Musa , əlxurma əd tidət osa - ddu dər - san Ɣaysa Əlməsix .

text: No man hath seen God at any time ; the only begotten Son , which is in the bosom of the Father , he hath declared him .
text2: Wər t - illa awedan inayan Məššina , mišan Barar a n iyyanda imosan Məššina , illa ɣur Abba , ənta a danaq - q - issosanan .

text: And this is the record of John , when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him , Who art thou ?
text2: Ənta da təgəyya ta iga Yaxya y arat daɣ limaman əd Kəl - Lebi win d - əfalnen Yerusalam assaɣa wa tan - du - zammazalan muzaran ən Kəl - Əlyəhud y ad t - əssəstənan d awa imos .

text: And he confessed , and denied not ; but confessed , I am not the Christ .
text2: Wər ugay s a dasan - ajjawwab . Kala kalar idkal əməsli - net s afalla inn - asan : « Nak wər əmosaɣ Əlməsix . »

text: And they asked him , What then ? Art thou Elias ? And he saith , I am not . Art thou that prophet ? And he answered , No .
text2: Ənnan - as : « Ma təmosa za ? Ilyas a təmosa ? » « kala kala » inn - asan , « wər t - əmosa . » « Ənnəbi wa ittəmalan a təmosa ? » « kala kala » inn - asan , « wər t - əmosa . »

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? that we may give an answer to them that sent us . What sayest thou of thyself ?
text2: Təzzar ənnan - as : « Daɣ adi ma təmosa ? Ihor a din - nasu aytedan win dana - d - əssəglanen neway - asan aljawab n awa təmosa . Daɣ adi əməl - anaɣ iman - nak . »

text: He said , I am the voice of one crying in the wilderness , Make straight the way of the Lord , as said the prophet Esaias .
text2: Inn - asan arat wa inna ənnəbi Isayas irəw : « Nak , əməsli a mosa n aləs a d - isaɣaren daɣ əsuf igannu : " Zəzzəluləɣat tarrayt y Əməli . " »

text: And they which were sent were of the Pharisees .
text2: Aytedan win əhanen əttəriqat ən Farisaytan əntanay a du - zammazalnen əs Yaxya .

text: And they asked him , and said unto him , Why baptizest thou then , if thou be not that Christ , nor Elias , neither that prophet ?
text2: Əssəstanan - tu nammazalan win ənnan - as : « Ma fəl təsalmaɣaɣ aytedan daɣ aman , kay tənne wər təmosaɣ Əlməsix , wər təmosaɣ ənnəbi wa ittəmalan ? »

text: John answered them , saying , I baptize with water : but there standeth one among you , whom ye know not ;
text2: Inn - asan : « Nak əsalmaɣaɣ aytedan daɣ aman , mišan illa gar - ewan awedan wər təzdayam .

text: He it is , who coming after me is preferred before me , whose shoe ' s latchet I am not worthy to unloose .
text2: Ənta du - z - asin dəffər - i , amaran awa di - iga daɣ šigrat , arra ən təmərkest ən ɣateman - net , da wər t - eweda . »

text: These things were done in Bethabara beyond Jordan , where John was baptizing .
text2: Aratan win kul taggan daɣ amadal ən Betani fəl tagadamayt ta hadat təsəssəngəyt ən Yordan dad isalmaɣ Yaxya aytedan .

text: The next day John seeth Jesus coming unto him , and saith , Behold the Lamb of God , which taketh away the sin of the world .
text2: As iga əzəl wa hadan ogga Yaxya Ɣaysa izay - t - idu , təzzar inna : « Ənta den ajaɣol ən Məššina wa itakkasan ibakkadan daɣ əddənet .

text: This is he of whom I said , After me cometh a man which is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Ənta as əhe batu - net as dawan - ganna : « Aləs iyyan ad d - asu dəffər - i , mišan ogar - i fəlas dat - i da ill - ay .

text: And I knew him not : but that he should be made manifest to Israel , therefore am I come baptizing with water .
text2: Nak iman - in wər t - əzdaya mišan əgle - du ad salmaɣaɣ aytedan daɣ aman , fəl ad d - inəfiləl i Kəl - Əlyəhud . »

text: And John bare record , saying , I saw the Spirit descending from heaven like a dove , and it abode upon him .
text2: Iggəyyat Yaxya tolas inna : « Əswada daɣ Infas wa Zəddigan imos zun tədabert as d - izzəbbat daɣ jənnawan iwar - tu .

text: And I knew him not : but he that sent me to baptize with water , the same said unto me , Upon whom thou shalt see the Spirit descending , and remaining on him , the same is he which baptizeth with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Eges wər əssena harwa awa imos , mišan əssanaɣ as imal - i Məššina , s ənta di - d - issəglan y ad əsalmaɣaɣ aytedan daɣ aman , as : " Ad tənəyaɣ Infas wa Zəddigan as du - z - azzabbat iɣsər fəl aləs iyyan , aləs wədi ənta a z - isalmaɣan aytedan daɣ Infas wa Zəddigan . "

text: And I saw , and bare record that this is the Son of God .
text2: Əmərədda arat wa ənayaq - qu əs šittawen - in ; amaran əggəyye silakanaɣ as aləs wa ənta Barar ən Məššina . »

text: Again the next day after John stood , and two of his disciples ;
text2: As iga əzəl wa hadan , iha Yaxya edag wa harwa da , ənta əd nalkiman - net əššin .

text: And looking upon Jesus as he walked , he saith , Behold the Lamb of God !
text2: Ogga Ɣaysa as dagma - nasan d - illam , inna : « Ənta den , ajaɣol ən Məššina . »

text: And the two disciples heard him speak , and they followed Jesus .
text2: Əslan nalkiman win əššin a i batu ta iga da , təzzar əlkaman i Ɣaysa .

text: Then Jesus turned , and saw them following , and saith unto them , What seek ye ? They said unto him , Rabbi , ( which is to say , being interpreted , Master , ) where dwellest thou ?
text2: Iswad - in Ɣaysa dəffər - əs ogg - en əlkaman - as , inn - asan : « Mas təsaggadam ? » Ənnan - as « Mənid təɣsara Əššix ? »

text: He saith unto them , Come and see . They came and saw where he dwelt , and abode with him that day : for it was about the tenth hour .
text2: Inn - asan « Agliwat - du a tu - tənəyam » . Itagg ' awen takəst zagret , əglan əddewan dər - əs , ənayan dad illa , təzzar əssəndan ɣur - əs əzəl .

text: One of the two which heard John speak , and followed him , was Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother .
text2: Meddan win əššin əlkamnen i Ɣaysa dəffər tasalay ta gan y awal ən Yaxya , iyyan daɣ - san esəm - net Andrawəs , amadray ən Simɣon Butros .

text: He first findeth his own brother Simon , and saith unto him , We have found the Messias , which is , being interpreted , the Christ .
text2: Immənay Andrawəs d əməqqar - net Simɣon əstizarat , təzzar inn - as : « Nakkanay nəmminay d Əlməsix . » ( almaɣna Kristos )

text: And he brought him to Jesus . And when Jesus beheld him , he said , Thou art Simon the son of Jona : thou shalt be called Cephas , which is by interpretation , A stone .
text2: Amaran ilway - tu əs Ɣaysa . Iswad Ɣaysa daɣ Simɣon ɣas inn - as : « Kay Simɣon , rur - es ən Yaxya , ad tagaɣ esəm Kefas » ( esəm wa ola əd wa n Butros , almaɣna - net təhunt . )

text: The day following Jesus would go forth into Galilee , and findeth Philip , and saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: As affaw ira Ɣaysa iki n amadal ən Galilaya . Immənay əd Filibbus inn - as : « Əlkəm - i . »

text: Now Philip was of Bethsaida , the city of Andrew and Peter .
text2: ( Filibbus d Andrawəs əd Butros aɣrəm - nasan iyyanda , esəm - net Betsayda . )

text: Philip findeth Nathanael , and saith unto him , We have found him , of whom Moses in the law , and the prophets , did write , Jesus of Nazareth , the son of Joseph .
text2: Immənay Filibbus əd Natanəyel inn - as : « Nakkanay nəmminay əd was imməgrad ənnəbi Musa daɣ Əttawret , əmmigradan sər - əs da kətban n ənnəbitan , a t - imosan Ɣaysa wa n ag Yusəf wa n əɣrəm ən Nazaret . »

text: And Nathanael said unto him , Can there any good thing come out of Nazareth ? Philip saith unto him , Come and see .
text2: Təzzar inn - as Natanəyel : « Immikkan aɣrəm wa n Nazaret a t - id - əgməd arat ihossayan ? » Inn - as Filibbus : « Ayaw tənəya . »

text: Jesus saw Nathanael coming to him , and saith of him , Behold an Israelite indeed , in whom is no guile !
text2: Ogga Ɣaysa Natanəyel izay - t - idu , inna : « Ənta den awedan n Israyil wa n tidət , wa wər nətəggəz ar tarrayt təzilalaɣat . »

text: Nathanael saith unto him , Whence knowest thou me ? Jesus answered and said unto him , Before that Philip called thee , when thou wast under the fig tree , I saw thee .
text2: Inn - as Natanəyel : « Mas di - təzdaya ? » Ijjəwwab - as Ɣaysa inn - as : « Harwa - kay - du wər iɣra Filibbus , assaɣa wad təlle daw ašək wa n təhena , da əhannayaq - qay . »

text: Nathanael answered and saith unto him , Rabbi , thou art the Son of God ; thou art the King of Israel .
text2: Inn - as Natanəyel : « Əššix , kay a imosan Barar ən Məššina , təmosaɣ əmənokal n Israyil . »

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Because I said unto thee , I saw thee under the fig tree , believest thou ? thou shalt see greater things than these .
text2: Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Təzzəgzana fəl as dak - ənneɣ əhannayaq - qay daw ašək ən təhena ; ad tənəyaɣ aratan wiyyad zawwarnen ogarnen wa . »

text: And he saith unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Hereafter ye shall see heaven open , and the angels of God ascending and descending upon the Son of man .
text2: Təzzar inn - as : « Əggəyyeɣ əsilakanaɣ - awan as dəffər awa ad tənəyam ijənnawan ənnolaman tagazzayan - tan angalosan , tazabben - du fəl Barar n Awedan . »

text: And both Jesus was called , and his disciples , to the marriage .
text2: təzzar itawaɣrad - du Ɣaysa ənta da , iddew - du əd nalkiman - net əs təkrəst .

text: And when they wanted wine , the mother of Jesus saith unto him , They have no wine .
text2: As ab - as d - iqqim wala daɣ esmad , tənna anna ən Ɣaysa y as : « Esmad iɣrad . »

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , what have I to do with thee ? mine hour is not yet come .
text2: Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Anna , tədi a kam - wər - tədgəz . Alwaq - in wər d - ewed . »

text: His mother saith unto the servants , Whatsoever he saith unto you , do it .
text2: Tənna mas i maššaɣalan : « Agat awa as dawan - inna kul . »

text: And there were set there six waterpots of stone , after the manner of the purifying of the Jews , containing two or three firkins apiece .
text2: Əskaran əddi sədis təkan taggazan aman as taggin Kəl - Əlyəhud əzəzdəg wa imosan alɣadat - nasan . Əkkulu n iyyan itaggaz - t ' əddukad ən tameday ən litər .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Fill the waterpots with water . And they filled them up to the brim .
text2: Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Ədnəyat itəkan di aman . » Əntanay deɣ ədnayan - tan har fayyan .

text: And he saith unto them , Draw out now , and bear unto the governor of the feast . And they bare it .
text2: Inn - asan amaran : « Əlkəwat daɣ - san əmərədda y əmaway ən saksas . » Əgan awa dasan - inna .

text: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine , and knew not whence it was : ( but the servants which drew the water knew ; ) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom ,
text2: As iram əmaway ən saksas aman win əmməttaynen da , əqqalan esmad , as wər issen iguz wa d - iga , mišan imašaɣalan win tan - d - əlkawnen əssa ̂ nan , iɣra əmərmuš ,

text: And saith unto him , Every man at the beginning doth set forth good wine ; and when men have well drunk , then that which is worse : but thou hast kept the good wine until now .
text2: inn - as : « Iməssəksas kul esmad wa izodan a garrawan , amaran dəffər as filawasan əgrəwan wa isammakkanan . Eges kay təɣbara wa izodan har əmərədda ! »

text: This beginning of miracles did Jesus in Cana of Galilee , and manifested forth his glory ; and his disciples believed on him .
text2: Ənta əddi təlməɣjujat təmosat alɣalamat ta tazzarat immozal Ɣaysa . Ig - et daɣ əɣrəm ən Kana ta n Galilaya . Isannafalal sər - əs tarna - net , təzzar əzzəgzanan sər - əs nalkiman - net .

text: After this he went down to Capernaum , he , and his mother , and his brethren , and his disciples : and they continued there not many days .
text2: Dəffər awen iras aɣrəm ən Kafarnahum , ənta əd mas ̣ , əd mədrayan - net , əd nalkiman - net . Wər daɣ - as əgen ar arat n adan .

text: And the Jews ' passover was at hand , and Jesus went up to Jerusalem ,
text2: As d - ihoz əmud wa n Akkay imosan amud maqqaran ən Kəl - Əlyəhud , iggəzzay Ɣaysa əs Yerusalam .

text: And found in the temple those that sold oxen and sheep and doves , and the changers of money sitting :
text2: Ogaz - in Ɣaysa daɣ afarag wa iɣlayan Ehan ən Məššina , imassatagan ən zəgran , d ayfəd , əd tədəbren , əd təɣimiten ən kəl sanji .

text: And when he had made a scourge of small cords , he drove them all out of the temple , and the sheep , and the oxen ; and poured out the changers ' money , and overthrew the tables ;
text2: ig ' ələkkud əs ɣunan istaq - qan daɣ afarag wədi ketnasan , əntanay d ayfəd , əd zəgran , infaz daɣ amadal izərfan ən kəl sanji , isabbambay təssəwen - nasan .

text: And said unto them that sold doves , Take these things hence ; make not my Father ' s house an house of merchandise .
text2: Imassatagan ən tədəbren əntanay inn - asan : « Əkkəsat awa daɣ adag a , ad wər tagim ehan n Abba - nin asammanay n əssuk . »

text: And his disciples remembered that it was written , The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up .
text2: Əktan - du nalkiman akatab ən Dawəd wa innan : « Tara - nin ehan - nak tərɣa daɣ - i šila ən tamsay . »

text: Then answered the Jews and said unto him , What sign shewest thou unto us , seeing that thou doest these things ?
text2: Əssəstanan - tu muzaran ən Kəl - Əlyəhud ənnan - as : « Məni təlməɣjujat təmosat alɣalamat tas təfraga danaq - qat taga təsitaddat as təleɣ almaqam n ad tagaɣ əmazal di ? »

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Destroy this temple , and in three days I will raise it up .
text2: Ijjəwwab - asan Ɣaysa inn - asan : « Dagdagat Ehan ən Məššina di , a tid əssəbdəda daɣ karad adan . »

text: Then said the Jews , Forty and six years was this temple in building , and wilt thou rear it up in three days ?
text2: Ənnan - as : « Ehan ən Məššina di əkkozat təmərwen n awatay əd sədis a fəl itawakras . Kay mas tu - za - təssəbdəda daɣ karad adan ? »

text: But he spake of the temple of his body .
text2: As inna Ehan ən Məššina da , ənta taɣəssa - net as igannu .

text: When therefore he was risen from the dead , his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them ; and they believed the scripture , and the word which Jesus had said .
text2: As d - inkar daɣ təmattant əktan - du nalkiman - net tənna ta iga adi . Əzzəgzanan əs Kətban , d awal wa iga Ɣaysa .

text: Now when he was in Jerusalem at the passover , in the feast day , many believed in his name , when they saw the miracles which he did .
text2: Aytedan aggotnen əzzigzanan əs Ɣaysa ɣur anay ən təlməɣjujaten šin as immozal daɣ adan win iga daɣ Yerusalam ɣur əmud wa n Akkay .

text: But Jesus did not commit himself unto them , because he knew all men ,
text2: Mišan ya Ɣaysa wər tan - ifles fəlas izday - tan ketnasan , ənta

text: And needed not that any should testify of man : for he knew what was in man .
text2: wər iddərar s i das - igan isalan n awedan id wər das - iɣber awa ihan əwəl - net .

text: The same came to Jesus by night , and said unto him , Rabbi , we know that thou art a teacher come from God : for no man can do these miracles that thou doest , except God be with him .
text2: Osa - ddu Ɣaysa ahad iyyan inn - as : « Əššix - in , nakkanay nəssan as Məššina kay d - izammazalan sər - na , a dana - təsassaɣra , id wər t - illa i z - agin təlməɣjujaten šin təge , ar əs tədhəlt - net . »

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born again , he cannot see the kingdom of God .
text2: Ɣaysa deɣ inn - as : « Əggəyyeɣ əsilakanaɣ - ak as : Wər t - ill ' awedan ifragan anay ən taɣmar ən Məššina ar s ad ilas təhut .

text: Nicodemus saith unto him , How can a man be born when he is old ? can he enter the second time into his mother ' s womb , and be born ?
text2: Issəstan - tu Nikodemos inn - as : « Mas du - z - iləs awedan waššaran təhut ? Ši təgat da wər ifreg ad iləs tewaɣlay ən tədist ən mas . »

text: Jesus answered , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit , he cannot enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Əggəyyeɣ əsilakanaɣ - ak as : awedan wər ifreg iguz ən taɣmar ən Məššina ar s ad ihu s aman d Infas wa Zəddigan .

text: That which is born of the flesh is flesh ; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit .
text2: Ələsəl n aggadəm iyyan aggadəm , amaran wa d - igmadan Infas wa Zəddigan , Infas wa Zəddigan a daɣ - as innodan .

text: Marvel not that I said unto thee , Ye must be born again .
text2: Daɣ adi a dak - wər - iqqən eɣaf as dak - ənneɣ : Iwar - kawan ad tələsam təhut .

text: The wind bloweth where it listeth , and thou hearest the sound thereof , but canst not tell whence it cometh , and whither it goeth : so is every one that is born of the Spirit .
text2: Adu igga ̂ r sas ira , kay təsalla y əməsli - net , mišan wər təssena sas d - iha wala sas idag . Samal di da a iha wa ihuwan s Infas wa Zəddigan . »

text: Nicodemus answered and said unto him , How can these things be ?
text2: Issəstan - tu Nikodemos inn - as : « Məni tat təməwit tas z - agin aratan win ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Art thou a master of Israel , and knowest not these things ?
text2: Ijjəwwab - as Ɣaysa inn - as : « Təmosaɣ əmusan zəwwəran daɣ Israyil eges wər təssenaɣ aratan win !

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , We speak that we do know , and testify that we have seen ; and ye receive not our witness .
text2: Əggəyyeɣ əsilakanaɣ - ak as : « Nətamagrad s awa nəssan , nətagayyat da fəl awa nənay , eges tugayam s - ad təqbəlam təgəyya - nana .

text: If I have told you earthly things , and ye believe not , how shall ye believe , if I tell you of heavenly things ?
text2: Dad wər təzzəgzanam s awa dawan - ganna s əddənet mas za təzzəgzənam awa dawan ganna s alaxirat ?

text: And no man hath ascended up to heaven , but he that came down from heaven , even the Son of man which is in heaven .
text2: Wər t - illa is kala inay ijənnawan , ar Agg Awedan wa tan - d - igmadan .

text: And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness , even so must the Son of man be lifted up :
text2: Əmmək was isaddakal Musa aššol ən daroɣ əs təgəttawt daɣ taneray , əmmək di daɣ as z itəwəsədukəl Agg Awedan ,

text: That whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have eternal life .
text2: fəl ad iqqəl as i sər - əs izzəgzanan , ad igrəw təməddurt ta təɣlalat .

text: For God so loved the world , that he gave his only begotten Son , that whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have everlasting life .
text2: Awalla , Məššina ikna tara n əddənet har as ikfad - du Barar - net a n iyyanda fəl ad iqqəl as i sər - əs izzəgzanan wər z ' ihlək , kalar ad igrəw təməddurt ta təɣlalat .

text: For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world ; but that the world through him might be saved .
text2: Məššina wər d - issoka Barar - net əddənet fəl a tat - ihlək kalar issokas - tat - du fəl a sər - əs tafsu .

text: He that believeth on him is not condemned : but he that believeth not is condemned already , because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God .
text2: I sər - əs izzəgzanan wər ihlek , mišan wa sər - əs wər nəzzəgzan ihlak fəlas wər izzəgzan s esəm ən Barar ən Məššina a n iyyanda .

text: And this is the condemnation , that light is come into the world , and men loved darkness rather than light , because their deeds were evil .
text2: Ənta əddi da iguz wa d - iga əhluk : Ənnur osad - du əddənet , mišan aytedan əssofan šiyyay y ənnur id taggin arak mazalan .

text: For every one that doeth evil hateth the light , neither cometh to the light , lest his deeds should be reproved .
text2: Amaran i itaggan aɣšud oglaf ənnur , wər t - id - z - akku fəlas iksud ad nəfiləlan arak mazalan - net ezal a mallan .

text: But he that doeth truth cometh to the light , that his deeds may be made manifest , that they are wrought in God .
text2: Mišan wa itaggan arat wa imosan tidət , itakka - du ənnur , fəl ad itəwənəy , as əmazal - net issind - ay daɣ ləkkum i Məššina .

text: After these things came Jesus and his disciples into the land of Judaea ; and there he tarried with them , and baptized .
text2: Dəffər awen ikka Ɣaysa əd nalkiman - net amadal ən Yahudəya . Iqqim daɣ - as har iga arat n azzaman ənta dər - san , amaran isalmaɣ Ɣaysa aytedan daɣ aman .

text: And John also was baptizing in Aenon near to Salim , because there was much water there : and they came , and were baptized .
text2: Yaxya ənta da isalmaɣ daɣ aman , daɣ Aynon , dagma ən Salim , fəlas əllan - t ' aman aggotnen den . Amaran tasin - t - id ' aytedan isalmaq - qan .

text: For John was not yet cast into prison .
text2: Arat wa as itaggu Yaxya harwa da wər iggez kasaw .

text: Then there arose a question between some of John ' s disciples and the Jews about purifying .
text2: Tənkar təmazaq gər nalkiman ən Yaxya d iyyan daɣ Kəl - Əlyəhud , daɣ batu ən təməwiten šin as itag zazdag .

text: And they came unto John , and said unto him , Rabbi , he that was with thee beyond Jordan , to whom thou barest witness , behold , the same baptizeth , and all men come to him .
text2: Əkkan Yaxya ənnan - as : « Əššik - nana , təkittəwa aləs wa dər təddewa fəl afay ən Yordan wen sen , aləs wədi as dana təmməgrada əddi ? Tahannaya ! Isalmaɣ aytedan daɣ aman əmərədda amaran kul takkin - tu ! »

text: John answered and said , A man can receive nothing , except it be given him from heaven .
text2: Ijjəwwab - asan Ɣaysa : « Awedan wər z - igrəw ar awa t - ikfa Məššina .

text: Ye yourselves bear me witness , that I said , I am not the Christ , but that I am sent before him .
text2: Kawanay iman - nawan təggəyyem - i as ənneɣ : " Wər əmosaɣ Əlməsix , mišan tiwazamazala - du dat - əs . "

text: He that hath the bride is the bridegroom : but the friend of the bridegroom , which standeth and heareth him , rejoiceth greatly because of the bridegroom ' s voice : this my joy therefore is fulfilled .
text2: Əmərmuš ənta əddi ilan təmərmušt , mišan əmidi n əmərmušt , mišan əmidi n əmərmuš inkad dagma - net , issisam - as , ikna tədəwit as isla y əməsli - net . Tədəwit di za šin - in , amaran əmərədda tənda .

text: He must increase , but I must decrease .
text2: Ənta a ihoran ad itəwəsəɣmər nak əməla daw - əs .

text: He that cometh from above is above all : he that is of the earth is earthly , and speaketh of the earth : he that cometh from heaven is above all .
text2: Wa d - igmadan afalla , ənta a ihhoken fəl awedan kul , wa ihan əddənet i n əddənet . Wa d - igmadan ijənnawan , ihhokat fəl awedan kul ,

text: And what he hath seen and heard , that he testifieth ; and no man receiveth his testimony .
text2: Iggəyyat s awa inay d awa as isla mišan waliyyan iqbalan təgəyya - net .

text: He that hath received his testimony hath set to his seal that God is true .
text2: Wa iqbalan təgəyya - net , isilakan awa inna Məššina .

text: The Father loveth the Son , and hath given all things into his hand .
text2: Abba ira Barar - net ig - as aratan kul daɣ əfus .

text: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life : and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life ; but the wrath of God abideth on him .
text2: Wa izzəgzanan əs Barar ən Məššina igraw təməddurt təɣla ̂ lat , wa ugayan s a sər - əs izzəgzən amaran alham ən Məššina iha dər - əs isəlsa . »

text: When therefore the Lord knew how the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John ,
text2: Əslan Farisaytan as itawannu Ɣaysa igarraw inalkiman ogarnen win n Yaxya isalmaq - qan daɣ aman . ( Arat wa imosan tidət as Ɣaysa iman - net wər isəlmiɣ awedan waliyyan daɣ aman , inalkiman - net a salmaɣnen daɣ aman . ) As isla Ɣaysa y awa itaqqalan , igmad amadal wa n Yahudəya , iqqal Galilaya .

text: And he must needs go through Samaria .
text2: Dad t - ilzam imur n amadal ən Samarəya ,

text: Then cometh he to a city of Samaria , which is called Sychar , near to the parcel of ground that Jacob gave to his son Joseph .
text2: os - in dagma ən Šixar , imosan aɣrəm ən Samarəya ihozan tawagost ta ikfa Yaqub i rures Yusəf .

text: Now Jacob ' s well was there . Jesus therefore , being wearied with his journey , sat thus on the well : and it was about the sixth hour .
text2: Edag wen ənta a iha əɣarus ən Yaqub . As d - osa Ɣaysa edag wen ammasnazal , iddaz əšikəl , iqqim fəl anu .

text: There cometh a woman of Samaria to draw water : Jesus saith unto her , Give me to drink .
text2: As əkkan nalkiman - net aɣrəm y a dd - azzanzin tet ̣ t ̣ ay , təwar - du təntut ən Kəl Samarəya du - təzragat anu en . Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Šašw - i - d ' . »

text: Then saith the woman of Samaria unto him , How is it that thou , being a Jew , askest drink of me , which am a woman of Samaria ? for the Jews have no dealings with the Samaritans .
text2: Tənn - as : « Kay təmosaɣ iyyan daɣ Kəl - Əlyəhud təgammaya daɣ - i aman , nak təmosat iyyat daɣ Kəl Samarəya ? »

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , If thou knewest the gift of God , and who it is that saith to thee , Give me to drink ; thou wouldest have asked of him , and he would have given thee living water .
text2: Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Ənnar təssanaɣ arat wa ihakku Məššina , amaran təssanaɣ awa əmosa nak wa kam itansayan aman ən tassay , tansiyaɣ - i - tan kam , akfaɣ - am - tan deɣ əmosan win sidurnen .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , thou hast nothing to draw with , and the well is deep : from whence then hast thou that living water ?
text2: Tənn - as təntut : « Əššix - in , anu i zagren amaran kay wər təleɣ aga , daɣ adi məni du - za - təgrəwaɣ aman win di sidurnen di ?

text: Art thou greater than our father Jacob , which gave us the well , and drank thereof himself , and his children , and his cattle ?
text2: Šigrat a təgeɣ əmaraw - nana Yaqub a danaɣ - ikfan anu a , išwa aman - net , əšwan - tan maddanəs d aharay - net ? »

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again :
text2: Ijjəwwab - as Ɣaysa : « I išwan aman di , ad t - iləs fad iguz ,

text: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst ; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life .
text2: mišan i išwan aman win tu - z - akfa , immizzay əd fad , fəlas a daɣ - as əqqəlan adri ingayan s aman win tu - hakkinen təməddurt ta təɣlalat . »

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , give me this water , that I thirst not , neither come hither to draw .
text2: Tənn - as təntut : « Akf - i daɣ aman win di , fəl a di - igməd fad , a du wər ələsaɣ azarog n anu a da . »

text: Jesus saith unto her , Go , call thy husband , and come hither .
text2: « Aglu » Inn - as Ɣaysa « Aɣrad - du aləs - nam təqqəlaɣ - i - du da da . »

text: The woman answered and said , I have no husband . Jesus said unto her , Thou hast well said , I have no husband :
text2: Tənn - as : « Wər əleɣ aləs . » Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Tidət - nam as tənne wər təleɣ aləs ,

text: For thou hast had five husbands ; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband : in that saidst thou truly .
text2: fəlas səmmos as kala tan - təle , amaran wa ɣur təlleɣ əmərədda wərgeɣ aləs - nam . Tidət a di - təge . »

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , I perceive that thou art a prophet .
text2: Təzzar tənn - as : « Əhannayaɣ as kay ənnəbi a təmosa .

text: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain ; and ye say , that in Jerusalem is the place where men ought to worship .
text2: Imarwan - nana adɣaɣ a da a fəl əɣbadan Məššina , mišan kawanay Kəl - Əlyəhud tənnam edag wa daɣ itawaɣbad Məššina wədi iha Yerusalam . »

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , believe me , the hour cometh , when ye shall neither in this mountain , nor yet at Jerusalem , worship the Father .
text2: « Tantut » inn - as Ɣaysa , « Zəgzən - i , alwaq izay - du a daɣ wər za təɣabbadam Abba gər za fəl ədɣaɣ wa , wala daɣ Yerusalam .

text: Ye worship ye know not what : we know what we worship : for salvation is of the Jews .
text2: Kawanay Kəl Samarəya wa təɣbadam wər tu - təzdayam , nakkanay Kəl - Əlyəhud wa nəɣbad nəzday - tu fəlas efsan iguz wa n Kəl - Əlyəhud a d - əgan .

text: But the hour cometh , and now is , when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth : for the Father seeketh such to worship him .
text2: Mišan alwaq izay - du - - amaran osa - ddu - - was inaɣbidan win tidət ad əɣbədan Abba s Infas wa Zəddigan əd tidət , fəlas Abba inaɣbidan win t - əɣbadnen əs təməwit ta , əntanay a ira .

text: God is a Spirit : and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth .
text2: Məššina Infas wa Zəddigan a imos , amaran inaɣbidan - net ihor ad t - əɣbədan s Infas wa Zəddigan əd tidət . »
column6: God is a Spirit : and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth .
column8: Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Imensewan - in wər tan - imos ar ad ammazala tara ən wa di - d - izammazalan , əɣrədaɣ əššəɣəl wa daɣ - i iga .

text: God is a Spirit : and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth .
text2: Məššina Infas wa Zəddigan a imos , amaran inaɣbidan - net ihor ad t - əɣbədan s Infas wa Zəddigan əd tidət . »
column6: God is a Spirit : and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth .
column8: Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Imensewan - in wər tan - imos ar ad ammazala tara ən wa di - d - izammazalan , əɣrədaɣ əššəɣəl wa daɣ - i iga .

text: The woman saith unto him , I know that Messias cometh , which is called Christ : when he is come , he will tell us all things .
text2: Tənn - as təntut : « Əssanaɣ as Əlməsix , itawann - as Kristos , a d - asu . As d - osa a danaɣ - isassagru aratan kul . »

text: Jesus saith unto her , I that speak unto thee am he .
text2: Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Nak a t - imosan , nak wa dam - iššewalan da . »

text: And upon this came his disciples , and marvelled that he talked with the woman : yet no man said , What seekest thou ? or , Why talkest thou with her ?
text2: Assaɣat ten ənta a d - əqqalan nalkiman , iqqan - asan eɣaf iməšawal wa iga əd təntut . Mišan wər tan - iha i ihalan ad t - issəstən , ann - as : « Ma daɣ as tare ? » madeɣ « Mafel tətiməšiwila dər - əs ? »

text: The woman then left her waterpot , and went her way into the city , and saith to the men ,
text2: Təzzar toya - ddu təntut tətəkint - net təqqal aɣrəm tənna y aytedan :

text: Come , see a man , which told me all things that ever I did : is not this the Christ ?
text2: « Ayewat ad tənəyam awedan a di - ima ̂ lan arat kul was kala ad t - əge , ifra ̂ g as ənta a imosan Əlməsix ! »

text: Then they went out of the city , and came unto him .
text2: Təzzar əgmadan - du aɣrəm əkkan Ɣaysa .

text: In the mean while his disciples prayed him , saying , Master , eat .
text2: As itagg ' awen inalkiman gammayan daɣ Ɣaysa ad atšu , gannan - as : « Əššix , atš ' arat iyyan . »

text: But he said unto them , I have meat to eat that ye know not of .
text2: Inn - asan : « Imensewan win z atša wər tan - təzdayam . »

text: Therefore said the disciples one to another , Hath any man brought him ought to eat ?
text2: Ad tənəmənnin nalkiman gar - essan : « Əngəm ɣas wərgeɣ awedan a das - d - ewayan imensewan ? »

text: Say not ye , There are yet four months , and then cometh harvest ? behold , I say unto you , Lift up your eyes , and look on the fields ; for they are white already to harvest .
text2: Kawanay wər təgənnim : " Əqqimnat - in əkkozat təlil y ad tagu ɣarat ? " Mišan nak ənneɣ - awan əswədat wəllen daɣ təwəgas ad tənəyam šiɣaɣanen əŋŋanat , wər ərenat ar əmiləy .

text: And he that reapeth receiveth wages , and gathereth fruit unto life eternal : that both he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together .
text2: Awedan wa italayan , wədi igraw ərruzmatan - net , išadaw šiɣaɣanen šin təməddurt ta təɣlalat . A di da a fəlas wa inabbalan əd wa italayan , ketnasan əddəwen .

text: And herein is that saying true , One soweth , and another reapeth .
text2: Fəlas tidət ən təmajəq ta təgannat : " Aləs iyyan inabbal , iyyan italay . "

text: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour : other men laboured , and ye are entered into their labours .
text2: Əssəglaq - qawan fəl ad taləyam tawagost daɣ wər təšɣelam , aytedan wiyyad a daɣ - as əšɣalnen , mišan təgrawam tənfa daɣ əššəɣəl wa əgan da . »

text: And many of the Samaritans of that city believed on him for the saying of the woman , which testified , He told me all that ever I did .
text2: Aytedan aggotnen ən Kəl Samarəya əzzəgzanan əs Ɣaysa fəlas tantut a dasan - tənnat : « Imal - i aratan win as kala tan - əge . »

text: So when the Samaritans were come unto him , they besought him that he would tarry with them : and he abode there two days .
text2: A di da a fəlas as t - id - osan əgmayan daɣ - as a ɣur - san aqqam , təzzar iqqim ɣur - san Ɣaysa har iga əššin adan .

text: And many more believed because of his own word ;
text2: Wiyyad aggotnen əzzəgzanan sər - əs fəl as əslan y awal - net ənta iman - net .

text: And said unto the woman , Now we believe , not because of thy saying : for we have heard him ourselves , and know that this is indeed the Christ , the Saviour of the world .
text2: Təzzar ənnan i təntut : « Nakkanay səket nəkna əzəgzan fəlas əstizarat kam ɣas a danaɣ - igan isalan , əmərədda iman - nana as das - nəsla , amaran nəssa ̂ n as tidət as ənta a imosan Ənəssefsi n əddənet .

text: Now after two days he departed thence , and went into Galilee .
text2: Dəffər əššin adan win di , ikka Ɣaysa amadal ən Galilaya ,

text: For Jesus himself testified , that a prophet hath no honour in his own country .
text2: fəlas ənta iman - net as inna , ənnəbi wər itəwəsəɣmir daɣ akal - net .

text: Then when he was come into Galilee , the Galilaeans received him , having seen all the things that he did at Jerusalem at the feast : for they also went unto the feast .
text2: As din - osa Galilaya əqbalan - tu Kəl Galilaya id əna ̂ yan imazalan kul win iga daɣ Yerusalam ɣur əmud wa n Akkay fəlas əntanay da osa ̂ n - t - in .

text: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee , where he made the water wine . And there was a certain nobleman , whose son was sick at Capernaum .
text2: Ilas - du assa ən Kana ta n Galilaya , ta daɣ isammattay aman ig - en esmad . Aɣrəm ən Kafarnahum ih - ay aləs imosan amaššaɣal n əmənokal . Aləs wen ila rures irinan .

text: When he heard that Jesus was come out of Judaea into Galilee , he went unto him , and besought him that he would come down , and heal his son : for he was at the point of death .
text2: As isla as Ɣaysa igma ̂ d - du amadal ən Yahudəya iha Galilaya , os - ay - du onsay - tu ad idawan , das - izzuzəy rures ɣur təlla təmattant .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Except ye see signs and wonders , ye will not believe .
text2: Inn - as Ɣaysa : « As wərgeɣ ad tənayam təlməɣjujaten , d alɣalamaten əmmittaynen , wər za təzzəgzənam fadda . »

text: The nobleman saith unto him , Sir , come down ere my child die .
text2: Inn - as amaššaɣal n əmənokal : « Məšš - i , ərəs - anaɣ əs Kafarnahum harwa ad wər aba barar - in . »

text: Jesus saith unto him , Go thy way ; thy son liveth . And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him , and he went his way .
text2: Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Aglu , rurek izzay . » Aləs deɣ izzəgzan s awal ən Ɣaysa , igla .

text: And as he was now going down , his servants met him , and told him , saying , Thy son liveth .
text2: Iha tarrayt iqqa ̂ l as immənay əd maššaɣalan - net das - d - əlkamnen . Ənnan - as : « Bara - nak izzay . »

text: Then inquired he of them the hour when he began to amend . And they said unto him , Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him .
text2: Issəstan - tan inn - asan : « Ma imos alwaq wa daɣ igraw iman - net ? » Ənnan - as : « Əndazəl iggi ən tazzar a fall - as təwat tanaday . »

text: So the father knew that it was at the same hour , in the which Jesus said unto him , Thy son liveth : and himself believed , and his whole house .
text2: Aləs deɣ ikta - ddu as alwaq wen da iman - net ɣur das - inna Ɣaysa : « Rurek izzay . » Izzəgzan sər - əs ənta d aɣaywan - net kul .

text: This is again the second miracle that Jesus did , when he was come out of Judaea into Galilee .
text2: Ənta da da təlməɣjujat ta təmosat alɣalamat ta n sanatat as immozal Ɣaysa daɣ Galilaya dəffər agamad - net Yahudəya .

text: Now there is at Jerusalem by the sheep market a pool , which is called in the Hebrew tongue Bethesda , having five porches .
text2: Aɣrəm wa n Yerusalam təh - ay təɣazart təhozat edag was itawannu təsəhərt ta n Ayfəd . Təɣazart ta esəm - net Betesda , daɣ təlɣabranit , amaran təlla gər səmmosat taliwen .

text: In these lay a great multitude of impotent folk , of blind , halt , withered , waiting for the moving of the water .
text2: Taliwen šin əsradan daw - əsnat miranan əmosnen iməddərɣal , əd məggudal , əd nəbdan . Əssigadan y ad əggəzan aman šin əmətəkwəy ,

text: For an angel went down at a certain season into the pool , and troubled the water : whosoever then first after the troubling of the water stepped in was made whole of whatsoever disease he had .
text2: fəlas əllan - tu mazayan daɣ d - itazabbat angalos iyyan n Əməli ad ijinəjərwəy aman ən təɣazart ten . Əmiran kul wa azzaran iguz - net dəffər ənəjərway wa təga da , wədi ad izzəy daɣ təwərna ta tu - təgrawat , a təqqal .

text: And a certain man was there , which had an infirmity thirty and eight years .
text2: Ənta edag wen ih - ay aləs igan karadat təmərwen n awatay d əttam irin .

text: When Jesus saw him lie , and knew that he had been now a long time in that case , he saith unto him , Wilt thou be made whole ?
text2: Ogg - ay Ɣaysa israd , ənta issan as iga təwərna tərəwat , təzzar issəstan - tu inn - as : « Awak təre təməzzəyt ? »

text: The impotent man answered him , Sir , I have no man , when the water is troubled , to put me into the pool : but while I am coming , another steppeth down before me .
text2: Inn - as əmiran wa : « Əššix , nak wər əleɣ awedan a di - igan daɣ təɣazart ta daɣ amazay wa daɣ tinəjərwəyan aman - net , amaran id əgmaya d iguz - net , a di - izar sər - əs awedan iyyan . »

text: Jesus saith unto him , Rise , take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Əbdəd , tədkəla təsalat - nak təjəwənke »

text: And immediately the man was made whole , and took up his bed , and walked : and on the same day was the sabbath .
text2: Amazay wen da daɣ izzay aləs en den , təzzar idkal təsalat - net ijawankat . Ənta arat wa itaggu daɣ əzəl ən təsanfawt ən Kəl - Əlyəhud .

text: The Jews therefore said unto him that was cured , It is the sabbath day : it is not lawful for thee to carry thy bed .
text2: Ənnan muzaran ən Kəl - Əlyəhud y aləs wa izzayan da : « Awa əzəl ən təsanfawt - nana , wər daɣ - as təle turagat n aggay ən təsalat - nak . »

text: He answered them , He that made me whole , the same said unto me , Take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Eges ya inn - asan aləs wen : « Aləs wa di - izzozayan , ənta di - innan : " Ədkəl təsalat - nak təjəwənke " . »

text: Then asked they him , What man is that which said unto thee , Take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: Ənnan - as : « Ma imos za aləs wa dak - innan : " Ədkəl təsalat - nak təjəwənke " ? »

text: And he that was healed wist not who it was : for Jesus had conveyed himself away , a multitude being in that place .
text2: Mišan ya , aləs wa izzayan da , wər t ' əhen salan n awa imos awedan wa , fəlas aytedan əknanen igət a əhanen edag wa daq - q - izzozay den , iras - tan Ɣaysa , ijawankat .

text: Afterward Jesus findeth him in the temple , and said unto him , Behold , thou art made whole : sin no more , lest a worse thing come unto thee .
text2: Dəffər awen ogaz - t - in Ɣaysa daɣ Ahan ən Məššina inn - as : « Səsəm . Kay da izzayan da əmərədda . Əɣrəd d igi ən bakkadan , a kay wər igrəw arat ogaran wa tallabəst . »

text: The man departed , and told the Jews that it was Jesus , which had made him whole .
text2: Ijawankat aləs wen təzzar imal i muzaran ən Kəl - Əlyəhud as Ɣaysa a t - izzozayan .

text: And therefore did the Jews persecute Jesus , and sought to slay him , because he had done these things on the sabbath day .
text2: Arat wa eway - du sər - san as əknan gezzar ən Ɣaysa fəlas əzəl ən təsanfawt daɣ ig ' awen .

text: But Jesus answered them , My Father worketh hitherto , and I work .
text2: Mišan inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Abba - nin faw da išɣa ̂ l , daɣ adi nak da əšɣa ̂ la . »

text: Therefore the Jews sought the more to kill him , because he not only had broken the sabbath , but said also that God was his Father , making himself equal with God .
text2: Batu ta , teway - du əs muzaran ən Kəl - Əlyəhud as əššotan daɣ agamay ən tanaɣay ən Ɣaysa , fəlas wərgeɣ əlqanun n əzəl ən təsanfawt ɣas a imməzray , kalar iššota - du fall - as as inn ' imos Məššina abba - net . Daɣ adi išaššagda iman - net əd Məššina .

text: Then answered Jesus and said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , The Son can do nothing of himself , but what he seeth the Father do : for what things soever he doeth , these also doeth the Son likewise .
text2: Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Əggəyyeɣ əsilakanaɣ - awan as Barar wər ifreg igi n arat waliyyan gar - es əd man - net . Wər itəggu ar arat was ihannay Abba - net itagg - ay . Amaran arat kul wa itaggu Abba , Barar da itagg - ay s asaway wen da .

text: For the Father loveth the Son , and sheweth him all things that himself doeth : and he will shew him greater works than these , that ye may marvel .
text2: Fəlas Abba ira Barar , amaran isakn - ay arat kul wa itaggu ; ad t - assaknu aratan ogarnen win da təla n almaɣna y a tan - agu , fəl ad tajəbam .

text: For as the Father raiseth up the dead , and quickeneth them ; even so the Son quickeneth whom he will .
text2: Əmmək wa daɣ - as d - isankar Abba inəmməttan itaggu daɣ - san iman , əmmək wa da as ihakku Barar ənta da təməddurt i was tat - ira .

text: For the Father judgeth no man , but hath committed all judgment unto the Son :
text2: Ənta Abba wər ixəkkəm y awedan waliyyan , inkar s əššəriɣa kul ig - ay daɣ əfus ən Barar

text: That all men should honour the Son , even as they honour the Father . He that honoureth not the Son honoureth not the Father which hath sent him .
text2: fəl ad əzzəzwəran aytedan kul Barar s əmmək was əzzəzwaran Abba . Awedan kul wa wər nəzzəzwar Barar , wədi wər izzəzwar Abba wa t - id - izammazalan .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that heareth my word , and believeth on him that sent me , hath everlasting life , and shall not come into condemnation ; but is passed from death unto life .
text2: « Əggəyyeɣ əsilakanaɣ - awan as awedan kul wa issəsaman i batuten - in , izzəgzan əs wa di - d - izammazalan , wədi igraw təməddurt ta təɣlalat . Wər z ' awwaddab , kalar təmattant a d - igmad əs təməddurt .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The hour is coming , and now is , when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of God : and they that hear shall live .
text2: Əggəyyeɣ əsilakanaɣ - awan as izay - du alwaq - - s ənta da da nəha da əmərədda - - alwaq wədi , aytedan win sər - i wər nəzzəgzan ad aslin y əməsli ən Barar ən Məššina , amaran win das - əslanen əkkəwanan - as ad əgrəwan təməddurt ta təɣlalat .

text: For as the Father hath life in himself ; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself ;
text2: Fəlas əmmək wa daɣ as ihakku Abba təməddurt , əmmək wədi daɣ as ikfa Barar fərregat n a tat - ihakku ənta da .

text: And hath given him authority to execute judgment also , because he is the Son of man .
text2: Amaran ikfa Barar turagat n əššəriɣa , fəlas imos Agg awedan .

text: Marvel not at this : for the hour is coming , in the which all that are in the graves shall hear his voice ,
text2: Ad wər əqqənan ɣafawan - nawan y arat wa : ilkam a d - awəd alwaq as inəmməttan kul win əhanen izəkwan , ad aslin y əməsli n Agg awedan

text: And shall come forth ; they that have done good , unto the resurrection of life ; and they that have done evil , unto the resurrection of damnation .
text2: əddi da du - z - əgmədan izəkwan - nasan . Win daɣ - san əganen aratan olaɣnen , a d - əgmədan izəkwan y a d ' ənkəran daɣ təmattant əgrəwan təməddurt , win əganen təkma amaran a d - əgmədan izəkwan y ad awwaddaban .

text: I can of mine own self do nothing : as I hear , I judge : and my judgment is just ; because I seek not mine own will , but the will of the Father which hath sent me .
text2: Wər t - illa arat as əfragaɣ igi - net gər - i əd man - in . Əššəriɣa wa tagga , əlkama daɣ - as y awa di - igannu Məššina , amaran əššəriɣa - nin oɣa ̂ d , fəlas wər əlkema y arat wa əre nak iman - in , kalar arat wa ira wa di - d - izammazalan ənta as əlkama .

text: If I bear witness of myself , my witness is not true .
text2: « As imos as nak ɣas - in as əggəyyeɣ i man - in , wədi təgəyya - nin wər təmos tidət .

text: There is another that beareth witness of me ; and I know that the witness which he witnesseth of me is true .
text2: Illat - tu wa di imosan təgəyya iyyat , amaran əssanaɣ as arat wa igannu daɣ talɣa - nin , imos tidət .

text: Ye sent unto John , and he bare witness unto the truth .
text2: Təssəglam inammazalan əs Yaxya , təzzar iggəyyat - asan fəl arat wa imosan tidət .

text: But I receive not testimony from man : but these things I say , that ye might be saved .
text2: Nak wər əddəraraɣ əs təgəyya n awedan . Arat wa wər tu - gənnaɣ ar fəl ad təgrəwam təsureft .

text: He was a burning and a shining light : and ye were willing for a season to rejoice in his light .
text2: Yaxya imos zun fətəla tərɣat təbilazlaz , amaran təqbalam ad tagim arat n assaɣat ən tədəwit daɣ ənnur - net .

text: But I have greater witness than that of John : for the works which the Father hath given me to finish , the same works that I do , bear witness of me , that the Father hath sent me .
text2: Mišan nak əle təgəyya togarat ta n Yaxya assahat : Əššəɣəlan win tagga , tan - imosan win as di - issəwar Abba amaknaw - nasan , əntanay a əmosnen təgəyya - nin , sitaddan as Abba di - d - izammazalan .

text: And the Father himself , which hath sent me , hath borne witness of me . Ye have neither heard his voice at any time , nor seen his shape .
text2: Abba iman - net wa di - d - izammazalan , ənta da iggiyyat - i . Wər kala ad təslam y əməsli - net wala tənayam azzat - net .

text: And ye have not his word abiding in you : for whom he hath sent , him ye believe not .
text2: Amaran awal - net wər iha iwallan - nawan , arat wədi isitadd - ay iba nəzəgzan - nawan əs wa d - izammazal .

text: Search the scriptures ; for in them ye think ye have eternal life : and they are they which testify of me .
text2: Tətaggam i kətban teɣaray təgat s ənnəzər fəlas təɣilam sər - san təgrəwam təməddurt ta təɣlalat . Ikətban win təɣarrim da , əntanay iman - nasan as fall - i əggəyyen .

text: And ye will not come to me , that ye might have life .
text2: Eges wər tərem a di - du - takkim y ad təgrəwam təməddurt .

text: I receive not honour from men .
text2: Nak wər gəmməyaɣ ətəwəzəzwar ɣur aytedan .

text: But I know you , that ye have not the love of God in you .
text2: Əzdayaq - qawan : əssanaɣ as iman - nawan wər tan - təha tara i Məššina .

text: I am come in my Father ' s name , and ye receive me not : if another shall come in his own name , him ye will receive .
text2: Nak Abba - nin a di - d - issəglan mišan wər tərem əlqəbulat - in . Amaran as kawan d - osa awedan iyyan a d - iglan gar - es əd man - net , a tu - təqbəlam !

text: How can ye believe , which receive honour one of another , and seek not the honour that cometh from God only ?
text2: Təram ad tətinəməsəɣmiram gar - ewwan , eges wər tərem saɣmar wa d - ifalan Məššina di n iyyan . Daɣ adi manəmmək as za təzzəgzənam ?

text: Do not think that I will accuse you to the Father : there is one that accuseth you , even Moses , in whom ye trust .
text2: Ad wər təɣilam a kawan - əssəwəra lahan ɣur Abba - nin . Ənnəbi Musa ənta kawan z - issəwəran lahan , ənta wa daɣ təgam attama - nawan .

text: For had ye believed Moses , ye would have believed me : for he wrote of me .
text2: Ənnar təzzigzanam əs Musa , təzzəgzənam sər - i nak da , fəlas immigrad fall - i daɣ kətban - net .

text: But if ye believe not his writings , how shall ye believe my words ?
text2: Mišan dad imos as wər təzzəgzanam əs kətban - net , manəmmək as za təzzəgzənam awa ganna ? »

text: And a great multitude followed him , because they saw his miracles which he did on them that were diseased .
text2: Təlkam - as tiddawat tagget , fəlas aytedan əhannayan alɣalamaten šin as immozal əmosnen əmmək was izzozay imiranan .

text: And Jesus went up into a mountain , and there he sat with his disciples .
text2: Iggəzzay Ɣaysa adɣaɣ , təzzar iqqim den da ənta əd nalkiman - net .

text: And the passover , a feast of the Jews , was nigh .
text2: As itagg ' awen da amud wa n Akkay ihoz - du .

text: When Jesus then lifted up his eyes , and saw a great company come unto him , he saith unto Philip , Whence shall we buy bread , that these may eat ?
text2: Iswad Ɣaysa ogga aytedan əknanen igət əzayan - t - idu , inna i Filibbus : « Məni du - za - nazzanzu tagəlla ətšan aytedan en kul ? »

text: And this he said to prove him : for he himself knew what he would do .
text2: Əsəstan wa as t - iga Ɣaysa da issa ̂ n arat was otas igi - net . A ira ɣas ad issən awa das z - annu Filibbus .

text: Philip answered him , Two hundred pennyworth of bread is not sufficient for them , that every one of them may take a little .
text2: Inna Filibbus i Ɣaysa : « kud du - nəzzənza tagəlla n əzrəf ən sanatat təmad n əzəl n əššəɣəl da wər dasan - za - tawəd wala arat ən tattay . »

text: One of his disciples , Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother , saith unto him ,
text2: Inn - as ənalkim - net iyyan wa igan Andrawəs wa n amadray ən Simɣon Butros :

text: There is a lad here , which hath five barley loaves , and two small fishes : but what are they among so many ?
text2: « Illa arat ən barar da ila ̂ n səmmosat təgəlwen n əššəɣir d əššin kifitan , mišan ya ma za aknin y aytedan ogda ̂ nen d awa ? »

text: And Jesus said , Make the men sit down . Now there was much grass in the place . So the men sat down , in number about five thousand .
text2: Inna Ɣaysa : « Saɣɣamiwat aytedan kul . » Təzzar əqqiman aytedan kul əhan - tan amadal ən səmmos gim n aləs . Edag wen idnay yel .

text: And Jesus took the loaves ; and when he had given thanks , he distributed to the disciples , and the disciples to them that were set down ; and likewise of the fishes as much as they would .
text2: Obaz - du Ɣaysa šigəlwen šin den . As iɣrad igi ən godan i Məššina təzzar izun - tanat y aytedan kul win əqqimnen den . Ikf - en ənta da awa əran daɣ kifitan .

text: When they were filled , he said unto his disciples , Gather up the fragments that remain , that nothing be lost .
text2: As əyyəwanan aytedan inna Ɣaysa i nalkiman - net : « Šidəwat - du awa d - əglazan , fəl a daɣ - as wər ixšəd wala . »

text: Therefore they gathered them together , and filled twelve baskets with the fragments of the five barley loaves , which remained over and above unto them that had eaten .
text2: Əɣradan - tan - du əkəmmi təzzar ədnayan maraw əzmaman d əššin daɣ karammutan ən səmmosat təgəlwen šinad n əššəɣir a da dəffər as daɣ - asnat əyyəwanan aytedan .

text: Then those men , when they had seen the miracle that Jesus did , said , This is of a truth that prophet that should come into the world .
text2: As ənayan aytedan win alɣalamat tas immozal Ɣaysa da , təzzar ad gannin : « Igmad aššak as aləs wa ənta a imosan ənnəbi wa du - z - asin əddənet ! »

text: When Jesus therefore perceived that they would come and take him by force , to make him a king , he departed again into a mountain himself alone .
text2: Issan Ɣaysa as aytedan win ad t - abəzan šəhhəšəlan - tu tišit n əmənokal , təzzar ilas - tan efel , ikk ' edag iyyan daɣ ədɣaɣ en da , ɣas - net .

text: And when even was now come , his disciples went down unto the sea ,
text2: As təga takəst zagadayan nalkiman - net s agaraw ,

text: And entered into a ship , and went over the sea toward Capernaum . And it was now dark , and Jesus was not come to them .
text2: əggazan taɣlalt təzzar əssəwalan agaraw y ad əɣrəsan əs Kafarnahum . Ehad iga ̂ , amaran Ɣaysa wər tan - in - ewed harwa da .

text: And the sea arose by reason of a great wind that blew .
text2: Igar - du adu issohen təzzar ad tanastaban aman n agaraw .

text: So when they had rowed about five and twenty or thirty furlongs , they see Jesus walking on the sea , and drawing nigh unto the ship : and they were afraid .
text2: As əgan nalkiman ən Ɣaysa edag ən səmmos kilawtan madeɣ sədis n əšikəl , oggan Ɣaysa daɣ ihəz ijiwankat - du fəl aman izay - du taɣlalt ta han , təzzar təggaz - tan tasa .

text: But he saith unto them , It is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Mišan inn - asan : « A kawan wər təggəz tasa , awa nakku ! »

text: Then they willingly received him into the ship : and immediately the ship was at the land whither they went .
text2: Gammayan d a t - id - əzzugəzan taɣlalt den da , wal ' a ihogan tewad dər - san edag wa əkkan .

text: The day following , when the people which stood on the other side of the sea saw that there was none other boat there , save that one whereinto his disciples were entered , and that Jesus went not with his disciples into the boat , but that his disciples were gone away alone ;
text2: As əzəl wa hadan təgr - in tiddawat ta təwarat efay n agaraw wa wen sen as taɣlalt iyyadda ɣas a təllat den əndazəl , amaran əssanan as Ɣaysa wər inamaggaz taɣlalt ta əd nalkiman - net . Əssanan ənta da as inalkiman - net ɣas - nasan as əglan .

text: ( Howbeit there came other boats from Tiberias nigh unto the place where they did eat bread , after that the Lord had given thanks : )
text2: Ənzaynat - du šiyyad a d - əfalnen aɣrəm wa n Tiberəyad . Osanat - du dagma n adag wa daɣ tətša tiddawat tagəlla dəffər godan win iga Ɣaysa y Əməli .

text: When the people therefore saw that Jesus was not there , neither his disciples , they also took shipping , and came to Capernaum , seeking for Jesus .
text2: As din - təgra tiddawat as Ɣaysa wər illa den ənta wala inalkiman - net , təggaz šiɣlalen šin den y ad təsəssəggəl Ɣaysa əs təɣrəmt ta n Kafarnahum .

text: And when they had found him on the other side of the sea , they said unto him , Rabbi , when camest thou hither ?
text2: Əgrawan - tu fəl afay n agaraw wa hadan təzzar ənnan - as : « Əmmay du - tose da , ya Əššix ? »

text: Jesus answered them and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Ye seek me , not because ye saw the miracles , but because ye did eat of the loaves , and were filled .
text2: Ig - asan Ɣaysa aljawab wa : « Əggəyye silakanaɣ - awan as wər di - təsəggədam ar fəl as tətšam tagəlla har daɣ - as təyyəwanam , wərgeɣ aššaddat n əgərri n almaɣna n alɣalamaten šin as əmmozala a fəl di - təlkamam .

text: Labour not for the meat which perisheth , but for that meat which endureth unto everlasting life , which the Son of man shall give unto you : for him hath God the Father sealed .
text2: Ayyat əššəɣəl daɣ agamay ən mensewan win ɣaššadnen , gammayat imensewan win tahaginen , hakkin təməddurt ta təɣlalat . Imensewan win Ag Awedan dawan - tan - z - akfin fəlas ənta a issəwar Məššina di n Abba ejwal wa n taɣmar - net .

text: Then said they unto him , What shall we do , that we might work the works of God ?
text2: Əssəstanan - tu ənnan - as : « Məni za arat was ihor a tu - nagu fəl ad naknu əššəɣəlan win ira Məššina ? »

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , This is the work of God , that ye believe on him whom he hath sent .
text2: Ijjəwwab - asan Ɣaysa inn - asan : « Əššəɣəl wa daɣ - wan ira Məššina , wər t - imos ar ad təzzəgzənam əs wa d - issəgla . »

text: They said therefore unto him , What sign shewest thou then , that we may see , and believe thee ? what dost thou work ?
text2: Əlasan - tu əsəstan ənnan - as : « Ma təmos za alɣalamat tas dana - za - tammazala fəl a sər - ək nəzzəgzən ? Məni awa za taga ? »

text: Our fathers did eat manna in the desert ; as it is written , He gave them bread from heaven to eat .
text2: Imarawan - nanaɣ ətšan daɣ taneray amensay wa n Manna . Arat da wa iktaban daɣ batu tədi : « Iššətš - en amensay wa d - ifalan ijənnawan . »

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Moses gave you not that bread from heaven ; but my Father giveth you the true bread from heaven .
text2: Təzzar ijjəwwab - asan Ɣaysa inn - asan : « Əggəyyeɣ silakanaɣ - awan as wərge Musa kawan - ikfan amensay wa d - ifalan ijənnawan . Abba - nin ənta kawan ihakkin amensay wa d - ifalan ijənnawan , imos amensay wa n tidət .

text: For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven , and giveth life unto the world .
text2: « Fəlas amensay wa d - igmadan ijənnawan , ənta a d - ifalan Məššina , amaran ənta a ihakkin təməddurt y əddənet . »

text: Then said they unto him , Lord , evermore give us this bread .
text2: Ənnan - as : « Əməli , hakk - ana amensay wədi faw . »

text: And Jesus said unto them , I am the bread of life : he that cometh to me shall never hunger ; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst .
text2: Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Nak a imosan amensay wa ihakkin taməddurt ta təɣlalat . Wa di - d - ikkan wər da - as ilkem ad t - iggaz gələk , amaran wa sər - i izzəgzanan wər daɣ - as ilkem ad t - iggaz fad .

text: But I said unto you , That ye also have seen me , and believe not .
text2: Mišan əmalaɣ - awan arat wa : tənayam - i eges wər təzzəgzanam .

text: All that the Father giveth me shall come to me ; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out .
text2: Awedan kul wa di - ikfa Abba a di - d - asu , wər ilkem ad əstaɣaɣ i di - d - ikkan ;

text: For I came down from heaven , not to do mine own will , but the will of him that sent me .
text2: fəlas əzəbbi a d - əgeɣ daɣ ijənnawan fəl ad ammazala s arat wa ira wa di - d - issəglan , wərgeɣ arat wa əre nak iman - in .

text: And this is the Father ' s will which hath sent me , that of all which he hath given me I should lose nothing , but should raise it up again at the last day .
text2: Ənta wa di - d - izammazalan wər ira ad ixrək waliyyan daɣ win di - ikfa , kalar a ira a tan - d - əssənkəra daɣ təmattant əzəl a ilkaman .

text: And this is the will of him that sent me , that every one which seeth the Son , and believeth on him , may have everlasting life : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Awalla , ənta da tara n Abba - nin : Aytedan kul win di - ənaynen nak wa n Barar , əzzəgzanan sər - i , əntanay a z - əgrəwnen təməddurt ta təɣlalat , əssənkəraq - qan - du daɣ təmattant , əzəl a ilkaman .

text: The Jews then murmured at him , because he said , I am the bread which came down from heaven .
text2: Təzzar ad tigətəntinan Kəl - Əlyəhud əhan batu - net fəl as inna : « Nak a imosan amensay wa d - izzəbben daɣ jənnawan . »

text: And they said , Is not this Jesus , the son of Joseph , whose father and mother we know ? how is it then that he saith , I came down from heaven ?
text2: Gannin : « Awak awen wərge Ɣaysa wa n ag Yusəf , nəkna təməzdəyt n abba - net d anna - net , məni əmmək was du - z - inkər əmərədda ad igannu ijənnawan daɣ d - izzəbbat ? »

text: Jesus therefore answered and said unto them , Murmur not among yourselves .
text2: Ijjəwwab - asan Ɣaysa inn - asan : « Ayyiwat əgətəntən gar - ewan .

text: No man can come to me , except the Father which hath sent me draw him : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Wər t - illa i di - du - z - akkin ar s a t - id - ilway sər - i Abba wa di - d - issəglan . Nak amaran əsənkər a t - idu - z - aga daɣ təmattant daɣ əzəl a ilkaman .

text: It is written in the prophets , And they shall be all taught of God . Every man therefore that hath heard , and hath learned of the Father , cometh unto me .
text2: Ikətban n ənnəbitan ih - en as : " Ketnasan a tan - isassaɣru Məššina " . Awedan kul wa islan awa d - ifalan Abba , təzzar irda s awa isassaɣra wədi a di - d - akku .

text: Not that any man hath seen the Father , save he which is of God , he hath seen the Father .
text2: Wər t - illa is kala ad inay Məššina di n Abba ar wa t - id - ifalan . Wədi inay Abba .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me hath everlasting life .
text2: « Əggəyyeɣ əsilakanaɣ - awan as i izzəgzanan ad igrəw təməddurt ta təɣlalat .

text: I am that bread of life .
text2: Nak a imosan amensay wa ihakkin təməddurt .

text: Your fathers did eat manna in the wilderness , and are dead .
text2: Imarawan - nawan ətšan Manna daɣ taneray mišan wər dasan - igdel awen təmattant .

text: This is the bread which cometh down from heaven , that a man may eat thereof , and not die .
text2: As ig ' awen amensay was ganna nak , ijənnawan a daɣ d - izzəbbat y as i t - itšan wər tu - z - iba .

text: I am the living bread which came down from heaven : if any man eat of this bread , he shall live for ever : and the bread that I will give is my flesh , which I will give for the life of the world .
text2: Nak a imosan amensay wa d - izzebben daɣ jənnawan ihakku taməddurt . Awedan kul wa itšan amensay wa , wədi ad iddər har faw . Amaran isan - in a mosnen imensewan win z ' akfa fəl ad təgrəw əddənet təməddurt . »

text: The Jews therefore strove among themselves , saying , How can this man give us his flesh to eat ?
text2: Ad tamastanan Kəl - Əlyəhud gar - essan gannan : « Manəmmək as dana - z - akfu awedan wa isan - net natš - en ? »

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except ye eat the flesh of the Son of man , and drink his blood , ye have no life in you .
text2: Təzzar inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Awalla , əggəyyeɣ əsilakanaɣ - awan a ̂ s as wər tətšem isan ən Barar n Awedan , tašwin ənta da azni - net , wər dawan - tu - təlla təməddurt .

text: Whoso eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , hath eternal life ; and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Awedan wa itšan isan - in išwa ənta da azni - nin , wədi igra ̂ w təməddurt ta təɣlalat , amaran a t - id - əssənkəra daɣ təmattant ɣur əzəl a ilkaman .

text: For my flesh is meat indeed , and my blood is drink indeed .
text2: Fəlas isan - in əmosan amensay wa n tidət , azni - nin da imos aman ən tassay win tidət .

text: He that eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , dwelleth in me , and I in him .
text2: Awedan wa itšan isan - in , išwa azni - nin , wədi irtay dər - i , nak deɣ əheɣ əwəl - net .

text: As the living Father hath sent me , and I live by the Father : so he that eateth me , even he shall live by me .
text2: Əmmək was Abba wa di - d - issəglan ənta a ihakkin təməddurt , amaran ənta a di - issodaran , əmmək di daɣ as wa itšan isan - in a sər - i iddər .

text: This is that bread which came down from heaven : not as your fathers did eat manna , and are dead : he that eateth of this bread shall live for ever .
text2: Amensay wa ijənnawan daɣ d - izzəbbat . Wər ola əd wa ətšan marawan - nawan fəlas wər dasan - igdel adi tamattant . Awedan wa itšan amensay wa , wədi ad igrəw təməddurt təɣla ̂ lat . »

text: These things said he in the synagogue , as he taught in Capernaum .
text2: Arat da da wa inna Ɣaysa assaɣa wa ad isassaɣra daɣ ahan n əlɣibada ən Kəl - Əlyəhud daɣ əɣrəm wa n Kafarnahum .

text: Many therefore of his disciples , when they had heard this , said , This is an hard saying ; who can hear it ?
text2: As əslan nalkiman - net aggotnen y əsəssəɣri wa itaggu da ənnan : « Batu ta ši labasat , izzəwat əzəgzan - net . Ma ifragan əlqəbulat - net ? »

text: When Jesus knew in himself that his disciples murmured at it , he said unto them , Doth this offend you ?
text2: Ɣaysa issan daɣ man - net as inalkiman - net gitantanan gar - essan daɣ talɣa ten , təzzar inn - asan : « Əngəm əzəgzan - nawan a tədas batu ta ? »

text: What and if ye shall see the Son of man ascend up where he was before ?
text2: Ma za tagim za as toggam Barar n Awedan itagazzay s adag wa iha əstizarat ?

text: It is the spirit that quickeneth ; the flesh profiteth nothing : the words that I speak unto you , they are spirit , and they are life .
text2: Infas wa Zəddigan a isiduran . Awedan iman - net , wər imos wala . Awalan win dawan - əgeɣ , hakkan Infas wa Zəddigan əd təməddurt .

text: But there are some of you that believe not . For Jesus knew from the beginning who they were that believed not , and who should betray him .
text2: Mišan əhan - kawan wiyyad wər nəzzəgzan . » Ɣaysa harwa ɣur tizarat da issan win wər nəzzəgzan , issan ənta da wa tu - z - agin daɣ fassan .

text: And he said , Therefore said I unto you , that no man can come unto me , except it were given unto him of my Father .
text2: Inn - asan tolas : « Adi da a fəl dawan - ənne : " Wər t - illa i ifragan a di - d - akku ar s ad t - ikfa Abba fərregat n adi . »

text: From that time many of his disciples went back , and walked no more with him .
text2: Den da dəffər - əs ifal a əggen daɣ nalkiman - net , əɣradan əd tidawt - net .

text: Then said Jesus unto the twelve , Will ye also go away ?
text2: Təzzar inna Ɣaysa i nalkiman win maraw d əššin : « Meqqal kawanay da təram teklay ? »

text: Then Simon Peter answered him , Lord , to whom shall we go ? thou hast the words of eternal life .
text2: Ijjəwwab - as Simɣon Butros inn - as : « Əməli , ma imos wa za nakku ? Kay a itaggan awalan win əhakkanen təməddurt ta təɣlalat .

text: And we believe and are sure that thou art that Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Nakkanay nəzzigzan sər - ək , nəssan as kay Əmizdag a d - ifalan Məššina . »

text: Jesus answered them , Have not I chosen you twelve , and one of you is a devil ?
text2: Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Ak wərgeɣ əsənnəfrən a kawan - əge ketnawan , fəl maraw - ewwan d əššin ? As iga awen da iyyan daɣ - wan imos aššayatin . »

text: He spake of Judas Iscariot the son of Simon : for he it was that should betray him , being one of the twelve .
text2: Batu ta Yahuza wa n ag Simɣon Isxarəyuti a fəl tat - iga Ɣaysa . Fəlas Yahuza tu z - agin daɣ fassan da imos iyyan daɣ nalkiman a n maraw d əššin .

text: Now the Jews ' feast of tabernacles was at hand .
text2: As ig ' awen ihoz - du əmud ən Kəl - Əlyəhud was itawannu wa n təkarbanen .

text: His brethren therefore said unto him , Depart hence , and go into Judaea , that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest .
text2: Ənnan - as mədrayan - net : « Əfəl da takka akal wa n Yahudəya fəl ad ənəyan nalkiman - nak əššəɣəlan win tətagga .

text: For there is no man that doeth any thing in secret , and he himself seeketh to be known openly . If thou do these things , shew thyself to the world .
text2: Awedan as ira fall - as tagu masnat wər išəqqəl daɣ əssir . Dad zama as tətaggaɣ aratan ogdanen d awa , wədi agu təməwit ta fəl tan - z - inəy awedan kul . »

text: For neither did his brethren believe in him .
text2: Ənta imədrayan ən Ɣaysa iman - nasan da wər sər - əs əzzəgzanan .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , My time is not yet come : but your time is alway ready .
text2: Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Assaɣat ta - nin harwada wər du - tewed . Kawanay amaran wər təzlayam assaɣaten .

text: The world cannot hate you ; but me it hateth , because I testify of it , that the works thereof are evil .
text2: Wər t - illa əddəlil fəl kawan - za - təgzər əddənet . Nak amaran əddənet təgzar - i fəlas əmosa təgəyya y arak mazalan win daɣ - as tagginen .

text: Go ye up unto this feast : I go not up yet unto this feast ; for my time is not yet full come .
text2: Akkiwat amud wen kawanay . Nak wər t - əkke fəlas assaɣat - in harwada wər du - tewed . »

text: When he had said these words unto them , he abode still in Galilee .
text2: As dasan - iɣrad tənna n aratan win , təzzar iqqim - du daɣ Galilaya .

text: But when his brethren were gone up , then went he also up unto the feast , not openly , but as it were in secret .
text2: Dər iga awen da ya as əkkan mədrayan - net amud , ikk - ay ənta da , eges iki wa zun as iga daɣ əssir , fəlas wər issəkna iman - net y aytedan .

text: Then the Jews sought him at the feast , and said , Where is he ?
text2: Itaggu əmud den da sasaggalan - tu muzaran ən Kəl - Əlyəhud gannan : « Ma iga aləs a ? »

text: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him : for some said , He is a good man : others said , Nay ; but he deceiveth the people .
text2: As iga awen tənka ̂ r təmazaq gər aytedan daɣ talɣa ən Ɣaysa . Wiyyad za gannan : « Aləs di ola ̂ ɣ . » Wiyyad amaran gannan : « Kalar əsəxrək fadda a itaggu tamattay . »

text: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews .
text2: Mišan wər t - illa awedan ihalan amagrad dat aytedan daɣ talɣa - net , fəl təksəda ən muzaran ən Kəl - Əlyəhud .

text: Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple , and taught .
text2: As isaggaraygaray əmud iggəzzay Ɣaysa s Ahan ən Məššina ad isasaɣru aytedan .

text: And the Jews marvelled , saying , How knoweth this man letters , having never learned ?
