text2: Arat wa iqqan iɣafawan ən Kəl - Əlyəhud wəllen har əqqiman gannin : « Məni esaway was issan awedan wa aratan win , ənta wər iɣra ? »

text: Jesus answered them , and said , My doctrine is not mine , but his that sent me .
text2: Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Əsəssəɣri - nin wərge nak a d - ifal , kalar wa di - d - izammazalan a d - ifal .

text: If any man will do his will , he shall know of the doctrine , whether it be of God , or whether I speak of myself .
text2: Awedan kul wa iran ad ammazal tara ən Məššina , wədi ad issən kud əsəssəɣri wa ənta a d - ifal wala deɣ nak t - id - iktan gər - i əd man - in .

text: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory : but he that seeketh his glory that sent him , the same is true , and no unrighteousness is in him .
text2: Awedan wa iššewalan s esəm - net ənta ɣas , wədi iman - net as igammay ətəwəsəɣmar . Mišan awedan wa išɣalan daɣ əsənnəfiləl ən tarna ən wa t - id - issəglan , wədi tidət a immal , wər daɣ - as t - illa a imosan lahan .

text: Did not Moses give you the law , and yet none of you keepeth the law ? Why go ye about to kill me ?
text2: Musa wərgeɣ ikf - iwan əlqanun ? Eges əlqanun wa wər kawan - iha i das - ilkaman . Mafel as təram a di - tanɣim ? »

text: The people answered and said , Thou hast a devil : who goeth about to kill thee ?
text2: Tənn - as tamattay : « Kay aggəsuf a kay - izdaɣan . Ma imos wa iran tenaɣay - nak ? »

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , I have done one work , and ye all marvel .
text2: Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Nak təlməɣjujat iyyadda ɣas a əmmozala , mišan əqqanan - as ɣafawan - nawan .

text: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision ; ( not because it is of Moses , but of the fathers ; ) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man .
text2: Musa omar - kawan s əsəmmənkəd ən bararan - nawan , ( as ig ' awen da imarawan - nana a t - id - əssəntanen , wərge Musa ) , amaran wər fall - awan imos lahan ad təsəmmənkədam barar daɣ əzəl wa n təsanfawt - nawan .

text: If a man on the sabbath day receive circumcision , that the law of Moses should not be broken ; are ye angry at me , because I have made a man every whit whole on the sabbath day ?
text2: Ənəyat za , dad imos as itawasamankad barar daɣ əzəl ən təsanfawt fəl ləkkum y Əlqanun wa n Musa , mafel as kawan - iha alham - in fəla ̇ s əgeɣ y awedan əzuzəy ikma ̂ lan daɣ əzəl ən təsanfawt ?

text: Judge not according to the appearance , but judge righteous judgment .
text2: Ayyiwat axakam n aratan s awa təhannayam daɣ azzahir . Kalar xakkamat - tan əs təməwit təzilalaɣat . »

text: Then said some of them of Jerusalem , Is not this he , whom they seek to kill ?
text2: As t - oggan arat daɣ aytedan win Yerusalam ad gannin : « Aləs wen wərgeɣ ənta as əran muzaran - nana tenaɣay - net ?

text: But , lo , he speaketh boldly , and they say nothing unto him . Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ ?
text2: Amaran ənta da əmərədda iššewalan da dat awedan kul , wər t - illa i das - igannin wala ! Ak immikkan imuzaran - nanaɣ a sallakannen as ənta a imosan Əlməsix ?

text: Howbeit we know this man whence he is : but when Christ cometh , no man knoweth whence he is .
text2: Mišan ya aləs wa nəssan akal wa d - ifal , as ig ' awen Əlməsix assaɣa wa du - z - asu , wər t - illa awedan a z - issənan da du - z - ifəl . »

text: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught , saying , Ye both know me , and ye know whence I am : and I am not come of myself , but he that sent me is true , whom ye know not .
text2: Ɣaysa harwa da isasaɣru daɣ Ahan ən Məššina , idkal əməsli - net wəllen inna : « Təzdayam - i təssanam sas d - əhe ! As ig ' awen da wər d - ose gər - i əd man - in : mišan wa di - d - issəglan tidət a imos amaran wər tu - təzdayam .

text: But I know him : for I am from him , and he hath sent me .
text2: Nak əzdayaq - qu , fəlas ənta sər - wan d - əfala , amaran ənta di - d - izammazalan . »

text: Then they sought to take him : but no man laid hands on him , because his hour was not yet come .
text2: Təzzar əgmayan d abbaz - net mišan wər tan - iha i t - idasan , fəlas alwaq - net a du - wər - newed harwada .

text: And many of the people believed on him , and said , When Christ cometh , will he do more miracles than these which this man hath done ?
text2: As ig ' awen da ya izzigzan sər - əs a aggen daɣ tiddawat ten , gannin : « Tordam as kud d - osa Əlməsix ifrag igi n alɣalamaten ogarnen šin iga aləs wa ? »

text: The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him ; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him .
text2: Arat wa simətəktikan aytedan daɣ tiddawat ta , əslan - tu Farisaytan . Ənkaran limaman win zawwarnen , əd Farisaytan əssəglan - du imagazan n Ahan ən Məššina y ad abəzan Ɣaysa .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Yet a little while am I with you , and then I go unto him that sent me .
text2: Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Nak harwa da əddewa dər - wan har arat ən tamert , dəffər adi ad akka wa di - d - izammazalan .

text: Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come .
text2: A di - təsasaggalam mišan wər di - za - təgrəwam fəlas edag wa z ' akka wər təfregam iki - net . »

text: Then said the Jews among themselves , Whither will he go , that we shall not find him ? will he go unto the dispersed among the Gentiles , and teach the Gentiles ?
text2: Ad tinəməsəstinan Kəl - Əlyəhud , gannin : « Ma imos adag wa z ' akku daq - qu wər za nəgrəw ? Meqqal Kəl - Əlyəhud win wazawaznen daɣ kallan win tama a z - akku iggəz - tan amaran ad isasaɣru aytedan win wər nəmos Kəl - Əlyəhud ?

text: What manner of saying is this that he said , Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come ?
text2: Ma imos almaɣna ən batu ta iga da , as inna : " A di - təsasaggalam mišan wər di - za - təgrəwam , fəlas wər təfregam iki n adag wa əhe " ? »

text: In the last day , that great day of the feast , Jesus stood and cried , saying , If any man thirst , let him come unto me , and drink .
text2: As d - ewad əzəl wa ilkaman , s ənta a imosan əzəl wa zəwwaran daɣ əmud , ibdad Ɣaysa dat tiddawat iqqərra s əməsli idka ̂ lan inna : « Awedan kul wa iffudan akkiwet - i - du ad ašəw .

text: He that believeth on me , as the scripture hath said , out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water .
text2: Awedan kul wa sər - i izzəgzanan " ad əngəyan gərwan n aman win sidurnen daɣ əwəl - net " , s əmmək wa imal Akatab . »

text: ( But this spake he of the Spirit , which they that believe on him should receive : for the Holy Ghost was not yet given ; because that Jesus was not yet glorified . )
text2: Infas wa Zəddigan fəl imməgrad Ɣaysa den , s ənta a z ' əgrəwan aytedan win sər - əs əzzəgzannen . Azzaman en Infas wa Zəddigan wər itawagraw fəlas Ɣaysa harwada wər igrew adkul .

text: Many of the people therefore , when they heard this saying , said , Of a truth this is the Prophet .
text2: Edes n aytedan ən tiddawat ten , as əslan i batuten šin iga Ɣaysa da ənnan : « Illikan as aləs wa ənta a imosan Ənnəbi wa ittəmalan ! »

text: Others said , This is the Christ . But some said , Shall Christ come out of Galilee ?
text2: Ənnan wəyyad : « Əlməsix awa ! » Ənnan - asan wəyyad : « Manəmmək as du - z - igməd Əlməsix Galilaya ?

text: Hath not the scripture said , That Christ cometh of the seed of David , and out of the town of Bethlehem , where David was ?
text2: Akatab wərgeɣ a inna : " Əzzurrəyya ən Dawəd , əd təɣrəmt ən Betlexem s ənta as kala daɣ - as iɣsar Dawəd , a du - z - igməd Əlməsix " . »

text: So there was a division among the people because of him .
text2: Əmmək wen daɣ as təzun tiddawat daɣ talɣa ən Ɣaysa .

text: And some of them would have taken him ; but no man laid hands on him .
text2: Wiyyad daɣ - san əran abbaz - net , mišan wər tan - iha is t - idas əfus - net .

text: Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees ; and they said unto them , Why have ye not brought him ?
text2: Təzzar əglan magazan n Ahan ən Məššina əqqalan ilimaman win zawwarnen , əd Farisaytan . Osan - in ɣas ənnan - asan : « Mafel wər t - idu - tewayam ? »

text: The officers answered , Never man spake like this man .
text2: Ənnan - asan magazan : « Wər kala itawanay awedan igan awal olan əd wa iga aləs en . »

text: Then answered them the Pharisees , Are ye also deceived ?
text2: Ənnan - asan Farisaytan : « Daɣ adi kawanay da toyyam iman - nawan tətawasaxrakam ?

text: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him ?
text2: Əssənat ill - ay i sər - əs izzigzanan daɣ - na ?

text: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed .
text2: Wər sər - əs izzəgzan ar tiddawat n aljahilan wər nəssen wala daɣ Attawrit , as ketnasan təwar - tan tulɣant . »

text: Nicodemus saith unto them , ( he that came to Jesus by night , being one of them , )
text2: Issəstan - tan Nikodemos imosan iyyan daɣ Farisaytan s ənta din - osan Ɣaysa dat awen , inn - asan :

text: Doth our law judge any man , before it hear him , and know what he doeth ?
text2: « Əššəriɣa - nana wər t - iha ad itəwəxkəm awedan iket wər iššewal , itəwəssən awa daɣ iššokal . »

text: They answered and said unto him , Art thou also of Galilee ? Search , and look : for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet .
text2: Ənnan - as : « Galilaya kay təlat kay da ? Aɣru Ikataban ad tənəya kay iman - nak as wər t - illa ənnəbi du - z - igmədan Galilaya . »

text: And every man went unto his own house .
text2: Dəffər awen iffəzzat əmənəy , ikk ' awedan kul ehan - net .

text: And early in the morning he came again into the temple , and all the people came unto him ; and he sat down , and taught them .
text2: As affaw aɣo ́ ra iqqal Ehan ən Məššina təzzar təhoz - t - in tiddawat ketnet . Iqqim a tan - isasaɣru .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees brought unto him a woman taken in adultery ; and when they had set her in the midst ,
text2: Iššewal den da as d - osan musanan n Əttawrit əd Farisaytan ewayan tantut a d - əɣdaran tətaggu əzzəna . Əssəbdadan - tat dat awedan kul ,

text: They say unto him , Master , this woman was taken in adultery , in the very act .
text2: ənnan i Ɣaysa : « Ya əššix - nana , tantut a əzzəna a təga , amaran tətiwaɣayyan tətagg - ay .

text: Now Moses in the law commanded us , that such should be stoned : but what sayest thou ?
text2: Daɣ Əttawrit za a inna Musa : " tantut ən zun ta , ilzam a tat - əggaran aytedan əs təhun har tat - iba " . Amaran kay ma tənne ? »

text: This they said , tempting him , that they might have to accuse him . But Jesus stooped down , and with his finger wrote on the ground , as though he heard them not .
text2: Arat wa imos təmərkest das - əgan fəl ad t - əssəwəran lahan . Edag an a dasan - ajjawwab Ɣaysa , inaz ad ikattab s adad - net fəl am ̣ adal .

text: So when they continued asking him , he lifted up himself , and said unto them , He that is without sin among you , let him first cast a stone at her .
text2: Əqqiman ədgazan daɣ əsəstan - net , as ihog ibdad - du inn - asan : « Inkəret - du daɣ - wan was kala wər iga abakkad , izaret əs təməgirt - net . »

text: And again he stooped down , and wrote on the ground .
text2: Ilas enez ad ikattab s adad - net fəl am ̣ adal .

text: And they which heard it , being convicted by their own conscience , went out one by one , beginning at the eldest , even unto the last : and Jesus was left alone , and the woman standing in the midst .
text2: As əslan i batu ta , təzzar mazazaran əglan , azzaran - asan win waššarnen . Iqqim - du Ɣaysa ɣas - net ənta əd təntut ta nad , təbda ̂ d dat - əs harwa da .

text: When Jesus had lifted up himself , and saw none but the woman , he said unto her , Woman , where are those thine accusers ? hath no man condemned thee ?
text2: Təzzar ibdad - du inn - as : « Tantut , ma əgan za ? Wər tan - iha i kam - iwwiddaban ? »

text: She said , No man , Lord . And Jesus said unto her , Neither do I condemn thee : go , and sin no more .
text2: Tənn - as : « Waliyyan daɣ - san , Əməli - nin » . Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Nak da za wər kam - z - awaddaba . Aglu təjəwənke , mišan ad wər tələsaɣ igi ən bakkadan . »

text: Then spake Jesus again unto them , saying , I am the light of the world : he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness , but shall have the light of life .
text2: Ilas Ɣaysa awal i tiddawat inna : « Nak a imosan ənnur n əddənet . Daɣ adi wa di - ilkaman ad igrəw ənnur wa isiduran amaran wər das - ilkem ad ijiwankat daɣ šiyyay .

text: The Pharisees therefore said unto him , Thou bearest record of thyself ; thy record is not true .
text2: Ənnan - as Farisaytan : « Təgəyya ən man - nak a təmosa , arat wa təgannaɣ əddi irkam wəllen . »

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Though I bear record of myself , yet my record is true : for I know whence I came , and whither I go ; but ye cannot tell whence I come , and whither I go .
text2: Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Kud imos as təgəyya ən man - in a mosa da təgəyya - nin təmos tidət fəlas əssana sas d - əheɣ , əd sas ədaga . Mišan kawanay wər təssenam sas d - əhe , wala sas ədaga .

text: Ye judge after the flesh ; I judge no man .
text2: Kawanay azzahir as təšarraɣam aytedan , nak amaran wər šərrəɣa waliyyan .

text: And yet if I judge , my judgment is true : for I am not alone , but I and the Father that sent me .
text2: As ig ' awen da as fall - i d - osa adi , ad šarraɣa , amaran əššəriɣa - nin issohat , fəlas iddew dər - i Abba wa di - d - issəglan .

text: It is also written in your law , that the testimony of two men is true .
text2: Əlqanun - nawan iktab daɣ - as a ̂ s təgəyya n əššin meddan a təmosat tidət .

text: I am one that bear witness of myself , and the Father that sent me beareth witness of me .
text2: Nak za təgəyya iyyadda a mosaɣ i man - in , təgəyya - nin ta n sanatat amaran Abba s ənta di - d - issəglan a tat - imosan . »

text: Then said they unto him , Where is thy Father ? Jesus answered , Ye neither know me , nor my Father : if ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also .
text2: Təzzar ənnan - as : « Mənid illa Abba - nak ? » Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Wərmad di - təzdayam za wər təzdayam Abba - nin . Ənnar di - təzdayam təzdəyam Abba - nin əntada . »

text: These words spake Jesus in the treasury , as he taught in the temple : and no man laid hands on him ; for his hour was not yet come .
text2: Batuten šin itagg - enat Ɣaysa assaɣa wa daɣ isasaɣru daɣ Ahan ən Məššina ɣur adag wa daɣ tiddawan ərrəzəɣan . Mišan wər t - illa i igmayan d a t - abəz fəlas alwaq - net a du - wər - newed harwada .

text: Then said Jesus again unto them , I go my way , and ye shall seek me , and shall die in your sins : whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Ilas Ɣaysa inn - asan : « Teklay a z - aga , amaran a di - təsəssəggəlam , mišan a kawan - iba daɣ tišit ən nasbakkadan . Wər təfregam a di - in - təlkəmam s adag wa əkke . »

text: Then said the Jews , Will he kill himself ? because he saith , Whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Ad tinəmənnin arat daɣ Kəl - Əlyəhud gar - essan : « Meqqal iman - net a z - anɣu , fəlas a inna wər nəfreg a das - nəlkəm s adag wa ikka . »

text: And he said unto them , Ye are from beneath ; I am from above : ye are of this world ; I am not of this world .
text2: Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Kawanay aytedan n ares a təmosam , nak in afalla . Kawanay kəl əddənet a da a təmosam , nak wər di - təla əddənet a .

text: I said therefore unto you , that ye shall die in your sins : for if ye believe not that I am he , ye shall die in your sins .
text2: A di da fəl dawan - ənne a kawan - iba daɣ tišit ən nasbakkadan . As wər təzzəgzanam as əmosa " Wa Illan da " , əlasaɣ - awan emel n as a kawan - iba daɣ igi ən bakkadan . »

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? And Jesus saith unto them , Even the same that I said unto you from the beginning .
text2: « Ma təmosaɣ ? » ənnan - as . Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Awa dawan - əmmala ɣur tizarat har harwa a mosa . »

text: I have many things to say and to judge of you : but he that sent me is true ; and I speak to the world those things which I have heard of him .
text2: Əllan - tu aratan aggotnen as əfragaɣ a tan - anna daɣ talɣa - nawan , əllan - awan - tu attadiban aggotnen . Mišan wa di - d - issəglan Məššis ən tidət a imos , amaran arat wa di - d - inna , a əmmala y əddənet . »

text: They understood not that he spake to them of the Father .
text2: Wər əgren as Abba fəl dasan - imməgrad .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , When ye have lifted up the Son of man , then shall ye know that I am he , and that I do nothing of myself ; but as my Father hath taught me , I speak these things .
text2: Təzzar inn - asan Ɣaysa : « As təgam iman n Ag Awedan s əsəhhuki wa das - za - tagim fəl təgəttawt , ad təssənam as nak əmosa " Wa Illan da " . Ad təssənam as wər t - illa a tagga gər - i əd man - in , arat wa di - isassaɣra Abba ɣas a ganna .

text: And he that sent me is with me : the Father hath not left me alone ; for I do always those things that please him .
text2: Wa di - d - izammazalan iddew dər - i . Wər di - oyya ɣas - in fəlas faw da arat wa das - igrazan ɣas a tagga . »

text: As he spake these words , many believed on him .
text2: Amazay wa daɣ inna Ɣaysa arat wa , əzzəgzanan sər - əs aytedan aggotnen .

text: Then said Jesus to those Jews which believed on him , If ye continue in my word , then are ye my disciples indeed ;
text2: Təzzar inna Ɣaysa i Kəl - Əlyəhud win sər - əs əzzəgzanen : « As təbbərdagam y awa kawan - sassaɣra , əddi təmosam inalkiman - in win tidət ,

text: And ye shall know the truth , and the truth shall make you free .
text2: təssənam tidət , tidət amaran ənta kawan - za - təsəlləllet . »

text: They answered him , We be Abraham ' s seed , and were never in bondage to any man : how sayest thou , Ye shall be made free ?
text2: Ənnan - as : « Nakkanay ya əzzurrəyya n ənnəbi Ibrahim a nəmos , wər kala daɣ əddənet ad nəqqal eklan ən waliyyan , mafel as təganna : " Ad tallallem " ? »

text: Jesus answered them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whosoever committeth sin is the servant of sin .
text2: Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Əggəyeɣ əsilakanaɣ - awan as awedan kul wa itaggin ibakkadan , wədi akli ən bakkadan a imos .

text: And the servant abideth not in the house for ever : but the Son abideth ever .
text2: Ənta akli wər das - t - illa adag ən faw daɣ aɣaywan , mišan Barar wa eraw aɣaywan wədi edag - net ill - ay har faw .

text: If the Son therefore shall make you free , ye shall be free indeed .
text2: Daɣ adi as kawan - isaddarfat Barar , wədi ad tallallem əs tidət .

text: I know that ye are Abraham ' s seed ; but ye seek to kill me , because my word hath no place in you .
text2: Əssanaɣ as əzzurrəyya n Ibrahim a təmosam , mišan təgammayam d ad tagim iman - in fəlas awal - in wər ides iwallan - nawan .

text: I speak that which I have seen with my Father : and ye do that which ye have seen with your father .
text2: Nak arat wa ənaya ɣur Abba - nin a əmmala , amaran kawanay tətaggim awa as təslam ɣur abba - nawan Iblis . »

text: They answered and said unto him , Abraham is our father . Jesus saith unto them , If ye were Abraham ' s children , ye would do the works of Abraham .
text2: Ənnan - as : « Abba - nana ya Ibrahim a t - imosan . » Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Ənnar tidət a ̂ s təmosam bararan n Ibrahim ad tətaggim imazalan win iga Ibrahim .

text: But now ye seek to kill me , a man that hath told you the truth , which I have heard of God : this did not Abraham .
text2: Kawanay amaran əmərədda təgammayam əd tanaɣay - nin , nak imosan awedan dawan - immalan tidət s əmmək was di - tat - d - inna Məššina . Arat wədi wər t - iga Ibrahim .

text: Ye do the deeds of your father . Then said they to him , We be not born of fornication ; we have one Father , even God .
text2: Imazalan win iga abba - nawan a tətaggam . » Ənnan - as : « Nakkanay wər nəmos iniba ; wər nəla ar abba iyyanda a t - imosan Məššina . »

text: Jesus said unto them , If God were your Father , ye would love me : for I proceeded forth and came from God ; neither came I of myself , but he sent me .
text2: Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Ənnar Məššina a imosan Abba - nawan tarim - i , fəlas Məššina a d - əgmada , ənta a d - əfala , wərge gər - i əd man - in as d - ose , kalar ənta di - d - izammazalan .

text: Why do ye not understand my speech ? even because ye cannot hear my word .
text2: Mafel wər təgrem təmajəq - in ? Wər dawan - igdel əgərri - net ar as wər təfregam əsəsəm y awal - in .

text: Ye are of your father the devil , and the lusts of your father ye will do . He was a murderer from the beginning , and abode not in the truth , because there is no truth in him . When he speaketh a lie , he speaketh of his own : for he is a liar , and the father of it .
text2: Wər təlem daɣ abbatan ar Aššaytan , amaran təram ad tassandim deranan n abba - nawan . Harwa ɣur ənətti ad iqqal əljani , amaran wər ibded daɣ tidət , fəlas wər təha tidət əwəl - net . Igi ən bahu a imosan əttəbiɣat - net fəlas anasbahu a imos n abba ən bahu .

text: And because I tell you the truth , ye believe me not .
text2: Mišan nak tidət as tamagrada . Adi da fəl di - wər - təzzəgzanam .

text: Which of you convinceth me of sin ? And if I say the truth , why do ye not believe me ?
text2: Ma daɣ - wan imos wa z - isattaddin as əgeɣ ibakkadan ? Kud tidət a əmmala mafel wər di - təzzəgzanam ?

text: He that is of God heareth God ' s words : ye therefore hear them not , because ye are not of God .
text2: Awedan imosan arat daɣ tamattay ən Məššina , əsəsəm a itaggu y awal ən Məššina . Kawanay amaran wər təsəsimam , fəlas wər təmosam tamattay ən Məššina . »

text: Then answered the Jews , and said unto him , Say we not well that thou art a Samaritan , and hast a devil ?
text2: Təzzar ənnan Kəl - Əlyəhud i Ɣaysa : « Wərgeɣ kala nənna kay iyyan daɣ Kəl Samarəya a təmosaɣ amaran izdaq - qay aggəsuf ? »

text: Jesus answered , I have not a devil ; but I honour my Father , and ye do dishonour me .
text2: Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Wər di - izdeɣ aggəsuf , Abba - nin ɣas a əssəɣmara , kawanay amaran wər di - təssəɣmaram .

text: And I seek not mine own glory : there is one that seeketh and judgeth .
text2: Wər gəmməya adkul i man - in . Ill - ay wa di - igammayan adkul , amaran ənta a ixakkaman .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , If a man keep my saying , he shall never see death .
text2: Əggəyyeɣ əsilakanaɣ - awan as awedan wa ittafan awal - in , wər ilkem ad inay təmattant . »

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Now we know that thou hast a devil . Abraham is dead , and the prophets ; and thou sayest , If a man keep my saying , he shall never taste of death .
text2: Ənnan - as arat daɣ Kəl - Əlyəhud : « Əmərədda ad nəkkas aššak as izdaq - qay aggəsuf ! Ibrahim da aba - tu ənta harkid ənnəbitan kul , kay amaran təganna : " Awedan kul wa ittafan awal - in wər ilkem ad t - aba . "

text: Art thou greater than our father Abraham , which is dead ? and the prophets are dead : whom makest thou thyself ?
text2: Abba - nanaɣ Ibrahim da aba - tu : tordeɣ as togaraq - qu almaqam ? Ənnəbitan da aba - tan . Kay ma təxsabaɣ iman - nak ? »

text: Jesus answered , If I honour myself , my honour is nothing : it is my Father that honoureth me ; of whom ye say , that he is your God :
text2: Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « As imos as iman - in fəl sanamala , wədi wər əleɣ adkul waliyyan . Abba - nin a di - ihakkan adkul , ənta as təgannim : " Imos Əməli - nana " ,

text: Yet ye have not known him ; but I know him : and if I should say , I know him not , I shall be a liar like unto you : but I know him , and keep his saying .
text2: amaran wər tu - təzdayam , mišan nak əzdayaq - qu . As ənne wər t - əzdaya , wədi ad əqqəlaɣ anasbahu ən šilat - nawan . Kalar əzdayaq - qu , amaran əttafaɣ awal - net .

text: Your father Abraham rejoiced to see my day : and he saw it , and was glad .
text2: Abba - nawan Ibrahim ima ̂ l - tu əd tədəwit fəl as das - igmad aššak as ad inəy assa - nin , amaran inay - tu , ikna təfalawist y awen . »

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Thou art not yet fifty years old , and hast thou seen Abraham ?
text2: Ənnan - as Kəl - Əlyəhud : « Kay wər teweda wala səmmosat təmərwen n awatay eges tənne tənayaɣ Ibrahim ? »

text: Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Before Abraham was , I am .
text2: Inn - asan : « Əggəyye silakanaɣ - awan as dat təhut n Ibrahim da nak əmosa " Wa Illan da " . »

text: Then took they up stones to cast at him : but Jesus hid himself , and went out of the temple , going through the midst of them , and so passed by .
text2: Təzzar ad takammen šihun y a das - agin zabaw , mišan ya ilɣas - asan , igmad afarag n Ahan ən Məššina .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Master , who did sin , this man , or his parents , that he was born blind ?
text2: Əssəstanan - tu nalkiman - net ənnan - as : « Əššix , mafel ihəw - d ' aləs a imos əmədderɣəl ? Ak əddəlil n abakkad - net , meɣ ak abakkad ən marwan - net ? »

text: Jesus answered , Neither hath this man sinned , nor his parents : but that the works of God should be made manifest in him .
text2: Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Wərmad iddirɣal fəl əddəlil n abakkad - net , wala deɣ abakkad ən marwan - net . Wər iddərɣal ar y a fall - as tətəwənəy tarna ən Məššina .

text: I must work the works of him that sent me , while it is day : the night cometh , when no man can work .
text2: Iwar - anaɣ ad naknu əššəɣəlan ən wa di - d - issəglan iket di ad ig ' azal , fəlas ehad izay - du , amaran wər t - illa i daɣ - as ifragan əššəɣəl .

text: As long as I am in the world , I am the light of the world .
text2: Iket əheɣ əddənet əmosaɣ ənnur n əddənet . »

text: When he had thus spoken , he spat on the ground , and made clay of the spittle , and he anointed the eyes of the blind man with the clay ,
text2: As iga batu ta , issotaf daɣ amadal , ig ' arat ən talaq əs təsutaf - net , issəlal - tat i šittawen n əmədderɣəl ,

text: And said unto him , Go , wash in the pool of Siloam , ( which is by interpretation , Sent . ) He went his way therefore , and washed , and came seeing .
text2: inn - as : « Aglu širəd udəm - nak daɣ təɣazart ta n Siloxam ( esəm wa almaɣna - net anammazal . ) Igla əmədderɣəl iššorad udəm - net , as d - iqqal da ihannay .

text: The neighbours therefore , and they which before had seen him that he was blind , said , Is not this he that sat and begged ?
text2: Ad gannin naragan - net , d aytedan win t - ənaynen imos əmansay dat awen : « Ak awa wərgeɣ əmədderɣəl was faw iqqim itansay ? »

text: Some said , This is he : others said , He is like him : but he said , I am he .
text2: Wiyyad gannin : « Ənta daɣ awen . » , wiyyad ənta da gannin : « Kala , tulat ɣas dər - əs iga . » Ənta amaran igannu : « Nak daɣ awa . »

text: Therefore said they unto him , How were thine eyes opened ?
text2: A tu - sastanan gannan - as : « Məni esaway was təgrawaɣ asawad - nak ? »

text: He answered and said , A man that is called Jesus made clay , and anointed mine eyes , and said unto me , Go to the pool of Siloam , and wash : and I went and washed , and I received sight .
text2: Inn - asan : « Aləs as gannin Ɣaysa , a igan arat ən talaq , təzzar issəlal - tat i šittawen - in , inn - i ad aglaɣ əšširədaɣ udəm - in daɣ təɣazart ta n Siloxam . Əgleɣ əššoradaq - qu ɣas , əgrawaɣ asawad - in . »

text: Then said they unto him , Where is he ? He said , I know not .
text2: Ənnan - as : « Ma iga za aləs wədi ? » Inn - asan : « Wər əssena » .

text: They brought to the Pharisees him that aforetime was blind .
text2: Əlwayan aytedan win aləs was kala ad imos əmədderɣəl , har dər - əs osan Farisaytan .

text: And it was the sabbath day when Jesus made the clay , and opened his eyes .
text2: Ənta əzəl ən təsanfawt ən Kəl - Əlyəhud a daɣ iga Ɣaysa talaq , issəswad əmədderɣəl wen .

text: Then again the Pharisees also asked him how he had received his sight . He said unto them , He put clay upon mine eyes , and I washed , and do see .
text2: A tu - sastanan Farisaytan əntanay da d asaway was igraw asawad - net . Inn - asan aləs wa : « Arat ən talaq a iga fəl šittawen - in , əššoradaɣ udəm - in , amaran əmərədda əhannaya . »

text: Therefore said some of the Pharisees , This man is not of God , because he keepeth not the sabbath day . Others said , How can a man that is a sinner do such miracles ? And there was a division among them .
text2: Ad gannin arat daɣ Farisaytan : « Aləs wa igan arat wa , wər d - ifel Məššina fəlas wər isassahat əzəl ən təsanfawt - nana . » Ənnan wiyyad : « Alɣalamaten šin , manəmmək as tanat - z - ag ' awedan imosan anasbakkad ? » Təzzar əmməzrayan daɣ talɣa ten .

text: They say unto the blind man again , What sayest thou of him , that he hath opened thine eyes ? He said , He is a prophet .
text2: Təzzar əlasan əsəstan n aləs was kala ad iddərɣal ənnan - as : « Kay a innan izzozay - kay aləs daɣ taddarɣalt , əməl - anaɣ aw ' as tordeɣ as imos - tu . » Inn - asan : « Ənnəbi a imos . »

text: But the Jews did not believe concerning him , that he had been blind , and received his sight , until they called the parents of him that had received his sight .
text2: Əglan Farisaytan wər əzzəgzanan as aləs wa kala ad iddərɣal har du - sassaɣran imarwan - net .

text: And they asked them , saying , Is this your son , who ye say was born blind ? how then doth he now see ?
text2: Ənnan - asan : « Ənta da da barar - nawan was tənnam as d - ihəw da iddirɣal ? Məni təməwit tas igraw asawad - net əmərədda ? »

text: His parents answered them and said , We know that this is our son , and that he was born blind :
text2: Ənnan - asan marwan n aləs : « Nəssan as barar - nanaɣ a imos , nəssan əntada as as d - ihəw da iddirɣal ,

text: But by what means he now seeth , we know not ; or who hath opened his eyes , we know not : he is of age ; ask him : he shall speak for himself .
text2: mišan wərmad nəssan təməwit tas igraw asawad - net , za wala deɣ awedan wa t - issəswadan . Səstənat - tu iman - net , fəlas aləs waššaran a imos ifragan ad ammagrad daɣ talɣa ta tu - təqqalat . »

text: These words spake his parents , because they feared the Jews : for the Jews had agreed already , that if any man did confess that he was Christ , he should be put out of the synagogue .
text2: Batu ta wər tat - əgen marwan - net ar fəl təksəda ən muzaran ən Kəl - Əlyəhud fəlas tənna a gan awedan kul wa iggəyyen as Ɣaysa a imosan Əlməsix , wədi ad t - əkkəsan daɣ tiddawat ən təməzgədda ən Kəl - Əlyəhud .

text: Therefore said his parents , He is of age ; ask him .
text2: Awen da fəl ənnan marwan - net : « Tušaray - net təšišawad - tu dawan ammagrad daɣ talɣa ta tu - təqqalat , səstənat - tu . »

text: Then again called they the man that was blind , and said unto him , Give God the praise : we know that this man is a sinner .
text2: Əlasan - du Farisaytan teɣaray n aləs was kala ad imos əmədderɣəl ənnan - as : « Iksad Məššina təməla tidət . Nakkanay nəssan as aləs di anasbakkad . »

text: He answered and said , Whether he be a sinner or no , I know not : one thing I know , that , whereas I was blind , now I see .
text2: Inn - asan aləs wa : « Nak wər əssena kud anasbakkad a imos wala . Arat iyyanda ɣas daɣ əssana : as kala ad əmosaɣ əmədderɣəl , əmərədda amaran əhannaya . »

text: Then said they to him again , What did he to thee ? how opened he thine eyes ?
text2: Dəffər awen ənnan - as : « Ma imos arat wa dak - iga ? Məni esaway was kay issəswad ? »

text: He answered them , I have told you already , and ye did not hear : wherefore would ye hear it again ? will ye also be his disciples ?
text2: Inn - asan : « Arat wədi ya əmalaɣ - awan - tu mišan wər di - təssəsamam . Mafel as təram a dawan - t - ələsaɣ emel ? Meqqal ak kawanay da a təram ad təqqəlam inalkiman - net ketnawan ? »

text: Then they reviled him , and said , Thou art his disciple ; but we are Moses ' disciples .
text2: Ərbadan - tu ənnan - as : « Kay a imosan ənalkim - net , nakkanay inalkiman ən Musa a nəmos .

text: We know that God spake unto Moses : as for this fellow , we know not from whence he is .
text2: Musa nəssan as iššewal - as Məššina , amaran aləs wədi wər nəssen sas d - iha fadda . »

text: The man answered and said unto them , Why herein is a marvellous thing , that ye know not from whence he is , and yet he hath opened mine eyes .
text2: Inn - asan : « Aləs wa wər təssenam wala sas d - iha mišan izzozay - i daɣ taddarɣalt ! Arat ya wa ənta a isammaklalan wəllen ! »

text: Now we know that God heareth not sinners : but if any man be a worshipper of God , and doeth his will , him he heareth .
text2: Təssanam as Məššina wər iqəbbəl šiwatriwen ən nasbakkadan . As das - ibbərdag awedan , itamazal tara - net , əddi ad iqqabbal šiwatriwen - net .

text: Since the world began was it not heard that any man opened the eyes of one that was born blind .
text2: Wər kala ad itawasla awedan issiswadan i d - ihəwan əd taddarɣalt .

text: If this man were not of God , he could do nothing .
text2: Ənnar imos as aləs di wər d - ifel Məššina , wər z ' ifrəg igi ən wala . »

text: They answered and said unto him , Thou wast altogether born in sins , and dost thou teach us ? And they cast him out .
text2: Haraššen - tu ənnan - as : « Ko ! Adis kay was as du - təhuwa da təmosa təbəluləq n abakkad , kay a iran a dana - takfaɣ alfaydaten ? » Təzzar əstaɣan - tu daɣ adag wen .

text: Jesus heard that they had cast him out ; and when he had found him , he said unto him , Dost thou believe on the Son of God ?
text2: As isla Ɣaysa əmazal wa igan da , təzzar iswad y aləs wen har t - igraw inn - as : « Kay ak təzzigzana s Ag Awedan ? »

text: He answered and said , Who is he , Lord , that I might believe on him ?
text2: Inn ' aləs i Ɣaysa : « Əməl - i a wa imos , Əməli - nin , fəlas areɣ a sər - əs əzzəgzəna . »

text: And Jesus said unto him , Thou hast both seen him , and it is he that talketh with thee .
text2: Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Tənayaq - qu , amaran ənta dada dak - imməgradan da . »

text: And he said , Lord , I believe . And he worshipped him .
text2: Inn - as aləs : « Ayew , Əməli - nin , əzzigzanaɣ . » Təzzar issəjad - as .

text: And Jesus said , For judgment I am come into this world , that they which see not might see ; and that they which see might be made blind .
text2: Amaran inna Ɣaysa : « Nak assa a d - əgeɣ əddənet fəl ad agu əššəriɣa , y ad əswədan win wər nəhənnəy , addarɣalan win hannaynen . »

text: And some of the Pharisees which were with him heard these words , and said unto him , Are we blind also ?
text2: Əslan arat daɣ Farisaytan win dər iddew y awa inna da ənnan - as : « Daɣ adi nakkanay da iməddərɣal a nəmos ? »

text: Jesus said unto them , If ye were blind , ye should have no sin : but now ye say , We see ; therefore your sin remaineth .
text2: Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Ənnar təmosam iməddərɣal wər za tilem lahan , mišan dad imos as təgannim : " Nakkanay nəhannay " , wədi kawanay təllam - tu əd lahan . »

text: But he that entereth in by the door is the shepherd of the sheep .
text2: Amaran wa d - iggazan s əmi n afarag , wədi ənta a imosan amadan n ayfəd .

text: To him the porter openeth ; and the sheep hear his voice : and he calleth his own sheep by name , and leadeth them out .
text2: Ənaɣlif n afarag a z ' aləman imi , əssəsəmnat ayfəd y əməsli n amadan , ad iɣarru šin - net s esmawan - nasnat isardaq - qanat afarag .

text: And when he putteth forth his own sheep , he goeth before them , and the sheep follow him : for they know his voice .
text2: As d - iɣrad ikus ən šin - net , a dasnat - izar , təzzar əlkəmnat - as , fəlas əzdaynat əməsli - net .

text: And a stranger will they not follow , but will flee from him : for they know not the voice of strangers .
text2: As ig ' awen awedan wa dasnat - imosan ənaftaɣ , wər das - z - əlkəmnat , ewef fadda tu - z - aginat fəlas wər əzdaynat əməsli - net . »

text: This parable spake Jesus unto them : but they understood not what things they were which he spake unto them .
text2: Əlmital wa da dasan - iga Ɣaysa , mišan wər əgren almaɣna n awa daɣ imməgrad da .

text: Then said Jesus unto them again , Verily , verily , I say unto you , I am the door of the sheep .
text2: Ilas Ɣaysa inn - asan : « Əggəyyeɣ əsilakanaɣ - awan as nak a imosan imi w ' as raddaɣnat ayfəd .

text: All that ever came before me are thieves and robbers : but the sheep did not hear them .
text2: Win dat - i d - osanen kul ibaydagan ən jujab ən zənga a mosan amaran wər dasan - əssəsamnat ayfəd .

text: I am the door : by me if any man enter in , he shall be saved , and shall go in and out , and find pasture .
text2: Nak a imosan imi . Wa sər - i d - iggazan ad afsu . Ifrag ad itaggaz iraddaɣ , igrəw əntada imensewan - net .

text: The thief cometh not , but for to steal , and to kill , and to destroy : I am come that they might have life , and that they might have it more abundantly .
text2: Abaydag wər d - itisu ar fəl šikra , d igi ən man d əhluk . Nak amaran ose - du fəl ad əgrəwan aytedan təməddurt , əgrəwan - tat da za əs təməwit wər nəla əddukad .

text: I am the good shepherd : the good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep .
text2: Nak a imosan amadan wa olaɣan . Amadan wa olaɣan iman - net a isamalkaw fəl ayfəd - net .

text: But he that is an hireling , and not the shepherd , whose own the sheep are not , seeth the wolf coming , and leaveth the sheep , and fleeth : and the wolf catcheth them , and scattereth the sheep .
text2: Mišan awedan was ətəwəɣfar a iga fəl ad idən ayfəd , wər tanat - ila , wədi as ogga əridal izay - tanat - du , ad addaggag ayy - enat - in , təzzar abəz daɣ - asnat əridal awa ira , izəwwəziwəz - tanat .

text: The hireling fleeth , because he is an hireling , and careth not for the sheep .
text2: Arat wa itagg - ay aləs wa fəlas ətəwəɣfar a iga y əššəɣəl wa , wər izlay a əganat ayfəd .

text: I am the good shepherd , and know my sheep , and am known of mine .
text2: Nak a imosan amadan wa olaɣan . Əzdayaɣ ayfəd - in , ayfəd - in deɣ əzdaynat - i ,

text: As the Father knoweth me , even so know I the Father : and I lay down my life for the sheep .
text2: zun əmmək was di - izday Abba - nin , d əmmək was t - əzdaya nak da . Iman - in simalkawaq - qan fəl ayfəd - in .

text: And other sheep I have , which are not of this fold : them also I must bring , and they shall hear my voice ; and there shall be one fold , and one shepherd .
text2: Əleɣ ayfəd šiyyad əntada wər nəha afarag wa . Əntanatay da kundaba azzaraɣ - asnat . Ad aslinat y əməsli - nin , əqqəlnat əsəgən iyyanda ilan amadan iyyanda .

text: Therefore doth my Father love me , because I lay down my life , that I might take it again .
text2: Abba ir - i fəlas iman - in a sammalkawa fəl a tan - ələsaɣ agaraw .

text: No man taketh it from me , but I lay it down of myself . I have power to lay it down , and I have power to take it again . This commandment have I received of my Father .
text2: Wər t - illa i daɣ - i z ' abəzan iman , kalar iman - in a sammalkawaɣ əs təradawt - in . Əleɣ fərregat n əsəmməlkəw - nasan , əleɣ da fərregat n agaraw - nasan tolas . Ənta da daɣ arat was di - omar Abba - nin s igi - net . »

text: There was a division therefore again among the Jews for these sayings .
text2: Ilas ades ən Kəl - Əlyəhud əməzrəy daɣ talɣa n aratan win igannu da .

text: And many of them said , He hath a devil , and is mad ; why hear ye him ?
text2: A daɣ - san aggen gannin : « Aləs wa aggəsuf a t - izdaɣan ! Awa əmeskel ! Mafel təssisamam - as ? »

text: Others said , These are not the words of him that hath a devil . Can a devil open the eyes of the blind ?
text2: Wiyyad gannin : « Awedan izdaɣ aggəsuf wər itəggu awal olan d awa . Tordam as ill - ay aggəsuf ifragan əsəswəd ən məddərɣal ? »

text: And it was at Jerusalem the feast of the dedication , and it was winter .
text2: Azzaman en tagrəst , ewad - du əmud ən saktan n ətəwəzəzdag n Ahan ən Məššina daɣ Yerusalam .

text: And Jesus walked in the temple in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: Itijəwənkit Ɣaysa daɣ Ahan ən Məššina daɣ tarrayt təfalat as itawannu « ta n Suliman . »

text: Then came the Jews round about him , and said unto him , How long dost thou make us to doubt ? If thou be the Christ , tell us plainly .
text2: Ɣilayɣalayan - tu Kəl - Əlyəhud win əllanen den gannin - as : « Kay ak har əmmay wər dana - tore daɣ aɣaf ? Kud kay Əlməsix a təmosa , təzəluləɣa - du tannaɣ - anaq - qu . »

text: Jesus answered them , I told you , and ye believed not : the works that I do in my Father ' s name , they bear witness of me .
text2: Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Ənneɣ - awan - tu , mišan wər di - təzzəgzanam . Imazalan win əge s esəm n Abba - nin , əggəyyen - i .

text: But ye believe not , because ye are not of my sheep , as I said unto you .
text2: Mišan wər di - təzzəgzanam fəlas wər tətabaqqem daɣ ayfəd - in .

text: My sheep hear my voice , and I know them , and they follow me :
text2: Ayfəd - in əsallinat y əməsli - nin , əzdayaq - qanat , amaran əlkamnat - i .

text: And I give unto them eternal life ; and they shall never perish , neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand .
text2: Əkfeq - qanat təməddurt təɣlalat , wər ilkem ad oxsaynat , amaran wər t - illa i tanat - z - irkəban daɣ əfus - in .

text: My Father , which gave them me , is greater than all ; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father ' s hand .
text2: Abba - nin wa di - tanat - ikfan , ogar i t - illan kul təzzəwərt . Amaran wər t - illa i tanat - z - irkəban daɣ əfus n Abba .

text: I and my Father are one .
text2: Nak d Abba arat iyyanda a nəmos . »

text: Then the Jews took up stones again to stone him .
text2: Əlasan - du sər - əs adakal ən təhun y ad t - anɣin .

text: Jesus answered them , Many good works have I shewed you from my Father ; for which of those works do ye stone me ?
text2: Ilas Ɣaysa inn - asan : « Əssiknaq - qawan imazalan aggotnen olaɣnen a d - əfalnen Abba . Məni daɣ - san wa fəl taram a di - tanɣim ? »

text: The Jews answered him , saying , For a good work we stone thee not ; but for blasphemy ; and because that thou , being a man , makest thyself God .
text2: Ənnan - as : « Nakkanay wər nəra tenaɣay - nak fəl as təgeɣ əmazal olaɣan , kalar əmadraw wa təgeɣ əddi a fəl kay za nanɣu . Kay wər təmosaɣ ar aggadəm amaran tareɣ ad tagaɣ iman - nak Məššina . »

text: Jesus answered them , Is it not written in your law , I said , Ye are gods ?
text2: Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Ak əlqanun - nawan wərgeɣ ikta ̂ b daɣ - as as inna Məššina : " kawanay təmosam məššinatan " ?

text: If he called them gods , unto whom the word of God came , and the scripture cannot be broken ;
text2: Wər nəfreg a din - nəgər arat wa ihan Ikətban . Esəm wa n məššinatan , iɣra sər - əs Məššina aytedan win təkka batu ta iga da .

text: Say ye of him , whom the Father hath sanctified , and sent into the world , Thou blasphemest ; because I said , I am the Son of God ?
text2: Nak Məššina di - isannafranan izammazal - i - du s əddənet . Manəmmək daɣ adi as za tannim taggaɣ əmadraw fəl as ənne : " Əmosa Barar ən Məššina " ?

text: If I do not the works of my Father , believe me not .
text2: As imos as wər təggaɣ imazalan win as di - d - issəgla Abba - nin y a tan - aga , a di - wər - təzzəgzənam .

text: But if I do , though ye believe not me , believe the works : that ye may know , and believe , that the Father is in me , and I in him .
text2: Mišan dad imos as taggaq - qan , wədi kud sər - i wər təzzəgzanam da , zəgzənat kuddeɣ əs mazalan win tagga , fəl ad təssənam , tassantim əntada əgərri n as Abba irtay dər - i , nak deɣ ərtaya d Abba . »

text: Therefore they sought again to take him : but he escaped out of their hand ,
text2: Əlasan agamay d abbaz - net , mišan ya igmad - tan .

text: And went away again beyond Jordan into the place where John at first baptized ; and there he abode .
text2: Ilas Ɣaysa iki ən təgadamayt ta hadat ən Yordan , daɣ adag wa daɣ issənta Yaxya əsəlməɣ n aytedan daɣ aman , təzzar iqqim den da .

text: And many resorted unto him , and said , John did no miracle : but all things that John spake of this man were true .
text2: Osan - t - in aytedan aggotnen , gannin : « Yaxya wər iga alɣalamat waliyyat , mišan aratan kul win danaɣ - inna s aləs wa , əmosan tidət . »

text: And many believed on him there .
text2: Den daɣ ad əzzəgzanan aytedan aggotnen əs Ɣaysa .

text: ( It was that Mary which anointed the Lord with ointment , and wiped his feet with her hair , whose brother Lazarus was sick . )
text2: Maryama ənt ' a təzwayat alwardi y Əməli Ɣaysa , təzzar təmas - as idaran - net əs jəkkad - net . Amaran amadray - net Lazarəs a irinan den .

text: Therefore his sisters sent unto him , saying , Lord , behold , he whom thou lovest is sick .
text2: Sassawaynat təmədrayen - net əmazal i Ɣaysa as : « Əməli , əməri - nak irin . »

text: When Jesus heard that , he said , This sickness is not unto death , but for the glory of God , that the Son of God might be glorified thereby .
text2: Assaɣa wad isla Ɣaysa i salan win den , inna : « Təsəlkamt ən təwərna ten , wər təmos təmattant ən Lazarəs , arat a təmos a z ' assaknin atkul ən Məššina , isənnəfiləl - du əntada atkul wa ila Barar ən Məššina . »

text: Now Jesus loved Martha , and her sister , and Lazarus .
text2: Ənta Ɣaysa ira Marta wəllen , ənta əd təmadrayt - net , əd Lazarəs .

text: When he had heard therefore that he was sick , he abode two days still in the same place where he was .
text2: Isla as irin , mišan iga dəffər awen əššin adan wər igmed edag wa iha .

text: Then after that saith he to his disciples , Let us go into Judaea again .
text2: Dəffər adi inna i nalkiman - net : « Əndawat ad nəqqəl Yahudəya . »

text: His disciples say unto him , Master , the Jews of late sought to stone thee ; and goest thou thither again ?
text2: Ənnan - as nalkiman - net : « Əššix - nana , imuzaran - nana wərge edes - nasan səket dada da gammayan əd tanaɣay - nak , kay amaran tareɣ tewaɣlay n akal wen ? »

text: Jesus answered , Are there not twelve hours in the day ? If any man walk in the day , he stumbleth not , because he seeth the light of this world .
text2: Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Əzəl wərgeɣ maraw alwaqan d əššin a imos ? As ijiwankat awedan daɣ azal , wər z ' itinəbətutəw , fəlas ihannay ənnur n əddənet .

text: But if a man walk in the night , he stumbleth , because there is no light in him .
text2: Mišan as ijawankat awedan daɣ ahad , ad itinəbətutəw , fəlas wər t - iha ənnur . »

text: These things said he : and after that he saith unto them , Our friend Lazarus sleepeth ; but I go , that I may awake him out of sleep .
text2: Dəffər as iga batu ta inna tolas : « Əmidi - nana Lazarəs insa ̂ , ad aglaɣ a t - id - əssənkəra . »

text: Then said his disciples , Lord , if he sleep , he shall do well .
text2: Ənnan - as nalkiman - net : « Əməli , dad zamas insa ̂ , wədi əngəm ad izzəy . »

text: Howbeit Jesus spake of his death : but they thought that he had spoken of taking of rest in sleep .
text2: Ənta Ɣaysa təmattant ən Lazarəs fəl dasan - imməgrad den , mišan əntanay a ɣilan etəs wa n alɣadat as igannu .

text: Then said Jesus unto them plainly , Lazarus is dead .
text2: Təzzar izalalaɣ - du inn - asan : « Lazarəs aba - tu .

text: And I am glad for your sakes that I was not there , to the intent ye may believe ; nevertheless let us go unto him .
text2: Amaran isidawat - i as wər əlle sen daɣ alwaq wədi , fəlas arat wa ənta sər - wan du - z - awəyan a sər - i təzzəgzənam . Mišan əmərədda əndawatanaq - qu . »

text: Then said Thomas , which is called Didymus , unto his fellowdisciples , Let us also go , that we may die with him .
text2: Inkar Tuma was gannin Eknay , inna i nalkiman win hadatnen : « Əndawat nakkanay da danaɣ - iba nəddew dər - əs . »

text: Then when Jesus came , he found that he had lain in the grave four days already .
text2: As din - osa Ɣaysa ittəmal - as as Lazarəs iga əkkoz adan daɣ əzəkka .

text: Now Bethany was nigh unto Jerusalem , about fifteen furlongs off :
text2: Betanəy toray - du karad kilawtan əs Yerusalam ,

text: And many of the Jews came to Martha and Mary , to comfort them concerning their brother .
text2: osan - in Kəl - Əlyəhud aggotnen Marta əd Maryama fəl a dasnat - in - šəwwəškənan daɣ adag n amadray - nasnat .

text: Then Martha , as soon as she heard that Jesus was coming , went and met him : but Mary sat still in the house .
text2: As təsla Marta as Ɣaysa ihoz - du aɣrəm , təssəlkad - as . Maryama ənta təqqim - du daɣ aɣaywan .

text: Then said Martha unto Jesus , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Tənna Marta i Ɣaysa : « Əməli , ənnar təlle da , wər z ' iba amadray - nin .

text: But I know , that even now , whatsoever thou wilt ask of God , God will give it thee .
text2: Mišan əmərədda da əssanaɣ as arat kul wa təgmaya daɣ Məššina a dak - k - agu . »

text: Jesus saith unto her , Thy brother shall rise again .
text2: Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Amadray - nam a d - inkər daɣ təmattant . »

text: Martha saith unto him , I know that he shall rise again in the resurrection at the last day .
text2: Tənn - as Marta : « Əssanaɣ as amadray - nin a d - inkər ɣur tanakra n aytedan əzəl a ilkaman . »

text: Jesus said unto her , I am the resurrection , and the life : he that believeth in me , though he were dead , yet shall he live :
text2: Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Nak a imosan wa d - isankaran daɣ təmattant , əmosa təməddurt . Awedan wa sər - i izzəgzanan , wədi kud t - aba da a d - iddər .

text: And whosoever liveth and believeth in me shall never die . Believest thou this ?
text2: Amaran awedan kul wa iddaran izzigzan sər - i , wədi wər ilkem ad t - aba . Təzzigzanaɣ arat wədi ? »

text: She saith unto him , Yea , Lord : I believe that thou art the Christ , the Son of God , which should come into the world .
text2: « Awalla » tənn - as , « Əməli , əzzigzanaɣ as kay a imosan Əlməsix , təmosa Barar ən Məššina , barar was əmalan kətban as a d - as ' əddənet . »

text: And when she had so said , she went her way , and called Mary her sister secretly , saying , The Master is come , and calleth for thee .
text2: As təga Marta batu ta , təkka təmadrayt - net Maryama , təwat - tat s ahal tənn - as : « Əššix illa - da , isastan dər - əm . »

text: As soon as she heard that , she arose quickly , and came unto him .
text2: As təgraw Maryama isalan win , təggad - du , təssəlkad i Ɣaysa .

text: Now Jesus was not yet come into the town , but was in that place where Martha met him .
text2: As itagg ' awen harwa da wər d - iggez aɣrəm , wər igmed edag wa daq - q - in - tosa Marta .

text: The Jews then which were with her in the house , and comforted her , when they saw Mary , that she rose up hastily and went out , followed her , saying , She goeth unto the grave to weep there .
text2: Kəl - Əlyəhud win əhanen ehan wen əllan ɣur Maryama gammayan d əsəsməd - net , oggan - tat as du - təggad tarmad təqqab , təzzar əlkaman - as əɣilan əzəkka a təkka y a fall - as təhallu .

text: Then when Mary was come where Jesus was , and saw him , she fell down at his feet , saying unto him , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: As din - tosa Maryama edag wa iha Ɣaysa togg - ay , təzzar təfataqqat ɣur daran - net , tənn - as : « Əməli , ənnar təlle da , wər z - iba amadray - nin . »

text: When Jesus therefore saw her weeping , and the Jews also weeping which came with her , he groaned in the spirit , and was troubled ,
text2: As tat - inay Ɣaysa təhallu , inay Kəl - Əlyəhud win dər - əs d - əddewnen əntanay da əhallin , təzzar ikna tərəmmeq , əɣšadan man - net .

text: And said , Where have ye laid him ? They said unto him , Lord , come and see .
text2: Inn - asan : « Məni tu - təgam ? » « Əməli » ənnan - as , « Ayaw ənəy . »

text: Jesus wept .
text2: Ad ihallu Ɣaysa .

text: Then said the Jews , Behold how he loved him !
text2: Ənnan aytedan : « Ənawat awa dər togda tara ta iga y aləs - wa . »

text: And some of them said , Could not this man , which opened the eyes of the blind , have caused that even this man should not have died ?
text2: Mišan ənnan wiyyad daɣ - san : « Aləs wa issəswadan əmədderɣəl , wərgeɣ ifra ̂ g a ad igdəl i Lazarəs təmattant ? »

text: Jesus therefore again groaning in himself cometh to the grave . It was a cave , and a stone lay upon it .
text2: Ikna Ɣaysa tərəmmeq tolas , təzzar ikk ' əzəkka . Awa əzəkka imosan əzzənəf n akazam , amaran tədbaq - qu təhunt zəwwərat .

text: Jesus said , Take ye away the stone . Martha , the sister of him that was dead , saith unto him , Lord , by this time he stinketh : for he hath been dead four days .
text2: Inna Ɣaysa : « Əkkəsat - du təhunt ! » Tənn - as Marta ta n tamadrayt n aləs w ' aba : « Əməli , aləs di əmərədda il ' adu , fəlas əzəl - net wa n əkkoz awa d anabal . »

text: Jesus saith unto her , Said I not unto thee , that , if thou wouldest believe , thou shouldest see the glory of God ?
text2: Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Wərgeɣ ənneɣ - am as təzzəgzana ad tənəyaɣ tarna ən Məššina ? »

text: Then they took away the stone from the place where the dead was laid . And Jesus lifted up his eyes , and said , Father , I thank thee that thou hast heard me .
text2: Təzzar tətawakkas - du təhunt . Iswad Ɣaysa daɣ jənnawan inna : « Abba , əggodayaɣ - ak as di - təqbala təwatray - nin .

text: And I knew that thou hearest me always : but because of the people which stand by I said it , that they may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Nak iman - in əssanaɣ as faw da təqqabbala šiwatriwen - in . Mišan əššewalaɣ fəl əddəlil ən tiddawat ta di - təɣalayɣalayat da , fəl ad əzzəgzənan as kay a di - d - izammazalan . »

text: And when he thus had spoken , he cried with a loud voice , Lazarus , come forth .
text2: Dəffər as iga batu ta , idkal əməsli - net inna : « Lazarəs , əgməd - du ! »

text: And he that was dead came forth , bound hand and foot with graveclothes : and his face was bound about with a napkin . Jesus saith unto them , Loose him , and let him go .
text2: Igmad - du ənəmmettən wa nad , əttalan fassan - net əd daran - net daɣ təsəwad , təlsa təbdoq udəm - net əntada . Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Əkkəsat - as itul tayyim - tu ad ijəwənkət . »

text: Then many of the Jews which came to Mary , and had seen the things which Jesus did , believed on him .
text2: Kəl Əlyəhud aggotnen a d - osanen Maryama ənayan arat wa , əzzəgzanan əs Ɣaysa .

text: But some of them went their ways to the Pharisees , and told them what things Jesus had done .
text2: Mišan əglan wiyyad daɣ - san əkkan Farisaytan əmalan - asan arat wa iga Ɣaysa da .

text: Then gathered the chief priests and the Pharisees a council , and said , What do we ? for this man doeth many miracles .
text2: Təzzar sassagan limaman win zawwarnen , əd Farisaytan əməni ən muzaran ənnan : « Ma za nagu ? Aləs wa itaggu alɣalamaten aggotnen . »

text: If we let him thus alone , all men will believe on him : and the Romans shall come and take away both our place and nation .
text2: As tu - noyya itaggu aratan win , a sər - əs əzzəgzənan aytedan kul , təzzar asin - du Kəl - Ərrum addagdagan Ehan ən Məššina , əzədan aɣrəf - nana .

text: And one of them , named Caiaphas , being the high priest that same year , said unto them , Ye know nothing at all ,
text2: Inkar - du iyyan daɣ - san igan esəm Kayif , imosan əlimam wa zəwwaran daɣ awatay wen , inn - asan : « Kawanay wər təgrem wala .

text: Nor consider that it is expedient for us , that one man should die for the people , and that the whole nation perish not .
text2: Wər din təgrem as ofa ad ammat awedan iyyanda daɣ adag ən tamattay fəl ad wər immut əɣrəf ketnet ? »

text: And this spake he not of himself : but being high priest that year , he prophesied that Jesus should die for that nation ;
text2: Batu ta iga da wər tat - iga gar - es əd man - net , kalar tišit - net əlimam wa zəwwaran daɣ awatay wen , a fəl igraw əlwəlayat n as Ɣaysa kundaba immut fəl əddəlil n əɣrəf ketnet .

text: And not for that nation only , but that also he should gather together in one the children of God that were scattered abroad .
text2: Amaran wərge aɣrəf wen ɣas a fəl tu - z - iba , kalar bararan ən Məššina kul win wazawaznen a du - z - iššidəw ag - en zun təɣəssa iyyadda .

text: Then from that day forth they took counsel together for to put him to death .
text2: Əzəl wen da daɣ əgan muzaran ən Kəl - Əlyəhud tanat ta n tanaɣay - net .

text: Jesus therefore walked no more openly among the Jews ; but went thence unto a country near to the wilderness , into a city called Ephraim , and there continued with his disciples .
text2: Awen da fəlas ab - as itallam Ɣaysa dad ira daɣ Kəl - Əlyəhud . Igmad akal wen , ikka iyyan akal iyyan inimahazan əd taneray , daɣ əɣrəm igan esəm Efrayəm , iqqim daɣ - as den da ənta əd nalkiman - net .

text: And the Jews ' passover was nigh at hand : and many went out of the country up to Jerusalem before the passover , to purify themselves .
text2: Azzaman en amud ən Kəl - Əlyəhud wa n Akkay ihoz - du . A du - tagazzayan aytedan aggotnen n akal wen kul , takkin - du Yerusalam , fəl ad əzzəzdəgan dat əmud .

text: Then sought they for Jesus , and spake among themselves , as they stood in the temple , What think ye , that he will not come to the feast ?
text2: Saggadan i Ɣaysa tinəmənnin gar - essan daɣ Ahan ən Məššina : « Kawanay ak ma tənnam , tordam as wər du - z - asu amud wa fadda ? »

text: Now both the chief priests and the Pharisees had given a commandment , that , if any man knew where he were , he should shew it , that they might take him .
text2: Ənta ilimaman win zawwarnen əd Farisaytan omaran aytedan as i issanan edag wa iha Ɣaysa isaffagg - ay fəl ad attarmas .

text: There they made him a supper ; and Martha served : but Lazarus was one of them that sat at the table with him .
text2: As din - osa Ɣaysa tawaggan - as məgura olaɣnen ; tətaway - du Marta imensewan amaran Lazarəs iha aytedan win naɣamanen əd Ɣaysa ədrawan dər - əs .

text: Then took Mary a pound of ointment of spikenard , very costly , and anointed the feet of Jesus , and wiped his feet with her hair : and the house was filled with the odour of the ointment .
text2: Təzzar tobaz - du Maryama aganna ən litər n alwardi iyyan ilan almaqam , izzəwat wəllen , tənɣal - tu fəl daran ən Ɣaysa təzway - asan - tu , təzzar təmas - tan əs jəkkad - net , idnay ahan wa adu n alwardi .

text: Then saith one of his disciples , Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , which should betray him ,
text2: Inkar Yahuza Isxarəyuti wa n iyyan daɣ nalkiman ən Ɣaysa was ənta tu - z - agin daɣ fassan inna :

text: Why was not this ointment sold for three hundred pence , and given to the poor ?
text2: « Mafel wər din nəzzənza alwardi wa nabəz - du daɣ - as azrəf ən karadat təmad n əzəl n əššəɣəl nakf - ay i tələqqawen ? »

text: This he said , not that he cared for the poor ; but because he was a thief , and had the bag , and bare what was put therein .
text2: Arat wa wər t - inna fəl təhanint ən tələqqawen , kalar abaydag a imos , amaran ənta a ittafan əsəgrəs wa itaggaz əzrəf , idakkal awa t - ihan .

text: Then said Jesus , Let her alone : against the day of my burying hath she kept this .
text2: Eges ya inna Ɣaysa : « Ayy - et ! Alwardi wa kala da togaz - tu y əzəl wa n ətəwənbal - in .

text: For the poor always ye have with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Šiləqqawen faw da təddewam dər - əsnat , nak amaran wərgeɣ faw əlle ɣur - wan . »

text: Much people of the Jews therefore knew that he was there : and they came not for Jesus ' sake only , but that they might see Lazarus also , whom he had raised from the dead .
text2: Təsla tiddawat tagget ən Kəl - Əlyəhud as illa Ɣaysa den təzzar osan - in ehan wen , mišan wərge Ɣaysa ɣas din - əkkan , kalar awnaf a tan - ihan ən Lazarəs wa d - issənkar daɣ nəməttan .

text: But the chief priests consulted that they might put Lazarus also to death ;
text2: Təzzar əssərdaɣan - du limaman win zawwarnen tanat n ad anɣin Lazarəs ənta da ,

text: Because that by reason of him many of the Jews went away , and believed on Jesus .
text2: fəlas əddəlil - net a fəl dəffər - san əfalan Kəl - Əlyəhud aggotnen əzzəgzanan əs Ɣaysa .

text: On the next day much people that were come to the feast , when they heard that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem ,
text2: As affaw əslan aytedan aggotnen a d - əkkanen amud , as Ɣaysa iggaz - du aɣrəm wa n Yerusalam .

text: Took branches of palm trees , and went forth to meet him , and cried , Hosanna : Blessed is the King of Israel that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Ədkalan - du izəlan ən təlazdaq təzzar əglan əlkadan - as saɣaren gannin : « Hosanna ! Təgrəwaɣet albaraka , kay a d - osan s esəm n Əməli , kay əmənokal n Israyil ! »

text: And Jesus , when he had found a young ass , sat thereon ; as it is written ,
text2: Igraw Ɣaysa əhulel , iwan - tu , s asaway was iha awen Akatab wa innan :

text: Fear not , daughter of Sion : behold , thy King cometh , sitting on an ass ' s colt .
text2: « Ad wər təššəwəša ya wələt Syon * , əmənokal - nam əddi a din - izayan əddi , iwan əhulel . »

text: These things understood not his disciples at the first : but when Jesus was glorified , then remembered they that these things were written of him , and that they had done these things unto him .
text2: Inalkiman - net wər əgren arat wa daɣ tizarat , mišan assaɣa wad igraw Ɣaysa adkul - net , əktan - du as Akatab imal aratan win , amaran arat wa imal kul itiwag - as . »

text: The people therefore that was with him when he called Lazarus out of his grave , and raised him from the dead , bare record .
text2: Tamattay ta təmməgnet assaɣa wa daɣ d - iɣra Ɣaysa Lazarəs daɣ təsaskawt issənkar - t - idu daɣ təmattant , təggəyyat - as .

text: For this cause the people also met him , for that they heard that he had done this miracle .
text2: Awen da fəl das - du - təssəlkad tiddawat , fəlas əslan as iga alɣalamat ta .

text: The Pharisees therefore said among themselves , Perceive ye how ye prevail nothing ? behold , the world is gone after him .
text2: Təzzar ad tinəmənnin Farisaytan gar - essan : « Toggam - tu ? Indar - awan a dər t - in təkkam , har as aytedan kul əlkaman - as . »

text: And there were certain Greeks among them that came up to worship at the feast :
text2: Əllan - tu arat daɣ Kəl Təgərekt əhanen aytedan win d - əggəzzaynen əs Yerusalam y ad əɣbədan daɣ azzaman n əmud .

text: The same came therefore to Philip , which was of Bethsaida of Galilee , and desired him , saying , Sir , we would see Jesus .
text2: Əkkan iyyan daɣ nalkiman ən Ɣaysa igan Filibbus wa n təɣrəmt ən Betsayda ta n akal ən Galilaya , ənnan - as : « Nəgmay daɣ - ak ad nənəy Ɣaysa . »

text: Philip cometh and telleth Andrew : and again Andrew and Philip tell Jesus .
text2: Igla Filibbus imal y Andrawəs , dəffər adi iddew Andrawəs əd Filibbus əmalan arat wa i Ɣaysa .

text: And Jesus answered them , saying , The hour is come , that the Son of man should be glorified .
text2: Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Alwaq ewad - du əmərədda wa daɣ z - igrəw Ag Awedan adkul - net .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except a corn of wheat fall into the ground and die , it abideth alone : but if it die , it bringeth forth much fruit .
text2: Əggəyyeɣ əsilakanaɣ - awan as tablalt n alkama as wər tərtek daɣ amadal təmmut , ad taglu təmos ɣas - net , mišan as təmmut , ad tag ' ara aggen .

text: He that loveth his life shall lose it ; and he that hateth his life in this world shall keep it unto life eternal .
text2: I iran iman - net ad t - əgmədan . Amaran awedan wa iksanan iman - net daɣ əddənet ta , wədi wər tu - z - əgmədan kundaba əqqalan - as təməddurt təɣlalat .

text: If any man serve me , let him follow me ; and where I am , there shall also my servant be : if any man serve me , him will my Father honour .
text2: Awedan kul wa iran a di - išɣəl , ilkəmet - i , as iga adi edag wa əheɣ ənta a z - iggəz , akf - ay deɣ Abba - nin almaqam .

text: Now is my soul troubled ; and what shall I say ? Father , save me from this hour : but for this cause came I unto this hour .
text2: « Əmərədda əɣšadan man - in . Ma z - anna ? Ak ad anna : " Abba safs - i daɣ assaɣat ta ? Mišan wər d - ewedaɣ alwaq wa ar fəl a fall - i agu .

text: Father , glorify thy name . Then came there a voice from heaven , saying , I have both glorified it , and will glorify it again .
text2: Abba , sənnəfiləl təla - nak adkul . » Təzzar igmad - du əməsli ijənnawan inna : « Təla - nin adkul əsinafalalaq - qat , amaran a tat - ələsaɣ əsənnəfiləl . »

text: The people therefore , that stood by , and heard it , said that it thundered : others said , An angel spake to him .
text2: Tamattay ta təllat den , təsla y əməsli wa , a təɣil eggag . Ad əgannin wiyyad : « Angalos das - iššewalan da n əmərədda . »

text: Jesus answered and said , This voice came not because of me , but for your sakes .
text2: Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Əməsli wa wərgeɣ əddəlil - in a fəl d - iga , kalar əddəlil - nawan kawanay .

text: Now is the judgment of this world : now shall the prince of this world be cast out .
text2: Əmərədda ad za tətəwəxkəm əddənet - ta . Əmərədda din z - itəwəgər əmuzar n əddənet ta .

text: And I , if I be lifted up from the earth , will draw all men unto me .
text2: Amaran nak as tawasahake fəl amadal əwara təgəttawt , a d - əlwəyaɣ aytedan kul əs man - in . »

text: This he said , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Batu ta isidagan sər - əs esaway was tu - z - iba .

text: The people answered him , We have heard out of the law that Christ abideth for ever : and how sayest thou , The Son of man must be lifted up ? who is this Son of man ?
text2: Tənn - as tamattay : « Nənay daɣ Əttawrit as Əlməsix ad agu təməddurt təɣlalat . Manəmmək amaran as dana - za - tannaɣ Ag Awedan ad itəwəsəhukət fəl amadal ? Ma imos Ag Awedan was təgannaɣ əddi ? »

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Yet a little while is the light with you . Walk while ye have the light , lest darkness come upon you : for he that walketh in darkness knoweth not whither he goeth .
text2: Təzzar inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Ənnur harwa da illa ɣur - wan , har agin arat n azzaman , jəwənkətat iket di ad t - illa ənnur fəl a kawan wər əɣdərnat šiyyay , fəlas wa ijawanken daɣ šiyyay , adi wər issen sas idag .

text: While ye have light , believe in the light , that ye may be the children of light . These things spake Jesus , and departed , and did hide himself from them .
text2: Iket təlam ənnur , zəgzənat sər - əs fəl ad təqqəlam bararan n ənnur . » As iɣrad Ɣaysa igi ən batu ta , igla ilɣas - asan daɣ adag a iggugan .

text: But though he had done so many miracles before them , yet they believed not on him :
text2: Alɣalamaten aggotnen šin iga Ɣaysa dat - san , wər sər - san d ewaynat as sər - əs əzzəgzənan ,

text: That the saying of Esaias the prophet might be fulfilled , which he spake , Lord , who hath believed our report ? and to whom hath the arm of the Lord been revealed ?
text2: fəl ad təkmal batu ta iga ənnəbi Isayas as inna : « Əməli , ma imos wa izzəgzanan s arat wa nəmal ? Ma imos was tənafalal tarna n Əməli ? »

text: Therefore they could not believe , because that Esaias said again ,
text2: Əddəlil wa fəl wər əfregan ad əzzəgzanan əntada imal - tu ənnəbi Isayas as inna :

text: He hath blinded their eyes , and hardened their heart ; that they should not see with their eyes , nor understand with their heart , and be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: Məššina a tan - isaddarɣalan , issəɣar iwallan - nasan , fəl ad ib - as hannaynat šittawen - nasan , ib - as garrin wallan - nasan , fəl a sər - əs wər mələlləyan izzuzəy - tan . »

text: These things said Esaias , when he saw his glory , and spake of him .
text2: Isayas inna aratan win fəlas inay adkul ən Ɣaysa , amaran immigrad fall - as .

text: Nevertheless among the chief rulers also many believed on him ; but because of the Pharisees they did not confess him , lest they should be put out of the synagogue :
text2: As ig ' awen da imuzaran iman - nasan da a daɣ - san aggen əzzigzanan sər - əs , mišan fəl təksəda ən Farisaytan , wər əhelan emel n awen , fəlas wər əren ad təwəkkəsan daɣ təməzgədda - nasan ,

text: For they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God .
text2: amaran əssofan saɣmar wa n aytedan y ədkul wa ihakku Məššina .

text: Jesus cried and said , He that believeth on me , believeth not on me , but on him that sent me .
text2: Idkal Ɣaysa əməsli - net inna : « Awedan wa sər - i izzəgzanan , wərge nak ɣas as izzəgzan , kalar wa di - d - izammazalan da izzigzan sər - əs .

text: And he that seeth me seeth him that sent me .
text2: Amaran wa daɣ - i iswadan , adi wa di - d - izammazalan a daɣ iswad .

text: I am come a light into the world , that whosoever believeth on me should not abide in darkness .
text2: Nak zun ənnur a mosa , əkke - du əddənet yas i sər - i izzəgzanan wər z ' aqqam daɣ šiyyay .

text: And if any man hear my words , and believe not , I judge him not : for I came not to judge the world , but to save the world .
text2: As isla awedan i batuten - in iqqim wər tanat - ittef , wərge nak a tu - z - awwaddaban , fəlas nak efsan n aytedan a d - əkke s əddənet , wərgeɣ attadib - nasan .

text: He that rejecteth me , and receiveth not my words , hath one that judgeth him : the word that I have spoken , the same shall judge him in the last day .
text2: Daɣ adi awedan kul wa di - olkan , iqqim wər iga tembay daɣ batuten - in , wədi illa - tu wa tu - z - awwaddaban . Awal wa da əge da iman - net a das - z - išrəɣan əzəl a ilkaman .

text: For I have not spoken of myself ; but the Father which sent me , he gave me a commandment , what I should say , and what I should speak .
text2: Fəlas batuten - in wərge gər - i əd man - in as tanat - əge , kalar Abba wa di - d - issəglan iman - net as di - omar s arat was ihor ad t - anna , əd was ihor a fall - as ammagrada .

text: And I know that his commandment is life everlasting : whatsoever I speak therefore , even as the Father said unto me , so I speak .
text2: Əssanaɣ as arat was omar ənta a itawayan əs təməddurt ta təɣlalat . Daɣ adi , arat wa fəl əmməgrada , əmmək wa daɣ as di - t - imal Abba ənta as sər - əs əmməgrada . »

text: And supper being ended , the devil having now put into the heart of Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , to betray him ;
text2: Itamansaw Ɣaysa əd nalkiman - net ehad . As itag ' awen da Iblis iga ̂ daɣ əwəl ən Yahuza wa n ag Simɣon Isxarəyuti təkaddilt ən Ɣaysa .

text: Jesus knowing that the Father had given all things into his hands , and that he was come from God , and went to God ;
text2: Ɣaysa issa ̂ n as Məššina di n Abba iga ̂ arat kul daɣ əfus - net , issa ̂ n tolas as igma ̂ d - du Məššina harwa ad t - iqqəl .

text: He riseth from supper , and laid aside his garments ; and took a towel , and girded himself .
text2: Ibdad fəl mensewan , təzzar ikkas takatkat - net ta n afalla , idkal afər igbas - tu ,

text: After that he poureth water into a bason , and began to wash the disciples ' feet , and to wipe them with the towel wherewith he was girded .
text2: təzzar iga aman daɣ aɣlal , ad išarad idaran ən nalkiman - net , immas - tan s əfər wa igbas da .

text: Then cometh he to Simon Peter : and Peter saith unto him , Lord , dost thou wash my feet ?
text2: As d - ewad Ɣaysa Simɣon Butros inn - as : « Əməli , kay , a z - išširədan idaran - nin ? »

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , What I do thou knowest not now ; but thou shalt know hereafter .
text2: Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Awa tagga da wər təfrega əgərri - net əmərədda mišan a tu - tagra dəffər awa . »

text: Peter saith unto him , Thou shalt never wash my feet . Jesus answered him , If I wash thee not , thou hast no part with me .
text2: Inn - as Butros : « Kay , ad təšširəda idaran - in ? Wala ənəmihaz ! » Inn - as Ɣaysa : « As dak - tan - wər - əššorada nak dər - ək nəmmizzay . »

text: Simon Peter saith unto him , Lord , not my feet only , but also my hands and my head .
text2: Inn - as Simɣon Butros : « Daɣ adi Əməli , wərge idaran - nin ɣas , šired harkid fassan d aɣaf . »

text: Jesus saith to him , He that is washed needeth not save to wash his feet , but is clean every whit : and ye are clean , but not all .
text2: Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Awedan iššoradan , wər iddarar ar əširəd ən daran y ad izdag ketnet , amaran kawanay , təzəddigam , mišan wərge ketnawan . »

text: For he knew who should betray him ; therefore said he , Ye are not all clean .
text2: Ɣaysa issa ̂ n wa tu - z - akkaddalan ; adi a fəl inna : « Wər təzəddigam ketnawan . »

text: So after he had washed their feet , and had taken his garments , and was set down again , he said unto them , Know ye what I have done to you ?
text2: As iɣrad Ɣaysa əširəd ən daran - nasan , izlag takatkat - net , iqqal edag - net , təzzar inn - asan : « Awak təgra ̂ m awa dawan - əge da ?

text: Ye call me Master and Lord : and ye say well ; for so I am .
text2: Təgannim - i " Aməsəsseɣri " d " Əməli " , təgannim a olaghan , fəlas əmosaq - q .

text: If I then , your Lord and Master , have washed your feet ; ye also ought to wash one another ' s feet .
text2: Daɣ adi kud nak , imosan Əməli d Əməsəsseɣri , əššorada idaran - nawan , iwar - kawan , kawanay da , daɣ ilkam wa , ad tətimaširidam idaran .

text: For I have given you an example , that ye should do as I have done to you .
text2: Əsəknaq - qawan arat wen fəl a tu - tətaggim kawanay da s əmmək was dawan - t - əge .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord ; neither he that is sent greater than he that sent him .
text2: Əggəyyeɣ silakanaɣ - awan as , akli wər oger məššis , wala da ogar anammazal wa t - id - izammazalan .

text: If ye know these things , happy are ye if ye do them .
text2: Amaran dad təssanam aratan win , iket təfalawist a tat - tagim kudis tətamazalam - tan .

text: I speak not of you all : I know whom I have chosen : but that the scripture may be fulfilled , He that eateth bread with me hath lifted up his heel against me .
text2: Wər dawan - gənna ketnawan ; win sannafrana kul əzda ̂ yaq - qan mišan kundaba inda awa əmalan əlkəttaban as ənnan : " Wa dər ədrawa , iqqal amaksan - in " .

text: Now I tell you before it come , that , when it is come to pass , ye may believe that I am he .
text2: Ənneɣ adi əmərədda harwa wər iga , y ad təzzəgzənam , as iga , as nak əmosa wa illan da .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that receiveth whomsoever I send receiveth me ; and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: Əggəyyeɣ silakanaɣ - awan as wa iqbalan əyyan daɣ nəmmuzal - in , nak iman - in a iqbal . Harwa wa di - iqbalan , wa di - d - izammazalan a iqbal »

text: When Jesus had thus said , he was troubled in spirit , and testified , and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: As inna Ɣaysa awen , əɣšadan man - net , təzzar inna : « Əggəyyeɣ silakanaɣ - awan as iyyan daɣ - wan a di - akkaddal . »

text: Then the disciples looked one on another , doubting of whom he spake .
text2: Ad tinəməswidan nalkiman - net , əqqa ̂ nan ɣafawan - nasan i was igannu .

text: Now there was leaning on Jesus ' bosom one of his disciples , whom Jesus loved .
text2: Iyyan daɣ nalkiman - net , wa isannahal Ɣaysa tara , isiɣamar daɣ ihəz n ədmaran ən Ɣaysa .

text: Simon Peter therefore beckoned to him , that he should ask who it should be of whom he spake .
text2: Isaddagan - as Simɣon Butros ad issəstən Ɣaysa əd was igannu .

text: He then lying on Jesus ' breast saith unto him , Lord , who is it ?
text2: Təzzar inaz - in analkim wen fəl ədmaran ən Ɣaysa , inn - as : « Əməli , ma z - iqqəl ? »

text: Jesus answered , He it is , to whom I shall give a sop , when I have dipped it . And when he had dipped the sop , he gave it to Judas Iscariot , the son of Simon .
text2: Ijəwwab - as Ɣaysa : « Wa əkfe akarammu ən tagəlla wa z - əssəlməɣa daɣ ədrəz a . » Təzzar issəlmaɣ akarammu ən təgəlla ikfay i Yahuza ag Simɣon Isxarəyuti .

text: And after the sop Satan entered into him . Then said Jesus unto him , That thou doest , do quickly .
text2: Dəffər as igra ̂ w Yahuza akarammu ən təgəlla wen , iggaz - tu Iblis . Təzzar inn - as Ɣaysa : « Tagaɣet tarmad awa kay iwaran . »

text: Now no man at the table knew for what intent he spake this unto him .
text2: Mišan wələyyan daɣ win dər - əs ədrawnen wər igra awa fəl das - inn ' awen .

text: For some of them thought , because Judas had the bag , that Jesus had said unto him , Buy those things that we have need of against the feast ; or , that he should give something to the poor .
text2: Wəyyad orda ̂ n as , iduf wa iga Yahuza azrəf ən nalkiman a fəl das - inna Ɣaysa : « zanzad - du arat was za naddarar y əmud ; madeɣ akfu šiləqqawen arat iyyan . »

text: He then having received the sop went immediately out : and it was night .
text2: Ibaz Yahuza akarammu ən tagəlla , igmad tarmad , as itag ' awen da ehad iga ̂ .

text: Therefore , when he was gone out , Jesus said , Now is the Son of man glorified , and God is glorified in him .
text2: As igmad Yahuza , inna Ɣaysa : « Əmərədda tarna ən Barar n Awedan təni ̂ falal , tolas tarna ən Məššina tənifalal daɣ - as .

text: If God be glorified in him , God shall also glorify him in himself , and shall straightway glorify him .
text2: Kud tarna ən Məššina tənifalal daɣ - as , Məššina ənta da ad isənnəfiləl daɣ man - net tarna ən Barar n Awedan daɣ alwaq ihozan wəllen .

text: Little children , yet a little while I am with you . Ye shall seek me : and as I said unto the Jews , Whither I go , ye cannot come ; so now I say to you .
text2: Imaran - in , alwaq wər nəggət a ɣur - wan z - aga . A di - təgmiyam mišan edag wa əkkeɣ wər təfregam a t - in - tawədam . Kala ənneɣ adi i Kəl Əlyəhud amaran , kawanay da ənneɣ - awan - tu əmərədda .

text: A new commandment I give unto you , That ye love one another ; as I have loved you , that ye also love one another .
text2: A dawan - aga alwajib aynayan : namariwat . Namariwat kawanay da s əmmək was kawan - are .

text: By this shall all men know that ye are my disciples , if ye have love one to another .
text2: Kud tani ̂ maram , adi a z - issusənan aytedan kul as kawanay inalkiman - in . »

text: Simon Peter said unto him , Lord , whither goest thou ? Jesus answered him , Whither I go , thou canst not follow me now ; but thou shalt follow me afterwards .
text2: Inn - as Simɣon Butros : « Əməli , mənid təkke . » Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Edag wa əkke , wər təfrega a di sər - əs təlkəma əmərədda , eges a din - təlkəma dəffər awa . »

text: Peter said unto him , Lord , why cannot I follow thee now ? I will lay down my life for thy sake .
text2: Inn - as Simɣon Butros : « Əməli , mafel as wər əfrega a dak sər - əs əlkəma əmərədda . Əgaraɣ iri y a fall - ak akfa iman - nin . »

text: Jesus answered him , Wilt thou lay down thy life for my sake ? Verily , verily , I say unto thee , The cock shall not crow , till thou hast denied me thrice .
text2: Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Adis a fall - i takfaɣ iman - nak ? Əggəyyeɣ silakanaɣ - ak as wər z - aɣru əkəji aɣora wər di - tənkura har karadat ta ̇ klaten . »

text: In my Father ' s house are many mansions : if it were not so , I would have told you . I go to prepare a place for you .
text2: Ehan n Abba - nin aha ̂ n - tu daggan aggotnen ən təməxsurt . Awak ənnar wər iga adi manəmmək as dawan - z - anna ad agla səmmutəgaɣ - awan edag təzdaɣam ?

text: And if I go and prepare a place for you , I will come again , and receive you unto myself ; that where I am , there ye may be also .
text2: As tu - sammataga , ad əqqala , idawaɣ - in dər - wan fəl ad təggəzam edag wa əhe .

text: And whither I go ye know , and the way ye know .
text2: Edag wa əkke təssa ̂ nam tarrayt - net . »

text: Thomas saith unto him , Lord , we know not whither thou goest ; and how can we know the way ?
text2: Inn - as Tuma : « Əməli wər nəssen dad təkke , manəmmək as za nəssən tarrayt - net ? »
