text: Jesus saith unto him , I am the way , the truth , and the life : no man cometh unto the Father , but by me .
text2: Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Nak a imosan tarrayt fəlas əmosa tidət əmosa əntada wa ihakkan təməddurt . Awedan wələyyan wər in - z - awəd Abba , ar s a di - d - imma ̂ r .

text: If ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also : and from henceforth ye know him , and have seen him .
text2: Ənnar di - təzdayam , təzdəyam Abba - nin ənta da . Amaran əmərədda təzdayam - tu , tolas tənayam - tu . »

text: Philip saith unto him , Lord , shew us the Father , and it sufficeth us .
text2: Inn - as Filif : « Əməli , susən - anaɣ Abba , adi igd - ana . »

text: Jesus saith unto him , Have I been so long time with you , and yet hast thou not known me , Philip ? he that hath seen me hath seen the Father ; and how sayest thou then , Shew us the Father ?
text2: Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Filibbus , əruwaɣ as dər - wan əddewa , eges harwada wər di - təzdaya ? Wər təssenaɣ as wa di - inayan , šilat n as ina ̂ y Abba ! Daɣ adi manəmmək as təganna : " Susən - anaɣ Abba ? "

text: Believest thou not that I am in the Father , and the Father in me ? the words that I speak unto you I speak not of myself : but the Father that dwelleth in me , he doeth the works .
text2: Wər təzzəgzanaɣ as , nak d Abba nəmos arat iyyanda ? Batuten šin dawan - əmmala da , wərge nak ad d - əgmadnat , kalar Abba dər əmosaɣ arat iyyanda sər - i isandan imazalan - net .

text: Believe me that I am in the Father , and the Father in me : or else believe me for the very works ' sake .
text2: Zəgzanat - i , nak d Abba arat iyyanda a nəmos ; kud wər təzzəgzanam s awa ənne , zəgzənat fəl əddəlil ən mazalan win as di - tənayam taggaq - qan .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me , the works that I do shall he do also ; and greater works than these shall he do ; because I go unto my Father .
text2: Əggəyyeɣ əsilakanaɣ - awan as wa sər - i izzəgzanan , əntada ad agu imazalan šilat ən win tagga . Fadda ad agu win tan - ogarnen , fəlas nak ad akkaɣ Abba .

text: And whatsoever ye shall ask in my name , that will I do , that the Father may be glorified in the Son .
text2: Amaran a iqqal arat wa təgmayam s esəm - in a tt - aga , fəl ad tətəwənəy tarna n Abba daɣ Barar .

text: If ye shall ask any thing in my name , I will do it .
text2: As daɣ - i təgmayam arat a iqqal s esəm - in , a tt - aga .

text: If ye love me , keep my commandments .
text2: « Kud tara a di - təgam , təttəfam alwajiban - in .

text: And I will pray the Father , and he shall give you another Comforter , that he may abide with you for ever ;
text2: Amaran ad əgməya daɣ Abba a kawan - akfu iyyan əməggi ən təlxutbat a ɣur - wan z ' iməlan har faw .

text: Even the Spirit of truth ; whom the world cannot receive , because it seeth him not , neither knoweth him : but ye know him ; for he dwelleth with you , and shall be in you .
text2: Ənta a imosan Infas wa isinəfililan tidət , was wər təfreg əddənet əlqəbulat - net , fəlas wər tu - təhənnəy wala da təzday - tu ; eges kawanay təzda ̂ yam - tu fəlas ihhirag dər - wan amaran ad iggəz iwallan - nawan .

text: I will not leave you comfortless : I will come to you .
text2: Wər kawan - z - ayya daɣ əddenet təmosam šilat ən gugelan , a kawan - d - əqqəla .

text: Yet a little while , and the world seeth me no more ; but ye see me : because I live , ye shall live also .
text2: Dəffər alwaq wər nəggət , əddənet wər di - za - tələs anay ; eges kawanay a di - tələsam anay fəlas ədda ̂ ra , amaran kawanay da ad təddəram .

text: At that day ye shall know that I am in my Father , and ye in me , and I in you .
text2: Alwaq wədi ad təssənam as nak d Abba - nin arat iyyanda a nəmos , təssənam əntada as təham əwəl - in nak da aheɣ win - nawan .

text: He that hath my commandments , and keepeth them , he it is that loveth me : and he that loveth me shall be loved of my Father , and I will love him , and will manifest myself to him .
text2: Wa ittafan alwajiban - in , ənta a di - iran . Wa di - iran at - t - iru Abba - nin , araq - qu nak da , təzzar əssusənaq - qu iman - in . »

text: Judas saith unto him , not Iscariot , Lord , how is it that thou wilt manifest thyself unto us , and not unto the world ?
text2: Inn - as Yahuza wa wər nəmos ag Isxarəyuti : « Əməli , manəmmək as dana - za - təssusənaɣ iman - nak nakkanay ɣas , wər tan - təssosana y əddənet ? »

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , If a man love me , he will keep my words : and my Father will love him , and we will come unto him , and make our abode with him .
text2: Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Awedan wa di - iran , ad ittəf awa ənne , ir - ay Abba - nin , nas - ay - du nəməl ɣur - əs .

text: He that loveth me not keepeth not my sayings : and the word which ye hear is not mine , but the Father ' s which sent me .
text2: Wa di - wər - nəra , wədi wər əttef batuten - in ; amaran batu tas təsallim da , wərge nak a tat - igan kala ar šin Abba s ənta a di - d - izammazalan .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , being yet present with you .
text2: « Əgeɣ - awan - tat harwa kawan - əhe .

text: But the Comforter , which is the Holy Ghost , whom the Father will send in my name , he shall teach you all things , and bring all things to your remembrance , whatsoever I have said unto you .
text2: Amaran Aməggi ən təlxutbat imosan Infas wa Zəddigan wa dawan - du - z - assaglu Abba s əsəm - in , a kawan - isassaɣru aratan kul , assakt - iwan - du arat kul wa dawan - ənne nak iman - in .

text: Peace I leave with you , my peace I give unto you : not as the world giveth , give I unto you . Let not your heart be troubled , neither let it be afraid .
text2: Oyyeɣ - awan - d alxer , əkfeq - qawan alxer wa - nin ; nak , wər dawan - t - əkfeɣ əs təməwit tas t - illa daɣ əddənet ; ad wər təššəwəšam wala təggəz - kawan tasa .

text: Ye have heard how I said unto you , I go away , and come again unto you . If ye loved me , ye would rejoice , because I said , I go unto the Father : for my Father is greater than I .
text2: Təsla ̂ m as dawan - ən ̣ n ̣ e : " Teklay a əgeɣ " , ənneɣ harwa " a kawan - d - əqqəla " . Ənnar ixsa ̂ l as di - təra ̂ m , təsəddəwət - kawan tənna ta əgeɣ : " Əqqalaɣ Abba " , fəlas Abba ogar - i .

text: And now I have told you before it come to pass , that , when it is come to pass , ye might believe .
text2: Amaran aratan win əmalaɣ - awan - tan əmərədda harwa wər əgen , fəl a sər - i təzzəgzənam alwaq wa ad z - agin .

text: Hereafter I will not talk much with you : for the prince of this world cometh , and hath nothing in me .
text2: Wər dər - wan z - ələsa igi ən batu tagget , fəlas anaxkim n əddənet izay - du . Wər di - in - ikka d arat ,

text: But that the world may know that I love the Father ; and as the Father gave me commandment , even so I do . Arise , let us go hence .
text2: mišan kundaba əgeɣ awa as di - omar Abba , təssən əddənet əntada as areɣ Abba . » As iɣrad batu inn - asan : « Ənkərat əgmədatana edag a . »

text: Every branch in me that beareth not fruit he taketh away : and every branch that beareth fruit , he purgeth it , that it may bring forth more fruit .
text2: Alədlid - in kul wa wər nətirəw ad t - ixtəs , wa itarawan ad t - ifnəz fəl ad d - inzər agu ara aggen .

text: Now ye are clean through the word which I have spoken unto you .
text2: Zund adi da , kawanay da eway - du sər - wan awal - in tazdak ;

text: Abide in me , and I in you . As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself , except it abide in the vine ; no more can ye , except ye abide in me .
text2: agiwat dər - i tartəyt šilat ən ta dər - wan əge , zund as azəl wər z arəw ɣas - net as d - iqqətas daɣ ašək ; kawanay da əlmital di da a təham as dər - i wər tərtayam .

text: I am the vine , ye are the branches : He that abideth in me , and I in him , the same bringeth forth much fruit : for without me ye can do nothing .
text2: « Nak a imosan esab n əzzəbib , kawanay ilədlad - net . Wa dər - i igan tartəyt ta dər - əs əge , a t - idu - təgməd tənfa tagget fəlas as daɣ - i in - təqqətasam wər təfregam wala .

text: If a man abide not in me , he is cast forth as a branch , and is withered ; and men gather them , and cast them into the fire , and they are burned .
text2: Wa dər - i wər nərtay , a din - itəwəgər šilat n ələdlid iqqitasan , aqqar , itəwəkəmməd - du , itəwəgər daɣ təmse , ibələgləg .

text: If ye abide in me , and my words abide in you , ye shall ask what ye will , and it shall be done unto you .
text2: As dər - i tərtayam , təttafam batuten - in , əgmiyat daɣ Məššina di n Abba arat kul wa təram , a tu - təgrawam .

text: Herein is my Father glorified , that ye bear much fruit ; so shall ye be my disciples .
text2: Ənta da awa as tətawanay tarna n Abba - nin : a du tarəwam tənfa tagget , assaknu adi as təmosam inalkiman - in .

text: As the Father hath loved me , so have I loved you : continue ye in my love .
text2: Tara ta di - iga Abba , ənta a dawan əge ; a tat - wər - təgmədam .

text: If ye keep my commandments , ye shall abide in my love ; even as I have kept my Father ' s commandments , and abide in his love .
text2: Kud təttafam alwajiban - in , wədi təham tara - nin zund əmmək as nak da əttafa win Abba , əhe tara - nnet .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that my joy might remain in you , and that your joy might be full .
text2: « Ənneɣ - awan adi fəl at tagim tədəwit ta - nin , amaran da , at tandu tədəwit - nawan .

text: This is my commandment , That ye love one another , as I have loved you .
text2: Ənta da alwajib wa - nin : " Namariwat s əmmək was kawan - are . "

text: Greater love hath no man than this , that a man lay down his life for his friends .
text2: Wər tu - təlla tara togarat ad akfu awedan iman - net fəl midawan - net .

text: Ye are my friends , if ye do whatsoever I command you .
text2: Kud tətaggam awa as kawan - omara , wədi kawanay imidawan - in .

text: Henceforth I call you not servants ; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth : but I have called you friends ; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you .
text2: Wər dawan - gannaɣ eklan , fəlas akli wər itəssən arat wa itag məššis . Kala kalar əgeɣ - awan esəm imidawan - in , fəlas awa as əsleɣ ɣur Abba - nin kul əssosanaɣ - awan - tu .

text: Ye have not chosen me , but I have chosen you , and ordained you , that ye should go and bring forth fruit , and that your fruit should remain : that whatsoever ye shall ask of the Father in my name , he may give it you .
text2: Wər di - tasannafranam , eges kawanay , nak a kawan - isannafranan ; əsiwaraq - qawan at taglim , tarəwam - du tənfa tagget a za tahagit . Əddi a təgmayam daɣ Abba s əsəm - in a dawan - t - agu .

text: These things I command you , that ye love one another .
text2: Omaraq - qawan s ad tənəmərim .

text: If the world hate you , ye know that it hated me before it hated you .
text2: « Kud gezzar a kawan - təga əddənet , əssənat as təgza ̂ r - i dat - wan .

text: If ye were of the world , the world would love his own : but because ye are not of the world , but I have chosen you out of the world , therefore the world hateth you .
text2: Kud kawanay əddənet kawan təlat , wədi əddənet tara wa təla ; mišan wər kawan təla , fəlas nak kawan daɣ - as d - isannafranan , adi a fəl kawan təgzar .

text: Remember the word that I said unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord . If they have persecuted me , they will also persecute you ; if they have kept my saying , they will keep yours also .
text2: Aktiwat - du awa dawan - ənneɣ , as : " Akli wər oger məššis " ; kud əssəknan - i alɣazab , a dawan - t - assaknin kawanay da ; kud əttafan awal - in , kawanay da , ad əttəfan wa - nawan .

text: But all these things will they do unto you for my name ' s sake , because they know not him that sent me .
text2: Eges adi kul , əddəlil - in a fəl dawan - tu - z - agin ; fəlas wər əssenan wa di - d - izammazalan .

text: If I had not come and spoken unto them , they had not had sin : but now they have no cloke for their sin .
text2: « Ənnar du - wər - ose , əššewalaɣ - asan , wər z ' attarmasan əs bakkadan - nasan , eges əmərədda wər t - illa əsaru wələyyan a dasan - z - igdəlan a sər - san attarmasan .

text: He that hateth me hateth my Father also .
text2: Wa di - igzaran , igza ̂ r Abba - nin ənta da .

text: If I had not done among them the works which none other man did , they had not had sin : but now have they both seen and hated both me and my Father .
text2: Ənnar wər əge gar - essan imazalan əs wər t - illa awedan as kala tan - iga , wər z ' attarmasan əs bakkadan - nasan . Ənayan - tan əmərədda eges əglan , əgzaran - ana nak d Abba - nin .

text: But this cometh to pass , that the word might be fulfilled that is written in their law , They hated me without a cause .
text2: Mišan adi iga fəl at tandu batu ta tənnat daɣ Əlkəttaban n Ənnəbitan : " Əgzaran - i bannan . "

text: But when the Comforter is come , whom I will send unto you from the Father , even the Spirit of truth , which proceedeth from the Father , he shall testify of me :
text2: As d - osa Əməggi ən təlxutbat wa dawan - du - z - assagla ɣur Abba , imosan Infas wa isinəfililan tidət a sər - wan - du - z - igmədan Abba , a fall - i aggayyat .

text: And ye also shall bear witness , because ye have been with me from the beginning .
text2: Kawanay da , a fall - i taggayyem , fəlas təddewam dər - i harwa daɣ tizarat . »

text: They shall put you out of the synagogues : yea , the time cometh , that whosoever killeth you will think that he doeth God service .
text2: Ad tətəwəkkəsam daɣ təməzgəddawen ən Kəl - Əlyəhud , fadda ilka ̂ m alwaq daɣ - as wa daɣ - wan ikkasan iman , illa ɣur - əs as Məššina as iga tara - net .

text: And these things will they do unto you , because they have not known the Father , nor me .
text2: Adi a dawan - z - agin aytedan fəlas wərmad a di - əzdayan wala əssa ̂ nan Abba .

text: But these things have I told you , that when the time shall come , ye may remember that I told you of them . And these things I said not unto you at the beginning , because I was with you .
text2: Əmalaɣ - awan aratan di əmərədda , fəl a tan - du - taktim as d - ewad alwaq wa daɣ z ' agin aytedan tara - nasan . Aratan win wər dawan - tan - əmela daɣ tizarat n əššəɣəl - in ɣur - wan , fəlas alwaq wədi harwada əddewa dər - wan .

text: But now I go my way to him that sent me ; and none of you asketh me , Whither goest thou ?
text2: « Əmərədda ad əqqəla wa di - d - izammazalan , mišan wər kawan iha i di - issəstanan əd dad əkke .

text: But because I have said these things unto you , sorrow hath filled your heart .
text2: Eges əknan man - nawan axšud fəlas dawan - ənne adi .

text: Nevertheless I tell you the truth ; It is expedient for you that I go away : for if I go not away , the Comforter will not come unto you ; but if I depart , I will send him unto you .
text2: Dər iga adi da , a dawan - əməla tidət : of - awan ad agla , fəlas as wər əgle wər kawan - du - z - asu Əməggi ən təlxutbat , mišan as əgle a dawan - t - id - assagla .

text: And when he is come , he will reprove the world of sin , and of righteousness , and of judgment :
text2: As d - osa ad assaknu aytedan n əddənet as əxra ̂ kan daɣ batu n awa imosan abakkad , d awa imosan alɣadala ən Məššina d əššəriɣa - net .

text: Of sin , because they believe not on me ;
text2: Əxra ̂ kan daɣ batu n awa imos abakkad fəlas tugəyt s a əgan a sər - i əzzəgzənan ;

text: Of righteousness , because I go to my Father , and ye see me no more ;
text2: əxra ̂ kan daɣ batu n awa imosan alɣadala fəlas tewaɣlay a əgeɣ Abba amaran wər i - za - tələsam anay ;

text: Of judgment , because the prince of this world is judged .
text2: əxra ̂ kan daɣ batu n awa imosan əššəriɣa ən Məššina fəlas anaxkim n əddənet , a t - imosan Iblis , iba ̂ z - tu əššəriɣa .

text: I have yet many things to say unto you , but ye cannot bear them now .
text2: « Harwada əle batuten aggotnen as are a dawan - tanat - aga eges wər asnat - təzmeram əmərədda .

text: Howbeit when he , the Spirit of truth , is come , he will guide you into all truth : for he shall not speak of himself ; but whatsoever he shall hear , that shall he speak : and he will shew you things to come .
text2: As d - osa Infas wa isinifililan tidət , a kawan - issəlkəm i tidət kul ta du - təfalat Məššina fəlas batuten - net wər t - idu - z - əgmədnat , awa as z - aslu ɣas a daɣ dawan - z - iššiwəl ketnet , iməl - awan aratan win d - əzaynen ,

text: He shall glorify me : for he shall receive of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: izəzwər - i fəlas isalan - in win z - igrəw ɣas a dawan - z - iməl .

text: All things that the Father hath are mine : therefore said I , that he shall take of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Awa iqqalan Abba ketnet iqqal - i nak da ; adi a fəl ənne , isalan - in win z ' igrəw Infas wa Zəddigan a dawan - z - iməl .

text: A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me , because I go to the Father .
text2: « A dawan - əgmədaɣ anay dəffər alwaq wər nəggət , mišan a di - tələsam anay daɣ adan wər nəggət dəffər adi . »

text: Then said some of his disciples among themselves , What is this that he saith unto us , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me : and , Because I go to the Father ?
text2: Təzzar namannan wəyyad daɣ nalkiman - net : « Ma imos almaɣna n awa danaɣ - inna da ? " A dawan - əgmədaɣ anay dəffər alwaq wər nəggət , mišan a di - tələsam anay daɣ adan wər nəggət dəffər adi ? " Ənta da ma imos almaɣna n " Abba a əkke " ?

text: They said therefore , What is this that he saith , A little while ? we cannot tell what he saith .
text2: Ma imos almaɣna ən " daɣ alwaq wər nəggət " wa immal da ? Wər nəssen awa as iha batu - net »

text: Now Jesus knew that they were desirous to ask him , and said unto them , Do ye inquire among yourselves of that I said , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me ?
text2: Issan Ɣaysa as əra ̂ n at - t - əsəstanan . Inn - asan : « Tətinamasəstinam fəlas ənne : " A dawan - əgmədaɣ anay dəffər alwaq wər nəggət , mišan a di - tələsam anay daɣ adan wər nəggət dəffər adi "

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , That ye shall weep and lament , but the world shall rejoice : and ye shall be sorrowful , but your sorrow shall be turned into joy .
text2: Əggəyyeɣ silakanaɣ - awan as at - talim , təsəkkələlam mišan as itag adi aytedan n əddənet əntanay əddəwen . Ad əxšədan man - nawan eges axšud di a tu - təzrəy tədəwit .

text: A woman when she is in travail hath sorrow , because her hour is come : but as soon as she is delivered of the child , she remembereth no more the anguish , for joy that a man is born into the world .
text2: Tantut as iqqal tətaggaz amadal , ad əxšədan man - net fəl aggad wa du - təga alwaq - net ; mišan as d - ihu barar - net , at - tammazzay d əsəmmədrən daɣ arkanay wa tənay , isəddəwat - tat as du - təgga awedan daɣ əddənet .

text: And ye now therefore have sorrow : but I will see you again , and your heart shall rejoice , and your joy no man taketh from you .
text2: Kawanay da zund adi da , əmərədda əxša ̂ dan man - nawan , mišan a kawan - ələsaɣ anay , əzəl wədi at tagim tədəwit as tu - wər - illa i daɣ - wan tat - z - ikkəsan .

text: And in that day ye shall ask me nothing . Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name , he will give it you .
text2: Wər - i - za - təssəstanam d arat wələyyan əzəl wədi . Əggəyyeɣ silakanaɣ - awan as , a təgmayam daɣ Abba s esəm - in a dawan - t - agu .

text: Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name : ask , and ye shall receive , that your joy may be full .
text2: Harwada wər t - illa a təgma ̂ yam s - esəm - in . Əgmiyat at təgrəwam fəl at tagim tədəwit təkma ̂ lat »

text: These things have I spoken unto you in proverbs : but the time cometh , when I shall no more speak unto you in proverbs , but I shall shew you plainly of the Father .
text2: « Əma ̂ laɣ - awan adi əs šaššelan , mišan ilka ̂ m alwaq daɣ awan - wər - z - əlasaɣ emel n arat wələyyan wa iqqalan Abba əs šaššelan , a dawan t - əməla s awa imos .

text: At that day ye shall ask in my name : and I say not unto you , that I will pray the Father for you :
text2: Əzəl wədi at təgməyam daɣ Abba s esəm - in . Wər awan - ənne a dawan daɣ - as əgmiya ,

text: For the Father himself loveth you , because ye have loved me , and have believed that I came out from God .
text2: fəlas Abba iman - net ir - iwan fəlas di - təram , ənta da təzzigzanam as ɣur - əs d - əgma ̂ da .

text: I came forth from the Father , and am come into the world : again , I leave the world , and go to the Father .
text2: Abba a ɣur d - əgmada , ose - du əddənet amaran əmərədda a tat - əgməda əqqəlaq - q . »

text: His disciples said unto him , Lo , now speakest thou plainly , and speakest no proverb .
text2: Təzzar ənnan - as nalkiman - net : « Ənəy , əmərədda təmmalaɣ - anaɣ aratan s awa mosan , wərge əs šaššelan .

text: Now are we sure that thou knowest all things , and needest not that any man should ask thee : by this we believe that thou camest forth from God .
text2: Əmərədda nəssan as təssa ̂ naɣ daɣ arat kul , wər t - illa arat a iqqal a dak - iɣbaran ; adi da a fəl nəzzəgzan as Abba a ɣur du - təgmada . »

text: Jesus answered them , Do ye now believe ?
text2: Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Adis əmərədda təzzəgzanam ? »

text: Behold , the hour cometh , yea , is now come , that ye shall be scattered , every man to his own , and shall leave me alone : and yet I am not alone , because the Father is with me .
text2: Ənəyat , alwaq ihoz , fadda iga , wa daɣ za tətəwwəziwəzam , akkiyyan akku aɣaywan - net , tayyim - i - d ɣas - in ; mišan ya wər əmosa ɣas - in fəlas illa ɣur - i Abba .

text: These things I have spoken unto you , that in me ye might have peace . In the world ye shall have tribulation : but be of good cheer ; I have overcome the world .
text2: Əmalaɣ - awan arat wa fəl at təgrəwam alxer daɣ tərtəyt ta dər - i təgam . At təniyam arkanay daɣ əddənet , mišan iliwat əwəl , fəlas ərzeɣ əddənet . »

text: As thou hast given him power over all flesh , that he should give eternal life to as many as thou hast given him .
text2: id təzzozaraq - qu y aytedan kul fəl ad akfu təməddurt ta təɣlalat i win tu - təkfe .

text: And this is life eternal , that they might know thee the only true God , and Jesus Christ , whom thou hast sent .
text2: Amaran ənta təməddurt ta təɣlalat awa tat - imosan , ad inəfiləl y aytedan awa təmosa , kay ɣas Məššina wa n tidət ; inəfiləl - asan əntada as Ɣaysa Əlməsix a du - təzammazala .

text: I have glorified thee on the earth : I have finished the work which thou gavest me to do .
text2: Əssikna tarna - nak fəl amad ̣ al s əsəndi wa əge əššəɣəl was di - təssəwaraɣ əzuk - net .

text: And now , O Father , glorify thou me with thine own self with the glory which I had with thee before the world was .
text2: Amaran əmərədda kay Abba , akf - i ɣur man - nak tarna ta ɣur - ək əleɣ harwa dat əxluk n əddənet .

text: I have manifested thy name unto the men which thou gavest me out of the world : thine they were , and thou gavest them me ; and they have kept thy word .
text2: Sinafalala awa təmosa y aytedan win du - təsannafrana təskataq - qan - du daɣ əddənet , təgeq - qan daɣ əfus - in təzzar əttafan awal - nak .

text: Now they have known that all things whatsoever thou hast given me are of thee .
text2: Əmərədda əssanan as arat kul wa di - təkfe , kay a ɣur d igmad .

text: For I have given unto them the words which thou gavest me ; and they have received them , and have known surely that I came out from thee , and they have believed that thou didst send me .
text2: Fəlas əmalaɣ - asan awa di - tənne , əqbalan - tu , amaran silakanan as kay a ɣur d - əgmada , əzzigzanan deɣ as di - du - təzimazala .

text: I pray for them : I pray not for the world , but for them which thou hast given me ; for they are thine .
text2: Wər kay tinsəya y aytedan win əddənet , kala ar win di - təkfe a fəl kay tansayaɣ fəlas əmosan i - nak .

text: And all mine are thine , and thine are mine ; and I am glorified in them .
text2: A wa əle kul i - nak , kay da a wa təle kul i - nu ; amaran tarna - nin tətiwanay daɣ - san .

text: And now I am no more in the world , but these are in the world , and I come to thee . Holy Father , keep through thine own name those whom thou hast given me , that they may be one , as we are .
text2: Nak , ab - as aheɣ əddənet , kay a din - əkke , mišan əntanay əhan - tat . Ya Abba di zəddigan , agəz - tan s esəm - nak , a di - təkfe ̂ , fəl ad əqqəlan arat iyyanda šilat ən wa dər - ək əmosa .

text: While I was with them in the world , I kept them in thy name : those that thou gavest me I have kept , and none of them is lost , but the son of perdition ; that the scripture might be fulfilled .
text2: Harwa tan - əhe , oga ̂ zaq - qan s esəm - nak , a di təkfe ̂ , wər daɣ - san ixrek waliyyan ar wa ixrakan fəl ad andu awa ənnan Kətban .

text: And now come I to thee ; and these things I speak in the world , that they might have my joy fulfilled in themselves .
text2: Əmərədda kay a din - əkke , ganna awa harwa əheɣ əddənet fəl ad agin tədəwit tənda ̂ t šilat ən ta əge .

text: I have given them thy word ; and the world hath hated them , because they are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Əmalaɣ - asan awal - nak təzzar təgzar - tan əddənet fəlas wər tan - təla zund as nak iman - in wər di - təla .

text: I pray not that thou shouldest take them out of the world , but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil .
text2: Wər daɣ - ak əgmaya a tan - təkkəsa daɣ əddənet , mišan əgmaya daɣ - ak a tan - tagəza daɣ Iblis .

text: They are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Wər tan - təla əddənet , zund as nak iman - in wər di - təla .

text: Sanctify them through thy truth : thy word is truth .
text2: Zəzdəg iwallan - nasan s awal - nak imosan tidət .

text: As thou hast sent me into the world , even so have I also sent them into the world .
text2: Əzəmmizəl wa di - du - təge s əddənet , ənta a tan sər - əs əge nak da .

text: And for their sakes I sanctify myself , that they also might be sanctified through the truth .
text2: Amaran əkfeq - qay iman - in fəl əddəlil - nasan fəl ad akfin win - nasan əntanay da əs tidət .

text: Neither pray I for these alone , but for them also which shall believe on me through their word ;
text2: Wərge inalkiman - in ɣas as kay tansaya , kalar tansayaq - qay əntada y aytedan win sər - i z ' əzzəgzənnen fəl as əslan y awal - nasan .

text: That they all may be one ; as thou , Father , art in me , and I in thee , that they also may be one in us : that the world may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Əgmaya daɣ - ak a tan - igan ket - nasan arat iyyanda s əmmək was dər - ək t - əmosa ; nəqqəl - tu dər - san nakkanay da fəl ad təzzəgzən əddənet as kay a di - d - izammazalan .

text: And the glory which thou gavest me I have given them ; that they may be one , even as we are one :
text2: Əkfeq - qan tarna ta di - təkfe , fəl ad əqqəlan arat iyyanda zun awa nəmos nak dər - ək ,

text: I in them , and thou in me , that they may be made perfect in one ; and that the world may know that thou hast sent me , and hast loved them , as thou hast loved me .
text2: nak ərta ̂ ya dər - san , kay tərta ̂ ya dər - i , fəl ad əqqəlan arat iyyanda əs təməwit tənda ̂ t təzzar təssən əddənet as kay a di - d - izammazalan harwa təgeɣ - asan tara ta di - təge .

text: Father , I will that they also , whom thou hast given me , be with me where I am ; that they may behold my glory , which thou hast given me : for thou lovedst me before the foundation of the world .
text2: Abba , a əre as win di təkfe ad əggəzan əntanay da edag wa əhe fəl ad əhannayan tarna ta di - təkfe fəlas di - tare harwa dat əxluk n əddənet .

text: O righteous Father , the world hath not known thee : but I have known thee , and these have known that thou hast sent me .
text2: Abba , məššis n alɣadala , əddənet wər kay - təssen eges nak əssanaq - qay amaran inalkiman - in , əssa ̂ nan as kay a di - d - izammazalan .

text: And I have declared unto them thy name , and will declare it : that the love wherewith thou hast loved me may be in them , and I in them .
text2: Əssosanaq - qan awa təmosa amaran wər z ' ammazzaya d adi , fəl a tan - təggəz tara ta di - təge , ərtəya dər - san .

text: And Judas also , which betrayed him , knew the place : for Jesus ofttimes resorted thither with his disciples .
text2: Yahuza Isxarəyuti wa z ' akkaddalan Ɣaysa issan edag wen , fəlas iyyəwan daɣ - as Ɣaysa əmənəy ənta əd nalkiman - net .

text: Judas then , having received a band of men and officers from the chief priests and Pharisees , cometh thither with lanterns and torches and weapons .
text2: Təzzar iddew Yahuza əd taqqamt tagget ən sojitan ən Kəl - Ərrum , əd magazan n Ahan ən Məššina win d - əssəglan limaman win zawwarnen , əd Farisaytan , ewayan fətəlaten , əd belan , əd təzoli - nasan .

text: Jesus therefore , knowing all things that should come upon him , went forth , and said unto them , Whom seek ye ?
text2: Ihoz - tan - in Ɣaysa , fəlas issa ̂ n daɣ arat kul wa tu - z - igrəwan , issəstan - tan inn - asan : « Ma imos was təsaggadam ? »

text: They answered him , Jesus of Nazareth . Jesus saith unto them , I am he . And Judas also , which betrayed him , stood with them .
text2: Ənnan - as : « Ɣaysa wa n Nazaret as nəsaggad . » Inn - asan : « Nak da da . » Ibdad gar - essan Yahuza wa t - ikkəddalan .

text: As soon then as he had said unto them , I am he , they went backward , and fell to the ground .
text2: Amazay wa da daɣ dasan - inna Ɣaysa : « Nak da da » ənta daɣ əhagan əqqalan dəffər - san har udan .

text: Then asked he them again , Whom seek ye ? And they said , Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Ilas Ɣaysa inn - asan : « Ma imos was təsaggadam ? » Ənnan - as : « Ɣaysa wa n Nazaret as nəsaggad . »

text: Jesus answered , I have told you that I am he : if therefore ye seek me , let these go their way :
text2: Inn - asan : « Wərgeɣ ənneɣ - awan nak da da . Daɣ adi kud nak as təsaggadam , tayyim aytedan win ad jəwənken .

text: That the saying might be fulfilled , which he spake , Of them which thou gavest me have I lost none .
text2: Əmmək wen da as inda awal wa iga dat awen as inna : « Wər daɣ - i ixrek waliyyan daɣ win di - təkfe . »

text: Then Simon Peter having a sword drew it , and smote the high priest ' s servant , and cut off his right ear . The servant ' s name was Malchus .
text2: Ila Simɣon Butros takoba , təzzar ilbay - tat - du iwat sər - əs akli n Əlimam wa Zəwwaran , ifras - du təməzzuk - net ta n əɣil . Akli wa esəm - net Malxus .

text: Then said Jesus unto Peter , Put up thy sword into the sheath : the cup which my Father hath given me , shall I not drink it ?
text2: Inna Ɣaysa i Butros : « Suɣəl takoba - nak tətərut ! Ak ad aqqama wər əgeɣ alɣazab wa di - otas Abba ? »

text: Then the band and the captain and officers of the Jews took Jesus , and bound him ,
text2: Təzzar obazan Ɣaysa əkradan - tu . Əmosan taqqamt ən sojitan ən Kəl - Ərrum d əmuzar - nasan , əd magazan n Ahan ən Məššina win d - əssəglan muzaran ən Kəl - Əlyəhud .

text: And led him away to Annas first ; for he was father in law to Caiaphas , which was the high priest that same year .
text2: Ewayan - tu əstizarat s ahan ən Xa ̂ nan wa n ədaggal ən Kayif wa imosan Əlimam wa Zəwwaran daɣ awatay wen .

text: Now Caiaphas was he , which gave counsel to the Jews , that it was expedient that one man should die for the people .
text2: Amaran Kayif ənta a igan i muzaran ən Kəl - Əlyəhud tanat ta n as ofa ad ammat awedan iyyanda daɣ adag ən tamattay .

text: And Simon Peter followed Jesus , and so did another disciple : that disciple was known unto the high priest , and went in with Jesus into the palace of the high priest .
text2: Ilkam Simɣon Butros i Ɣaysa ənta d ənalkim iyyan . Ənalkim wa izday Əlimam wa Zəwwaran iman - net , təzzar iggaz afarag wa iɣlayan aɣaywan n Əlimam wa Zəwwaran daɣ amazay wa da daq - q ' iggaz Ɣaysa .

text: But Peter stood at the door without . Then went out that other disciple , which was known unto the high priest , and spake unto her that kept the door , and brought in Peter .
text2: Butros ənta iqqim - du dat ahan , ɣur əmi n afarag . Irdaɣ - du ənalkim wen , igraw ɣur təntut ta togazat təsəhərt ad tayyu Butros s iguz n aɣaywan .

text: Then saith the damsel that kept the door unto Peter , Art not thou also one of this man ' s disciples ? He saith , I am not .
text2: Təzzar tənna təmaššaɣalt ta togazat imi n ahan i Butros : « Wərge kay da iyyan daɣ nalkiman n aləs wa a təmosa ? » Inn - as : « Wər t - əmosa . »

text: And the servants and officers stood there , who had made a fire of coals ; for it was cold : and they warmed themselves : and Peter stood with them , and warmed himself .
text2: Asamed iga . Ɣilayɣalayan eklan əd magazan n Ahan ən Məššina temsay ən təmakaten əsukusan sər - əs . Ik - en - in Butros ənta da ad isukus .

text: The high priest then asked Jesus of his disciples , and of his doctrine .
text2: Issəstan Əlimam wa Zəwwaran Ɣaysa daɣ talɣa ən nalkiman - net , d əsəssəɣri wa itaggu .

text: Jesus answered him , I spake openly to the world ; I ever taught in the synagogue , and in the temple , whither the Jews always resort ; and in secret have I said nothing .
text2: Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Awal wa əge y əddənet , wər imos arat iɣbaran . Faw da inan ən taɣaray d Ahan ən Məššina daɣ sassaɣra dad əddewan Kəl - Əlyəhud kul , amaran wər t - illa awal əge daɣ əssir .

text: Why askest thou me ? ask them which heard me , what I have said unto them : behold , they know what I said .
text2: Mafel as di - təsastana ? Səstən aytedan win di - əslanen d arat wa fəl dasan - əmməgrada ; əntanay əssanan daɣ arat wa ənne . »

text: And when he had thus spoken , one of the officers which stood by struck Jesus with the palm of his hand , saying , Answerest thou the high priest so ?
text2: As inna Ɣaysa arat wa , iqqas - as iyyan daɣ magazan n Ahan ən Məššina ibda ̂ dan den , inn - as : « Esaway wa da as tətajawwaba y Əlimam wa Zəwwaran ? »

text: Jesus answered him , If I have spoken evil , bear witness of the evil : but if well , why smitest thou me ?
text2: Ijjəwwab - as Ɣaysa inn - as : « Kud arak batu a əge , əməl - i edag wa daq - qat - əge . Kud amaran əgeɣ batu tolaɣat , məni əddəlil wa fəl di - təggata ? »

text: Now Annas had sent him bound unto Caiaphas the high priest .
text2: Issərdaq - qu Xa ̂ nan , da ikrad , issok - ay Kayif wa n Əlimam wa Zəwwaran .

text: And Simon Peter stood and warmed himself . They said therefore unto him , Art not thou also one of his disciples ? He denied it , and said , I am not .
text2: Assaɣat ten , Simɣon Butros illa den da isukus əs tamsay . Itawann - as : « Wərge kay da arat daɣ nalkiman n aləs wa a təmosa ? » Inn - asan Butros : « Kala kala wər t - əmosa . »

text: One of the servants of the high priest , being his kinsman whose ear Peter cut off , saith , Did not I see thee in the garden with him ?
text2: Inkar - du iyyan daɣ eklan n Əlimam wa Zəwwaran , imosan əšəqqaɣ n aləs was d - ifras Butros təməzzuk - net , inn - as : « Wərgeɣ ənayaq - qay təddewa dər - əs daɣ əgoras ? »

text: Peter then denied again : and immediately the cock crew .
text2: Ilas Butros ənnukra n arat wen . Amazay wen da daɣ iɣra əkəji aɣora .

text: Then led they Jesus from Caiaphas unto the hall of judgment : and it was early ; and they themselves went not into the judgment hall , lest they should be defiled ; but that they might eat the passover .
text2: Immeway Ɣaysa ɣur Kayif s aɣaywan n əmuzar n akal . Arat wa itaggu ɣur əfərirəy n anay . Win dər - əs d - əddewnen wər əggezan ehan wa n əmuzar n akal , fəl ad əttəfan tazdak - nasan y ad atšin amensay wa n Akkay .

text: Pilate then went out unto them , and said , What accusation bring ye against this man ?
text2: Awen da fəl d - igmad Bilatəs wa n əmuzar n akal ehan - net , ikk - en - du inn - asan : « Ma imos lahan wa fəl təbazam aləs wa ? »

text: They answered and said unto him , If he were not a malefactor , we would not have delivered him up unto thee .
text2: Ənnan - as : « Ənnar wər imos aw təkma , wər dak - k - idu - za - nawəy »

text: Then said Pilate unto them , Take ye him , and judge him according to your law . The Jews therefore said unto him , It is not lawful for us to put any man to death :
text2: Inn - asan Bilatəs : « Awəyat - tu təxkəmam - as s əlqanun wa - nawan . » Ənnan - as Kəl - Əlyəhud : « Nakkanay wər nəla turagat ən tanaɣay n awedan . »

text: That the saying of Jesus might be fulfilled , which he spake , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Arat wa itaggu fəl ad andu awal wa iga Ɣaysa assaɣa wa ad imal ənnuɣ ən təmattant ta z - agu .

text: Then Pilate entered into the judgment hall again , and called Jesus , and said unto him , Art thou the King of the Jews ?
text2: Təzzar iqqal Bilatəs ehan - net iɣra Ɣaysa issəstan - tu inn - as : « Kay a imosan əmənokal ən Kəl - Əlyəhud ? »

text: Jesus answered him , Sayest thou this thing of thyself , or did others tell it thee of me ?
text2: Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Arat wa kay iman - nak as tu - tənne , meɣ ak aytedan wiyyad a dak - k - ənnanen sər - i ? »

text: Pilate answered , Am I a Jew ? Thine own nation and the chief priests have delivered thee unto me : what hast thou done ?
text2: Inn - as Bilatəs : « Un nak iyyan daɣ Kəl - Əlyəhud a mosa ? Tamattay - nak , əd limaman win zawwarnen a kay d - ewaynen sər - i , ma imos arat wa təxšada ? »

text: Jesus answered , My kingdom is not of this world : if my kingdom were of this world , then would my servants fight , that I should not be delivered to the Jews : but now is my kingdom not from hence .
text2: Ijjəwwab - as Ɣaysa inn - as : « Taɣmar - in wər tat - təla əddənet ta da . Ənnar taɣmar - in šin əddənet ta da , ənkərnat - du təɣurad - in əknəsnat fəl ad wər əggezaɣ ifassan ən Kəl - Əlyəhud . Kala kala , igmad aššak as taɣmar - in wər tat - təla əddənet ta da . »

text: Pilate therefore said unto him , Art thou a king then ? Jesus answered , Thou sayest that I am a king . To this end was I born , and for this cause came I into the world , that I should bear witness unto the truth . Every one that is of the truth heareth my voice .
text2: Inn - as Bilatəs : « Daɣ adi kay əmənokal ? » Ijjəwwab - as Ɣaysa inn - as : « Kay iman - nak a innan : Nak əmosaɣ əmənokal . Arat da wa fəl d - əhəwa amaran ənta fəl d - əggazaɣ əddənet : assa a d - əge y ad aggayyeɣ əs tidət . I imosan aw tidət , kul issisam y awal - in . »

text: Pilate saith unto him , What is truth ? And when he had said this , he went out again unto the Jews , and saith unto them , I find in him no fault at all .
text2: Inn - as Bilatəs : « Ma təmos za tidət ? » Dəffər adi iqqal Bilatəs Kəl - Əlyəhud inn - asan : « Fəl aganna wa di - iqqalan za , nak wər əhənnəya lahan waliyyan daɣ aləs wa .

text: But ye have a custom , that I should release unto you one at the passover : will ye therefore that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Mišan ya , daɣ arat wa imosan alɣadat - nawan as faw da as d - ewad əmud wa n Akkay a dawan - d - əkkəsaɣ iyyan daɣ məskəsa - nawan . Təram a dawan - d - əkkəsaɣ əmənokal ən Kəl - Əlyəhud ? »

text: Then cried they all again , saying , Not this man , but Barabbas . Now Barabbas was a robber .
text2: Saɣɣaren - du ket - nasan ənnan - as : « Kala , kala , wərgeɣ ənta ! Barabbas as nəra danaq - q - idu - təkkəsa . » Barabbas wa əjajəb n anasgafa a imos .

text: And the soldiers platted a crown of thorns , and put it on his head , and they put on him a purple robe ,
text2: Əzda ̇ n sojitan təkəbbut təgat əs šənnanan əssəwaran - tat eɣaf - net , əzzəzlagan - tu əntada əbərnuz zaggaɣan .

text: And said , Hail , King of the Jews ! and they smote him with their hands .
text2: Tihazan - t - in gannan - as : « Oyyik ! Əmənokal ən Kəl - Əlyəhud ! » Taggan - as šiqqas .

text: Pilate therefore went forth again , and saith unto them , Behold , I bring him forth to you , that ye may know that I find no fault in him .
text2: Ilas Bilatəs irdaɣ - du , inna i Kəl - Əlyəhud : « Ənawat ! A dawan - t - id əssərdəɣa , ad təssənam as wər fall - as ənaya lahan waliyyan fəl iwwəddab . »

text: Then came Jesus forth , wearing the crown of thorns , and the purple robe . And Pilate saith unto them , Behold the man !
text2: Təzzar irdaɣ - du Ɣaysa təwar - tu təkəbbut ən šənnanan , izlag əbərnuz zaggaɣan , inn - asan Bilatəs : « Ənta da aləs . »

text: When the chief priests therefore and officers saw him , they cried out , saying , Crucify him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Take ye him , and crucify him : for I find no fault in him .
text2: As t - oggan limaman win zawwarnen əd magazan n Ahan ən Məššina , ad saɣaren gannin : « Taytay - tu fəl šiləlt ! Taytay - tu fəl šiləlt ! » inn - asan Bilatəs : « Abəzat - tu kawanay iman - nawan tattaytayam - tu , nak wər hənnəyaɣ əddəlil waliyyan fəl t - əwwəddaba . »

text: The Jews answered him , We have a law , and by our law he ought to die , because he made himself the Son of God .
text2: Ənnan - as muzaran ən Kəl - Əlyəhud : « Nakkanay nəla əššəriɣa , amaran əššəriɣa wa , ih - ay as aləs wa ihor əd təmattant , fəlas a inna ənta Barar ən Məššina a imos . »

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he was the more afraid ;
text2: Batu ta təššota tasa daɣ Bilatəs ,

text: And went again into the judgment hall , and saith unto Jesus , Whence art thou ? But Jesus gave him no answer .
text2: təzzar ilas iguz n adag wa n əššəriɣa , inna i Ɣaysa : « Mənis du təhe ? » Mišan wər das - iga Ɣaysa aljawab waliyyan .

text: Then saith Pilate unto him , Speakest thou not unto me ? knowest thou not that I have power to crucify thee , and have power to release thee ?
text2: Amazay wen da das - inna Bilatəs : « Nak as tugaya s a di - təššiwəla ? Wər təssenaɣ as əle fərregat n a kay - ayya , əleɣ əntada fərregat n a kay - attaytaya fəl šiləlt ? »

text: Jesus answered , Thou couldest have no power at all against me , except it were given thee from above : therefore he that delivered me unto thee hath the greater sin .
text2: Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Wər fall - i təle tarna waliyyat ar ta sər - ək du - təfalat Məššina . A di da fəlas awedan wa di - igan gər fassan - nak , ogar - kay igi n abakkad . »

text: And from thenceforth Pilate sought to release him : but the Jews cried out , saying , If thou let this man go , thou art not Caesar ' s friend : whosoever maketh himself a king speaketh against Caesar .
text2: Amazay wen da daɣ iggaz Bilatəs šin agamay n asaway was z ' ayyu Ɣaysa . Mišan ənkaran - du Kəl - Əlyəhud ad saɣaren gannin - as : « As toyyeɣ aləs wədi , adi za wər təmosaɣ əmidi ən Kisra , əmənokal ən Kəl - Ərrum , fəlas awedan wa innan imos əmənokal , wədi azangaw ən Kisra a imos ! »

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he brought Jesus forth , and sat down in the judgment seat in a place that is called the Pavement , but in the Hebrew , Gabbatha .
text2: As isla Bilatəs i batuten šin , issərdaɣ - du Ɣaysa , təzzar iqqim daɣ təxawit ta n adag n əššəriɣa . Edag wədi esəm - net « Aɣarɣar ilsa ̂ n təsəlit » itawann - as daɣ təlɣibranit « Gabbata » .

text: And it was the preparation of the passover , and about the sixth hour : and he saith unto the Jews , Behold your King !
text2: Imos awen əzəl wa oggan amud wa n Akkay , ammasnazal , amaran taggin mutag . Inna Bilatəs i Kəl - Əlyəhud : « Əmənokal - nawan əddi ! »

text: But they cried out , Away with him , away with him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Shall I crucify your King ? The chief priest answered , We have no king but Caesar .
text2: Eges əggazan šin təɣaraten ad gannin : « Anɣ - ay ! Anɣ - ay ! Taytay - tu fəl šiləlt ! » Inn - asan Bilatəs : « Daɣ adi ad attaytayaɣ əmənokal - nawan fəl šiləlt ? » Ənnan - as limaman win zawwarnen : « Əmənokal - nana wər t - imos ar Kisra . »

text: Then delivered he him therefore unto them to be crucified . And they took Jesus , and led him away .
text2: Təzzar issəllam i sojitan Ɣaysa y ad t - attaytayan fəl šiləlt . Təzzar əzzərgazan sojitan Ɣaysa .

text: And he bearing his cross went forth into a place called the place of a skull , which is called in the Hebrew Golgotha :
text2: Igmad aɣrəm eway ənta iman - net šiləlt ta fəl z - attaytay . Ikka təkašwart tas itawannu « Təkəyya » , itawann - as daɣ təlɣibranit « Golgota » .

text: Where they crucified him , and two other with him , on either side one , and Jesus in the midst .
text2: Den da ad əttəytayan sojitan Ɣaysa fəl šiləlt . Əttəytayan əššin meddan wiyyad əntanay da fəl šiləlen , iyyan iggaz aɣil ən Ɣaysa , wa hadan iggaz zalgat - net .

text: And Pilate wrote a title , and put it on the cross . And the writing was , JESUS OF NAZARETH THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Omar Bilatəs s ad ammatkal əsəllum itəwəktəb fall - as « Ɣaysa wa n Nazaret , əmənokal ən Kəl - Əlyəhud » , itəwəsəltəɣ i šiləlt . Itawagg ' awen da .

text: This title then read many of the Jews : for the place where Jesus was crucified was nigh to the city : and it was written in Hebrew , and Greek , and Latin .
text2: Kəl - Əlyəhud aggotnen əɣran əsəllum wa . Ənta edag wa daɣ ittəytay Ɣaysa fəl šiləlt ihoz aɣrəm , amaran əsəllum wa iktab daɣ awalan win təlɣibranit , əd təlatint əd təgərekt .

text: Then said the chief priests of the Jews to Pilate , Write not , The King of the Jews ; but that he said , I am King of the Jews .
text2: Ənnan limaman win zawwarnen ən Kəl - Əlyəhud i Bilatəs : « Ad wər təktəba fəl šiləlt as : " Aləs wa əmənokal ən Kəl Əlyəhud " , kalar əktəb fall - as as : " aləs da wa innan ənta a imosan əmənokal ən Kəl - Əlyəhud . "

text: Pilate answered , What I have written I have written .
text2: Inn - asan Bilatəs : « Arat wa əktaba , wər - tu - za - səmməttəya . »

text: Then the soldiers , when they had crucified Jesus , took his garments , and made four parts , to every soldier a part ; and also his coat : now the coat was without seam , woven from the top throughout .
text2: Assaɣa wad əttitayan sojitan Ɣaysa fəl šiləlt , ədkalan isəlsa - net , əgan - asan əkkozat təzunen , əkkullu n iyyan daɣ - san igraw iyyat . Ədkalan əntada təkatkat - net ta zəwwarat , təgat daɣ təbdoq wər iha a imosan azamay , tosaɣ - du ɣur afalla har eres .

text: They said therefore among themselves , Let us not rend it , but cast lots for it , whose it shall be : that the scripture might be fulfilled , which saith , They parted my raiment among them , and for my vesture they did cast lots . These things therefore the soldiers did .
text2: Ənnan gar - essan : Ad wər nəzəzzərrət təkatkat ta , ofa ad nagu šišaɣeren fəl wa tat - z - ilen . Arat wa ənnan - tu fəl ad andu awal ihan Ikətban n Ənnəbitan . Awal wa inna : « Əzunan tabdoq - in , təzzar əgan šišaɣeren fəl təkatkat - in » Arat wen ənta iman - net a əgan sojitan .

text: Now there stood by the cross of Jesus his mother , and his mother ' s sister , Mary the wife of Cleophas , and Mary Magdalene .
text2: Təgəttawt ta fəl ittəytay Ɣaysa , əbdadnat dagma - net tədoden əmosnen anna - net , əd tamadrayt n anna - net , əd Maryama ta n təntut ən Klobas , əd Maryama ta n Magdala .

text: When Jesus therefore saw his mother , and the disciple standing by , whom he loved , he saith unto his mother , Woman , behold thy son !
text2: Ogga Ɣaysa anna - net , inay ənalkim - net wa n əməri - net ibdad dagma n anna - net , inn - as : « Anna , barar - nam əddi » .

text: Then saith he to the disciple , Behold thy mother ! And from that hour that disciple took her unto his own home .
text2: Təzzar inna y ənalkim - net wen : « Anna - nak əddi » . Amazay wen da daɣ dər - əs iddew ənalkim wen s aɣaywan - net issan daɣ - as .

text: After this , Jesus knowing that all things were now accomplished , that the scripture might be fulfilled , saith , I thirst .
text2: Dəffər awen inna Ɣaysa : « Ih - i fad » , fəlas issan as arat kul ikmal , amaran batu ta wər tat - iga ar fəl ad andu awal ihan Ikətban n Ənnəbitan .

text: Now there was set a vessel full of vinegar : and they filled a spunge with vinegar , and put it upon hyssop , and put it to his mouth .
text2: Edag wa insa daɣ - as əɣəzu iha esmad kəzbəran wəllen , təmmətkal šikəst təttal d əmi n alawag n əzzənəf n ənniɣnaɣ iyyan idwa ̂ lan as itawannu Xisob , itawasalmaɣ - du daɣ esmad wa , təzzar itawazzal - in s əmi - net .

text: When Jesus therefore had received the vinegar , he said , It is finished : and he bowed his head , and gave up the ghost .
text2: As izannalmaz Ɣaysa esmad wa kəzbəran a , inna : « Arat kul ikmal . » Təzzar issəras eɣaf - net , əgmadan - tu man .

text: The Jews therefore , because it was the preparation , that the bodies should not remain upon the cross on the sabbath day , ( for that sabbath day was an high day , ) besought Pilate that their legs might be broken , and that they might be taken away .
text2: Əzəl wen taggin mutag n əmud wa n Akkay . Kəl Əlyəhud wər əren ad aqqaminat alzanazaten n aytedan əwarnat šiləlen daɣ əzəl wa n təsanfat - nasan . Ənta əzəl wen , wər ogda əd win hadatnen təzzəwwərt . Təzzar əglan əssəstanan Bilatəs ənnan - as : « Amər s ad tawarzin daran - nasan , fəl a tan - iba tarmad , təssukəsa - du alzanazaten ! »

text: Then came the soldiers , and brake the legs of the first , and of the other which was crucified with him .
text2: Əkkan - du sojitan meddan win tawataytaynen dagma ən Ɣaysa . Ərzan idaran ən wa azzaran , okayan əs wa n əššin əgan - as awen da .

text: But when they came to Jesus , and saw that he was dead already , they brake not his legs :
text2: As d - ewadan Ɣaysa ənayan as as d - osan da aba - tu . Təzzar əqqiman da wər ərzen idaran - net .

text: But one of the soldiers with a spear pierced his side , and forthwith came there out blood and water .
text2: Mišan idag iyyan daɣ sojitan win tasaga ən Ɣaysa , isaxarabbat - tat s allaɣ - net . Amazay wen da daɣ - as d - iffay əzni d aman .

text: And he that saw it bare record , and his record is true : and he knoweth that he saith true , that ye might believe .
text2: Awedan wa igan isalan win , inay - tan əs šittawen - net , amaran təgəyya - net tidət a təmos . Issan as tidət ta təzdarat as iššewal da , fəl ad təzzəgzənam kawanay da .

text: For these things were done , that the scripture should be fulfilled , A bone of him shall not be broken .
text2: Ənta aratan win kul wər əgen ar fəl ad andu awal ihan Ikətban n Ənnəbitan . Awal wa inna : « Wər z - arraz waliyyan daɣ ɣasan - net . »

text: And again another scripture saith , They shall look on him whom they pierced .
text2: Awal wa ihan Ikətban n Ənnəbitan ih - ay əntada as : « Ad əssədəgan isawadan - nasan sa sər wa saxxarabben . »

text: And after this Joseph of Arimathaea , being a disciple of Jesus , but secretly for fear of the Jews , besought Pilate that he might take away the body of Jesus : and Pilate gave him leave . He came therefore , and took the body of Jesus .
text2: Dəffər adi osad - du Yusəf wa n əɣrəm n Arimatay , imosan iyyan daɣ nalkiman ən Ɣaysa , eges daɣ əssir , fəlas iksud Kəl - Əlyəhud . Ikka Bilatəs igmay daɣ - as ad awəy alzanazat ən Ɣaysa . Ikf - ay Bilatəs turagat n awen , təzzar igla eway alzanazat .

text: And there came also Nicodemus , which at the first came to Jesus by night , and brought a mixture of myrrh and aloes , about an hundred pound weight .
text2: Osa - ddu Nikodemos ənta da , s ənta as kala din - osa Ɣaysa ahad iyyan dat awen . Eway - du amadal ən karadat təmərwen ən kilaw ən təfaršit daɣ ənɣalan alwarditan .

text: Then took they the body of Jesus , and wound it in linen clothes with the spices , as the manner of the Jews is to bury .
text2: Idkal - du Yusəf əd Nikodemos alzanazat ən Ɣaysa əgan - tat daɣ šifit təgat daɣ təsəwad , əssəlalan - tat adutan əzodnen . Arat wa imos alɣadat ən Kəl - Əlyəhud daɣ anabal ən nəmməttan .

text: Now in the place where he was crucified there was a garden ; and in the garden a new sepulchre , wherein was never man yet laid .
text2: Edag wa daɣ itawataytay Ɣaysa fəl təgəttawt ih - ay afarag . Amaran afarag wen təh - ay təsaskawt taynayat as wər kala tat - iggaz ənəmmettən .

text: There laid they Jesus therefore because of the Jews ' preparation day ; for the sepulchre was nigh at hand .
text2: Əzəl wen ənta daɣ simutugan Kəl - Əlyəhud y əzəl - nasan wa n təsanfawt , awen da fəl iga Yusəf əd Nikodemos Ɣaysa daɣ təsaskawt ta , fəlas ənta a təhozat .

text: Then she runneth , and cometh to Simon Peter , and to the other disciple , whom Jesus loved , and saith unto them , They have taken away the Lord out of the sepulchre , and we know not where they have laid him .
text2: Tozal təkka Simɣon Butros d ənalkim wa isannahal Ɣaysa tara tənn - asan : « Əməli itawakkas daɣ təsaskawt amaran wər nəssen edag wa daq q - əgan . »

text: Peter therefore went forth , and that other disciple , and came to the sepulchre .
text2: Irdaɣ - du Butros d ənalkim wa hadan əkkan təsaskawt .

text: So they ran both together : and the other disciple did outrun Peter , and came first to the sepulchre .
text2: Ozalan fəl əššin - essan , təzzar azzar - in ənalkim wa hadan fəlas orna Butros daɣ azzal ,

text: And he stooping down , and looking in , saw the linen clothes lying ; yet went he not in .
text2: iššəgga inay šisəwad šin šifit ənsanat den , mišan wər iggez .

text: Then cometh Simon Peter following him , and went into the sepulchre , and seeth the linen clothes lie ,
text2: Simɣon Butros wa das - d - ilkaman ənta da ewad - du . Iggaz təsaskawt , inay əntada šisəwad šin ənsanat den .

text: And the napkin , that was about his head , not lying with the linen clothes , but wrapped together in a place by itself .
text2: Inay asalsaw wa iwaran eɣaf ən Ɣaysa wər irtay əd šifit , ittal insa s aganna , iha edag - net .

text: Then went in also that other disciple , which came first to the sepulchre , and he saw , and believed .
text2: Təzzar iggaz - du ənalkim wa hadan , s ənta a d - ewadan əstizarat , inay arat wa izzəgzan - tu .

text: For as yet they knew not the scripture , that he must rise again from the dead .
text2: Ənta harwa da wər əgren Ikətban n ənnəbitan win ənnanen Ɣaysa kundaba inkar - du daɣ nəmməttan .

text: Then the disciples went away again unto their own home .
text2: Təzzar əqqalan nalkiman win aɣaywan - nasan .

text: But Mary stood without at the sepulchre weeping : and as she wept , she stooped down , and looked into the sepulchre ,
text2: Maryama təlla dat təsaskawt daɣ ihəz təhallu . Təššəgga daɣ amazay wa daɣ təhallu den ,

text: And seeth two angels in white sitting , the one at the head , and the other at the feet , where the body of Jesus had lain .
text2: tənay əššin angalosan əssimlalnen , əqqiman daɣ adag was kala a tu - təha alzanazat ən Ɣaysa . Iyyan illa ɣur anamod n aɣaf - net , wa hadan illa ɣur daran - net .

text: And they say unto her , Woman , why weepest thou ? She saith unto them , Because they have taken away my Lord , and I know not where they have laid him .
text2: Təzzar ənnan - as : « Ma kam isa ̂ lan , tantut ? » Tənn - asan : « Wər di - isəlu ar imiwəy wa iga Əməli - nin , amaran wər əssena dad itawagga . »

text: And when she had thus said , she turned herself back , and saw Jesus standing , and knew not that it was Jesus .
text2: As tənna arat wa , təswad dəffər - əs , togga Ɣaysa ibdad . Mišan wər təssen as ənta awen .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , why weepest thou ? whom seekest thou ? She , supposing him to be the gardener , saith unto him , Sir , if thou have borne him hence , tell me where thou hast laid him , and I will take him away .
text2: Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Ma kam - isa ̂ lan tantut ? Ma imos was təsaggada ? » Tənn - as Maryama : « Ya aləs wa , kud kay a t - ewayan , təməlaɣ - i dad illa fəl a t - id - awəya . » Arat wa , as das - tu - tənna a təɣil əmagyak n afarag wa təha təsaskawt a das - iššewalan .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Mary . She turned herself , and saith unto him , Rabboni ; which is to say , Master .
text2: Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Maryama ! » , təzzar təmalallay - t - in tənn - as daɣ awal wa n təlɣibranit : « Rabbuni ! » ( almaɣna n awen Əššix - in . )

text: Jesus saith unto her , Touch me not ; for I am not yet ascended to my Father : but go to my brethren , and say unto them , I ascend unto my Father , and your Father ; and to my God , and your God .
text2: Inn - as Ɣaysa : « A di - wər - təgdəla teklay , fəlas harwa da wər əggəzzaya s Abba ; kalar aglu əməl i mədrayan - in as nak ad aggazzaya s Abba - nin , s ənta a imosan Abba - nawan kawanay da , aggazzaya s Əməli - nin s ənta a imosan Əməli - nawan kawanay da . »

text: Mary Magdalene came and told the disciples that she had seen the Lord , and that he had spoken these things unto her .
text2: Təgla Maryama təmal i nalkiman as tənay Əməli , təmal - asan aratan win fəl das - imməgrad .

text: Then the same day at evening , being the first day of the week , when the doors were shut where the disciples were assembled for fear of the Jews , came Jesus and stood in the midst , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Tadwit n alxad wen iman - net , əddewan nalkiman , əɣfalan - du ehan fəl man - nasan , fəlas əksudan imuzaran ən Kəl - Əlyəhud . Osa - ddu Ɣaysa ibdad gar - essan inn - asan : « Ig - awan Məššina alxer ! »

text: And when he had so said , he shewed unto them his hands and his side . Then were the disciples glad , when they saw the Lord .
text2: Dəffər as dasan - inna awen issəkn - en ifassan - net , əd tasaga - net . Əknan nalkiman tədəwit fəl anay wa əgan y Əməli .

text: Then said Jesus to them again , Peace be unto you : as my Father hath sent me , even so send I you .
text2: Ilas inn - asan : « Ig - awan Məššina alxer ! Əzimazalaq - qawan s asaway was di - d - izammazal Abba . »

text: And when he had said this , he breathed on them , and saith unto them , Receive ye the Holy Ghost :
text2: Dəffər as dasan - iga batu ta , issəwad - du fall - asan s əmi - net , inn - asan : « Təgrəwamet Infas wa Zəddigan !

text: Whose soever sins ye remit , they are remitted unto them ; and whose soever sins ye retain , they are retained .
text2: Win as təssorafam ibakkadan - nasan za , dasan - təwəsurəfan , amaran win as tan - wər - təssorafam , wər z ' əgrəwan təsureft - nasan . »

text: But Thomas , one of the twelve , called Didymus , was not with them when Jesus came .
text2: Tuma was təsəmmadəq - net Eknay , wər iha inalkiman win maraw d əššin assaɣa wa tan - d - osa Ɣaysa .

text: The other disciples therefore said unto him , We have seen the Lord . But he said unto them , Except I shall see in his hands the print of the nails , and put my finger into the print of the nails , and thrust my hand into his side , I will not believe .
text2: As ənnan nalkiman win i Tuma : « Nənay Əməli ! » , inn - asan : « Wər z - əzzəgzənaɣ iket wər ənaya šimijar ən nəsmar daɣ fassan - net , ədəsaɣ idaggan - nasan s adad - in , ədəsa tasaga - net s əfus - in . »

text: And after eight days again his disciples were within , and Thomas with them : then came Jesus , the doors being shut , and stood in the midst , and said , Peace be unto you .
text2: As əgan əttam adan dəffər awen , əddewan - du nalkiman ən Ɣaysa daɣ ahan iyyan amaran ih - en Tuma daɣ taklat ten . Iggaz - du fall - asan Ɣaysa da əharnat təsəhar n ahan , ibdad gar - essan , inn - asan : « Ig - awan Məššina alxer ! »

text: Then saith he to Thomas , reach hither thy finger , and behold my hands ; and reach hither thy hand , and thrust it into my side : and be not faithless , but believing .
text2: Dəffər adi inn ' i Tuma : « Agu adad - nak da , təswəda daɣ fassan - in , tədəsa tasaga - nin s əfus - nak , təzzəgzəna taqqama da wər təqqelaɣ əkafər ! »

text: And Thomas answered and said unto him , My Lord and my God .
text2: Inn - as Tuma : « Ya Məššina di n Əməli - nin ! »

text: Jesus saith unto him , Thomas , because thou hast seen me , thou hast believed : blessed are they that have not seen , and yet have believed .
text2: Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Kay wər təzzəgzana har di - tənaya . Iket təfalawist əllan - tu dər - əs win sər - i əzzəgzannen da wər di - ənayan ! »

text: And many other signs truly did Jesus in the presence of his disciples , which are not written in this book :
text2: Immozal Ɣaysa alɣalamaten šiyyad aggotnen dat nalkiman - net , mišan ya wər sər - əsnat imməgrad əlkəttab wa .

text: But these are written , that ye might believe that Jesus is the Christ , the Son of God ; and that believing ye might have life through his name .
text2: Eges arat wa t - ihan , itiwaktab fəl ad təzzəgzənam as Ɣaysa ənta a imosan Əlməsix , imos Barar ən Məššina , təssənam əntada a ̂ s , as sər - əs təzzəgzanam ad təgrəwam təməddurt s esəm - net .

text: There were together Simon Peter , and Thomas called Didymus , and Nathanael of Cana in Galilee , and the sons of Zebedee , and two other of his disciples .
text2: Simɣon Butros , əd Tuma was təsəmmadəq - net Eknay , əd Natanayel wa n Kana daɣ amadal ən Galilaya , əd bararan ən Zebeday , d əššin nalkiman wiyyad , ket - nasan əddewan .

text: Simon Peter saith unto them , I go a fishing . They say unto him , We also go with thee . They went forth , and entered into a ship immediately ; and that night they caught nothing .
text2: Inn - asan Simɣon Butros : « Nak ad akkaɣ edag n abbaz ən kifitan . » Ənnan - as : « Nakkanay da nəddew dər - ək . » Əglan , əggazan taɣlalt . Ahad wen wər daɣ - as obezan wala .

text: But when the morning was now come , Jesus stood on the shore : but the disciples knew not that it was Jesus .
text2: As affaw iwar - in Ɣaysa təgadamayt n agaraw , mišan wər əssenan nalkiman - net as ənt ' awen .

text: Then Jesus saith unto them , Children , have ye any meat ? They answered him , No .
text2: Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Imaran - in , ak abbaz a wər təgem wala daɣ kifitan ? » Ənnan - as : « Kala » .

text: And he said unto them , Cast the net on the right side of the ship , and ye shall find . They cast therefore , and now they were not able to draw it for the multitude of fishes .
text2: Inn - asan : « Əgərat əməzzezdər - nawan wa n abbaz ən kifitan fəl aganna wa n əɣil ən təɣlalt , a tan - təgrəwam . » Əgaran əməzzezdər - nasan daɣ agaraw , təzzar indar - asan a t - id - ədkəlan , fəl awa əgan kifitan win t - əhanen daɣ igət .

text: Therefore that disciple whom Jesus loved saith unto Peter , It is the Lord . Now when Simon Peter heard that it was the Lord , he girt his fisher ' s coat unto him , ( for he was naked , ) and did cast himself into the sea .
text2: Təzzar inkar ənalkim wa isannahal Ɣaysa tara inn ' i Butros : « Əməli awa ! » Da daɣ ad isla Simɣon Butros as Əməli awen , ənta ad iqqan asalsaw - net wa n afalla , fəlas izzaf , təzzar itaraggat daɣ agaraw .

text: And the other disciples came in a little ship ; ( for they were not far from land , but as it were two hundred cubits , ) dragging the net with fishes .
text2: Amad ̣ al ən sanatat təmad n əɣil ɣas a əllanen gar - essan əd təgadamayt n agaraw . Əqqiman - du nalkiman win hadatnen daɣ təɣlalt ərkaban - du dəffər - san əməzzezdər - nasan , idnay kifitan . »

text: As soon then as they were come to land , they saw a fire of coals there , and fish laid thereon , and bread .
text2: Əzzəbben - du ɣas oggan temsay ən təmakaten fəl naŋŋin kifitan , tənsa təgəlla den əntada .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Bring of the fish which ye have now caught .
text2: Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Awəyat - du arat daɣ kifitan win du - tobazam əmərədda . »

text: Simon Peter went up , and drew the net to land full of great fishes , and hundred and fifty and three : and for all there were so many , yet was not the net broken .
text2: Igmad - du Simɣon Butros aman illil - asan s arakab n əməzzezdər wa əhan kifitan . Temeday əd səmmosat təmərwen ən kifi əd karad əs kul win zawwarnen a t - əhanen mišan wər izzərrat .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Come and dine . And none of the disciples durst ask him , Who art thou ? knowing that it was the Lord .
text2: Inn - asan Ɣaysa : « Ayewat tatšim . » Inalkiman wər tan - iha i ihalan ad issəstən Ɣaysa ann - as : « Ma təmosa ? » fəlas əssanan as Əməli awen .

text: Jesus then cometh , and taketh bread , and giveth them , and fish likewise .
text2: Ihoz - tan - in Ɣaysa , obaz - du tagəlla ikf - asan - tat , ikf - en əntada kifitan .

text: This is now the third time that Jesus shewed himself to his disciples , after that he was risen from the dead .
text2: Taklat ta ənta a təmosat ənəfilal wa n karad a d - iga Ɣaysa i nalkiman - net wa n a d - inkar daɣ nəmməttan .

text: So when they had dined , Jesus saith to Simon Peter , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me more than these ? He saith unto him , Yea , Lord ; thou knowest that I love thee . He saith unto him , Feed my lambs .
text2: Dəffər as ətšan inna Ɣaysa i Simɣon Butros : « Simɣon wa n ag Yaxya , ak tidət da a imos as tara ta di - təge togar ta di - əgan nalkiman win hadatnen ? » Inn - as Simɣon : « Ayew Əməli , təssana daɣ tara ta dak - əge . » Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Agəz ijamaran - in . »

text: He saith to him again the second time , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me ? He saith unto him , Yea , Lord ; thou knowest that I love thee . He saith unto him , Feed my sheep .
text2: Ig - as y əsəstan wa igi wa n əššin inn - as : « Simɣon wa n ag Yaxya , ak təreɣ - i ? » Inn - as Butros : « Ayew Əməli , təssana daɣ tara ta dak - əge . » Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Əqqəl amadan n ayfəd - in . »

text: He saith unto him the third time , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me ? Peter was grieved because he said unto him the third time , Lovest thou me ? And he said unto him , Lord , thou knowest all things ; thou knowest that I love thee . Jesus saith unto him , Feed my sheep .
text2: Ig - as y əsəstan wa igi wa n karad tolas inn - as : « Simɣon wa n ag Yaxya , ak təreɣ - i ? » Əxšadan man ən Simɣon Butros fəlas karad igitan das - iga Ɣaysa y əsəstan wa . Inn - as : « Əməli , kay a issanan daɣ arat kul , təssanaɣ as əreq - qay . » Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Əssən daɣ ayfəd - in .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , When thou wast young , thou girdedst thyself , and walkedst whither thou wouldest : but when thou shalt be old , thou shalt stretch forth thy hands , and another shall gird thee , and carry thee whither thou wouldest not .
text2: Əggəyyeɣ əsilakanaɣ - ak as harwa təmədrəyaɣ , iman - nak as təlassa tabdoq - nak , tətakkaɣ edag was tare , mišan əzəl wa daɣ za təqqəlaɣ aɣmar , ad təzzəlaɣ ifassan - nak , assals - ik awedan tabdoq - nak , awəy - kay s adag as wər tareɣ iki - net . »

text: This spake he , signifying by what death he should glorify God . And when he had spoken this , he saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: Batu ta issoka sər - əs Ɣaysa ənnuɣ ən təmattant ta z - agu Butros s ənta as z ' assaknu adkul wa ɣur - əs iga Məššina . Dəffər as iga batu ta inna tolas : « Əlkəm - i »

text: Then Peter , turning about , seeth the disciple whom Jesus loved following ; which also leaned on his breast at supper , and said , Lord , which is he that betrayeth thee ?
text2: Iswad - in Butros dəffər - əs ogga ənalkim wa isannahal Ɣaysa tara ilkam - asan - du . Ənalkim wa ənta a isaɣɣamaran daɣ ihəz n ədmaran ən Ɣaysa ahad wad tattin imensewan n əmud wa n Akkay . Amaran ənta harwa da as kala ad issəstanan Ɣaysa inn - as : « Əməli , ma imos wa kay z ' akkaddalan . »

text: Peter seeing him saith to Jesus , Lord , and what shall this man do ?
text2: As t - ogga Butros issəstan Ɣaysa inn - as : « Ənta za Əməli , məni taɣara - net ? »

text: Jesus saith unto him , If I will that he tarry till I come , what is that to thee ? follow thou me .
text2: Inn - as Ɣaysa : « Kud imos as areɣ ad iddər har d - əqqəla da tədi wər kay - təqqel . Kay əlkəm - i ɣas ! »

text: Then went this saying abroad among the brethren , that that disciple should not die : yet Jesus said not unto him , He shall not die ; but , If I will that he tarry till I come , what is that to thee ?
text2: Wazawazan salan daɣ məzzəgzan əs Ɣaysa as ənalkim wa wər tu - z - iba . Ənta Ɣaysa wərgeɣ a inna wər tu - z - iba , tənna ɣas a iga : « Kud imos as areɣ ad iddər har d - əqqəla da tədi wər - kay təqqel . »

text: This is the disciple which testifieth of these things , and wrote these things : and we know that his testimony is true .
text2: Ənalkim wa ənta iman - net as iggəyyat fəl igitan win , iktab - tan . Nəssan as təgəyya - net tidət a təmos .

text: And there are also many other things which Jesus did , the which , if they should be written every one , I suppose that even the world itself could not contain the books that should be written . Amen .
text2: Ɣaysa iga aratan wiyyad aggotnen . As igmay awedan d a sər - san ammagrad s iyyan - iyyan , ordeɣ as əddənet kul da wər za tawəy əlkəttaban win z - iktəb daɣ talɣa ta .

text: Paul , a servant of God , and an apostle of Jesus Christ , according to the faith of God ' s elect , and the acknowledging of the truth which is after godliness ;
text2: Awa nak Buləs , imosan akli ən Məššina , n anammazul ən Ɣaysa Əlməsix . Issiwar - i Məššina əzuk n a d - awəyaɣ əs tarrayt ta n əzəgzan aytedan win isannafran ; əssusənaq - qan tidət ta tan - za - tassaknit anamod was z ' agin təməddurt tənimannakat əd tara ən Məššina .

text: In hope of eternal life , which God , that cannot lie , promised before the world began ;
text2: Əmmək en daɣ as z ' agin attama ən təməddurt ta təɣlalat . Təməddurt ten , Məššina di wər nətəggu bahu a igan arkawal - net dat əxluk n əddənet .

text: But hath in due times manifested his word through preaching , which is committed unto me according to the commandment of God our Saviour ;
text2: Amaran Məššina isinafalal awal - net daɣ alwaq was otas . Awal wen ənta a iha əlmaɣiza was du - tawaflasa s igi - net , daɣ əlkama y awas omar Məššina di n Ənəssefsi - nana .

text: To Titus , mine own son after the common faith : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ our Saviour .
text2: Əhulaq - qay - in Titəs . Təmosa zun barar - in wa n tidət a dər ədrawaɣ əzəgzan . Əgmaya daɣ Məššina di n Abba , d Ənəssefsi - nana Ɣaysa - Əlməsix , a fall - ak d - izazzabben arraxmat , d alxer .

text: For this cause left I thee in Crete , that thou shouldest set in order the things that are wanting , and ordain elders in every city , as I had appointed thee :
text2: Oyyeq - qay - in daɣ akal ən Kəret fəl ad təsəkkəsəwaɣ awa din - iqqiman daɣ əššəɣəl - nana , təzzar taga daɣ əkkullu n əɣrəm imuzaran i tiddawat ən Kəl - Əlməsix ta tu - tahat . Aktu aratan win as kay - omara , a tan - imosan as :

text: If any be blameless , the husband of one wife , having faithful children not accused of riot or unruly .
text2: Akkiyyan daɣ muzaran win ihor a tu - wər - illa i ifragan a sər - əs ann ' arat , izlaf tantut iyyadda , ila bararan əzzigzannen , as tu - wər - ill ' i z ' annin əlan arak aladab , madeɣ wər əbbərdagan .

text: For a bishop must be blameless , as the steward of God ; not selfwilled , not soon angry , not given to wine , no striker , not given to filthy lucre ;
text2: Ənta aɣmar ən tiddawat Məššina a t - iflasan izzozar - tu i tamattay - net , daɣ adi ilzam - tu ad imos awedan as tu - wər - illa i ifragan a sər - əs ann ' arat : Wər idkel iman - net dənnəg aytedan , wər ila tuksay n əwəl , wər imos əməšwi , wər imos əməkkennəs , wala deɣ itatt ' alxaram .

text: But a lover of hospitality , a lover of good men , sober , just , holy , temperate ;
text2: Kalar arat wa t - ilzaman ad imos aləs iha amagaru , ira imazalan win olaɣnen , imos ag əlməxsud , n əməzzəleləɣ , n əmizdag innodan daɣ əwəl - net .

text: Holding fast the faithful word as he hath been taught , that he may be able by sound doctrine both to exhort and to convince the gainsayers .
text2: Isigatakkat wəllen daɣ ləkkum y awal wa ilan ələsəl s əmmək was itawasasaɣra . As ig ' adi , ad igrəw fərregat n ad itamar aytedan s əsəssəɣri wa n tidət itaggu , ifrəg əntada ad isattaddu y aytedan win das - əggewalnen as əntanay a əhanen alxata .

text: For there are many unruly and vain talkers and deceivers , specially they of the circumcision :
text2: Ənta əllan - tu aytedan aggotnen , wəllen win d - əgmadnen Kəl - Əlyəhud , əmosnen inəffəllag , əššewalnen ixərsan , saxrakan aytedan .

text: Whose mouths must be stopped , who subvert whole houses , teaching things which they ought not , for filthy lucre ' s sake .
text2: Aytedan win di ilzam ad təwədbəɣan mawan - nasan , fəlas saxrakan iɣawnatan əɣradnen s əsəssəɣri n aratan wər nəmməkkan . Tattin s ' awen alxaram .

text: One of themselves , even a prophet of their own , said , The Cretians are alway liars , evil beasts , slow bellies .
text2: Iyyan daɣ kəl - akal - nasan , imosan ənnəbi a innan : « Kəl - Kəret , ig ' as har faw təmosam inəsbuha , təmosam šilan wəxsan aššarnen , ən nəffərəšša wər nəsəmədrin ar daɣ a ətšan . »

text: This witness is true . Wherefore rebuke them sharply , that they may be sound in the faith ;
text2: Amaran arat wa inna da , tidət a imos . Awen da fəlas ag - asan ərruɣmatan əsa ̇ snen , fəl ad izəluləɣ əzəgzan - nasan ,

text: Not giving heed to Jewish fables , and commandments of men , that turn from the truth .
text2: aqqamin da wər əlkeman i mayyan ən Kəl - Əlyəhud , d id ̣ ufan n aytedan win əmməzraynen tidət .

text: Unto the pure all things are pure : but unto them that are defiled and unbelieving is nothing pure ; but even their mind and conscience is defiled .
text2: Arat kul zəddig y aytedan win as zaddogan man - nasan . Mišan aytedan win as wər zaddogan man - nasan , ugaya ̂ n deɣ s əzəgzan , ɣur - san wər t - illa a zəddigan , fəlas taytwen - nasan , d ənnəyaten - nasan kul ih - enat iba n tazdak .

text: They profess that they know God ; but in works they deny him , being abominable , and disobedient , and unto every good work reprobate .
text2: Gannin əksudan Məššina , mišan imazalan win taggin sataddan as ənkuran - tu . Əmosan aytedan tagginen igitan əssiglafnen , əmosan inəmməzray a fəl tu - wər - illa igi n əmazal olaɣan .

text: But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine :
text2: Amaran kay , tamar s aratan win namannaknen əd tarrayt ta imal əsəssəɣri wa n tidət .

text: That the aged men be sober , grave , temperate , sound in faith , in charity , in patience .
text2: Tannaɣ i meddan win waššarnen ad əqqəlan aytedan sammodnen , əttafnen əzzəbun , ənnodan daɣ wallan - nasan , issohat əzəgzan - nasan , təh - en tara , əlan zəmmerat .

text: The aged women likewise , that they be in behaviour as becometh holiness , not false accusers , not given to much wine , teachers of good things ;
text2: Əmmək wen daɣ as ilzam ad t - aginat tədoden šin waššarnen . Amər - tanat s ad əttəfnat əzzəbun - nasnat dat Məššina . Ad wər tazamnat wala iqqəl alxal - nasnat tessay n esmad aggen . Əqqəlnatet aytedan tamarnen s əmazal n awa olaɣan .

text: That they may teach the young women to be sober , to love their husbands , to love their children ,
text2: . Ədgəznatet daɣ ammar ən tədoden šin madrornen s ad irenat meddan - nasnat , əd bararan - nasnat .

text: To be discreet , chaste , keepers at home , good , obedient to their own husbands , that the word of God be not blasphemed .
text2: Əqqəlnat šidoden ənnodanen daɣ wallan - nasnat , aginat alxal zəddigan . Annattafnat d əššəɣəlan ən ɣawnatan - nasnat , aləɣnat , abbardagnat i meddan - nasnat . As ig ' adi , wər z ' itəwəlku Awal ən Məššina .

text: Young men likewise exhort to be sober minded .
text2: Tamar harwa s əmmək wen da meddan win madrornen s ad annadin daɣ wallan - nasan .

text: In all things shewing thyself a pattern of good works : in doctrine shewing uncorruptness , gravity , sincerity ,
text2: Kay iman - nak da ilzam - kay ad tətaggaɣ imazalan olaɣnen daɣ əkkullu n anamod fəl ad təqqəlaɣ almasal y aytedan . Tagg ' əsəssəɣri igan s əwəl iyyanda , ilan almaɣna .

text: Sound speech , that cannot be condemned ; that he that is of the contrary part may be ashamed , having no evil thing to say of you .
text2: Taggu batuten oɣadnen as tu - wər - illa i dər - əsnat du - z - iqqəlan . As ig ' adi inəmmənkar - nanaɣ a dasan - iba a sər - naɣ ənnan təha təkma , tabəz - tan təkarakit .

text: Exhort servants to be obedient unto their own masters , and to please them well in all things ; not answering again ;
text2: Amər eklan s ad abbardagan i məssawsan daɣ əkkullu n arat , a dasan - taggin arat wa fəl tan - z - irin , ayyin - tan təmazrəyt ,

text: Not purloining , but shewing all good fidelity ; that they may adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things .
text2: amaran a daɣ - san wər takaran . Kalar əqqəlanet aytedan əssiflasnen wəllen . As ig ' adi a d - awəyan ətəwəsəɣmar igan daɣ əkkullu n anamod y əsəssəɣri kul wa iqqalan Məššina di n Ənəssefsi - nana .

text: For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men ,
text2: Ənta arraxmat ən Məššina tənifalal , tewa ̂ y - d ' efsan y aytedan kul .

text: Teaching us that , denying ungodliness and worldly lusts , we should live soberly , righteously , and godly , in this present world ;
text2: Təsakn - anaɣ əmmək was za nammazzay əd mazalan win iban təksəda ən Məššina , əd tara n əddənet , fəl ad nagu daɣ əddənet təməddurt a daɣ nənnoda daɣ wallan - nana , toɣadat , tənimannak əd tara ən Məššina .

text: Looking for that blessed hope , and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ ;
text2: Arat wa a tu - nagu nəssigad , nəga attama n əzəl isifalawasan , imosan ənəfilal n ədkul ən Məššina di maqqaran , a t - imosan Ənəssefsi - nana Ɣaysa - Əlməsix .

text: Who gave himself for us , that he might redeem us from all iniquity , and purify unto himself a peculiar people , zealous of good works .
text2: Ənta a ikfan iman - net , fəl a danaɣ - isəddərfu daɣ id t - illa əššur , izzəzdəg - ana , nəqqəl tamattay - net a sər - əs təskatat , təsigatakkat daɣ igi ən mazalan win olaɣnen .

text: These things speak , and exhort , and rebuke with all authority . Let no man despise thee .
text2: Arat da da was kay - ilzam a tu - təsasaɣra , d anamod was ilzam a sər - əs tətamaraɣ aytedan , təsuɣulaɣ - asan - t - idu . Agu y əššəɣəl wa igi n aləs ilan batu . A tu - wər - iməl i kay - olka ̂ n .

text: Put them in mind to be subject to principalities and powers , to obey magistrates , to be ready to every good work ,
text2: Sakt - en - du as ilzam - tan ad əbbirdagan y əlxəkumat d almawakkilan - net , əkkiwanan - asan , əgəran iri y id t - illa əmazal olaɣan ketnet .

text: To speak evil of no man , to be no brawlers , but gentle , shewing all meekness unto all men .
text2: Ad wər taggin arak batuten s awedan waliyyan , wala əqqəlan inad ̣ laman , ilen aladab olaɣan , əqqəlan aytedan zamazalnen talmat y əkkullu n awedan .

text: For we ourselves also were sometimes foolish , disobedient , deceived , serving divers lusts and pleasures , living in malice and envy , hateful , and hating one another .
text2: Fəlas nakkanay iman - nana da əstizarat wər nəla almaɣna , nəmos inəmməzray əxraknen . Nəha əkkəlu fəlas nəlkam y ark ənnəyaten , d arak deranan , əmosnen əzzənəfan . Nəmos aytedan as kawalan wallan - nasan , əranen əddənet , nəla alxal isinaglafan , nənimaksan gar - ena .

text: But after that the kindness and love of God our Saviour toward man appeared ,
text2: Mišan assaɣa w ' ad tənafalal ənniɣmat ən Məššina di n Ənəssefsi , əd tara - net y aytedan ,

text: Not by works of righteousness which we have done , but according to his mercy he saved us , by the washing of regeneration , and renewing of the Holy Ghost ;
